31a3(mdo sde): la yang grogs dang lhan cig ngo mtshar du 'dzin to// lo bcu po de dag gi bar du bdag nam zhig na mi mdza' ba'i tshogs rnam pa 'di lta bu'i nang nas thar par 'gyur snyam pa dang / bdag nam zhig na
31a4(mdo sde): bag yod pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / des bdag thar par 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa de lta bu'i sems 'jug pa ma gtogs par/ nam yang gzugs kyi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur te/ sgra'i mtshan ma
31a5(mdo sde): dang / dri'i mtshan ma dang / ro'i mtshan ma dang / reg gi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur to// de nas bu mo de dag gis rgyal po 'od zer ldan la lha gzhon nu mi rol to// dgyes par mi
31a6(mdo sde): mdzad do// dgyes dgur mi spyod do zhes smras so// bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/ yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan rgyal po brgyad khri
31a7(mdo sde): dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ gdong las mchi ma 'dzag cing lus 'dar te/ mya ngan gyis sa la 'gyel to// des las langs nas/ rgyal
31b1(mdo sde): bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bu gcig rin chen dam pa nga la ltos shing spos// nga ni mya ngan gzer te khyim nas la skyel// su yis khyod mi dgar byas
31b2(mdo sde): nga la spros// de 'dir de'u chud pa chen pos gcad par bya// khyod kyi ched du ngas 'dir yid kyis smras pa// lha yi khyim ltar nyams dga' grong khyer deng ltos shig/ 'di la yan lag ma tshang
31b3(mdo sde): yod de myur spros// brgya byin lta bu'i 'byor pa de ring khyod la bstan// pad+ma'i mig can mig mdzes mya ngan nyam thag pa// lha yi bu mo lta bu'i bud med tshogs smra ltos// mya ngan thul te de dag rnam
31b4(mdo sde): dang de ring rtses// ci'i phyir zug rngus zug bzhin lus dman sems shing 'dug/ de dag rab dga' tshul mkhas dbyangs kyi yan lag snyan// glu dbyangs pheg rdob dus kyis rnam par nges par shes/
31b5(mdo sde): khyod dga' dus la deng bab mya ngan ma byed cig/ pad+ma rnying pa lta bur ci phyir deng lus dman// me tog 'bras bu yal ga 'dab rgyas skyed mos tshal// sna tshogs steng bzhag lha yi sna tshogs shing
31b6(mdo sde): 'dra// soms shig khyod kyi na tshong 'di ni thog ma yin// dga' ba'i dus la bab kyis dreng 'dri bu dga' gyis// khyod kyi khrus chen rdzing 'di lha rnams kyi yang 'dra// ut+pal dag dang pad+ma dag gi tsha
31b7(mdo sde): gyis gang // pad+ma rnams kyang bung ba rgyas pa mchog gis brgyan// de la bu soms su zhig 'di la dga' mi byed// ngang pa rma bya ne co khu byug ri skegs dang // ka la bing+ka shang shang 'u dang kun la/
32a1(mdo sde): yid 'ong sgra ldan grangs te spos ngang ldan 'dra ba// thos nas mi gang 'di la dga' ba thob mi 'gyur// gzhal med khang dag mu tig drar bcas nor bu gtsug/ gser dang
32a2(mdo sde): DUR+Yas spras rnam rgyal khang pa 'dra// rin chen khri mchog dam pa rnams kyang rab bting ba// gser dril g.yer ka ta la'i 'phreng ba sgra snyan pa// zab cing brtan pa mchog gi sil snyan sgra bsgrags pa//
32a3(mdo sde): khyod kyi ched du srung rnams yang sbyin rgya che// bu mo stong dag glu mchog snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa// dga' tshal lha yis bu mo rnams kyi 'dra ba sgrog/ mtho ris 'dra ba'i gnas yid 'ong la ci yi phyir// rnam
32a4(mdo sde): par g.yeng ba'i sems kyis dga' mi byed// gzhon nu khyod kyi rtse grogs lha yi bu 'dra ba// bu po de dag rnams dang lhan cig rtsed mo gyis// khyod kyi pha dang ma yang mchi mas brnangs shing 'dug/ skye bo/
32a5(mdo sde): 'di la sdug bsngal snying rje med dam ci// 'dus byas yang byung 'dod pa'i longs spyod don mi gnyer// yon tan bsngags pa srid pa'i skyon mthong des smras pa// 'khor ba'i dra bar chud pa'i 'gro ba 'di
32a6(mdo sde): bltas nas// thar pa don gnyer ba la smras pa yab gson cig/ lha cig sus kyang bdag la mi dga' bgyis mi mchis// bdag ni da ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan mos ma lags// nyon mongs gang
32a7(mdo sde): dag ngan 'gro'i g.yang sar ltung byed pa// sdug pa thams cad dgra dang mtshungs te rjes mi srung // mi mkhas bus pa skye bo bud med de dag dga'// bdud kyi zhags pa yon tan 'ching ba g.yangs che//
32b1(mdo sde): rtag tu 'phags pa'i skye bos de dag de ltar sdud// sems dmyal ngan 'gro mya ngan rtsa ba ni phyir bsten// bud med 'di dag pags pa'i gzugs kyis dga' ba tsam// bdag ni rus rgyas 'khrul
32b2(mdo sde): mi gtsang don mi gnyer// khrag dang gcin dang mi gtsang ba dang dri ma 'dzag/ gsal bar dur khrod 'dra la ji ltar dga' bar bgyi// glu dang gar dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra gzung mi bgyi// dang
32b3(mdo sde): bla rmi lam 'dra ba mi mkhas rdzogs par bgyid// kun tu rtog pa sred gyur mi mkhas 'dir brlag gis// ci phyir byas pa'i skye bo lta bur nyon mongs khol// shing lcug 'di dag thams cad dgun
32b4(mdo sde): gyi dus byung na// dgon drung shing ltar 'gyur te dga' bar 'gyur ma lags// mi rtag 'di yis dpal rnams thams cad bshig gyur te// srog g.yor gyur kyang gti mug gis ni bag med 'gyur/
32b5(mdo sde): sems ni rgya mtsho lta bur tshim par byed mi nus// srid pa rab tu 'phel la dga' bas phyir zhing 'dod// 'dod rgyus pan mtshun gsad pa'i 'gro la bltas nas su// 'dir ni ji ltar lhun po rlung gis
32b6(mdo sde): mi g.yo bzhin// rgyal po khyod dang pa dang lhan cig skyes pa dang // gnyen gyi skye bo chung ma ngan song bdag skyes min// bdag cag thams cad rtswa rtse'i zil pa 'dra ba ste// sems kyi dbang du 'gro
32b7(mdo sde): bar ma gyur bag yod mdzod// mi dbang dar la bab pa mi rtag cir mi rung // srog kyang ri yi chu ltar myur 'gro cir mi rung // 'dus byas 'di zad glog sprin 'dra ste cir mi rung // rgyal po mkhas la
33a1(mdo sde): srid gsum 'dod la chags pa ngan// lha rnams kyis ni bdag la bag yod 'gyur gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' yul la chags pa min zhes bskul// 'jig rten
33a2(mdo sde): phan pa'i snying brtses sangs rgyas 'dir 'gyur bgyi// rgyal po bag med spyod la byang chub yod ma lags// rgyal po gang zhig 'dod pas na spyod sems 'khol ba// de ni bsod nams cung zad dga' zhing
33a3(mdo sde): mtho ris ldog/ 'tshe ba shin tu rgyas pa nam yang spyad mi bgyi// skon par bcug pa'i bya ltar ji ltar dbugs phyin gyur// khams rnams sprul dang 'dra zhing phung po gshed ma 'dra// zag dang bcas pa'i
33a4(mdo sde): sems ni don med grong stong mtshungs// rgyal po 'di na dug sdong me tog rgyas 'dra lus// chu bo rnams kyis bdas na bdag 'dir ji ltar dga'// rab tu gsal nas 'bar ba nam mkha' lta bu dang //
33a5(mdo sde): 'gro ba ngan zhugs 'gro ba 'di la bdag bltas nas// rgyal po de ring 'dir ni de dag dgrol ba dang // gnyen logs sad par bgyi dang nad pa gso ba dang // zug rngu rtsa nas gdon dang lam log bzlog
33a6(mdo sde): pa'i phyir// bdag gis zhi ba'i chos kyi glu ni myur du sbyar// stong chen du ni bcings pa rnam grol rab bsgrags nas// legs par bshad pas ring nas dbul ba tshim par bgyi// ngan 'gro'i lam du ltung
33a7(mdo sde): pa dag kyang gdon par bgyi// long ba migo sbyin srid pa'i 'khri shing bskam par bgyi// rnam grol mchog phyir shes rab 'od zer mar mer byas// de yis srid gsum gar la lta ba 'dra mthong 'gyur//
33b1(mdo sde): byams dang snying rje pha rol phyin pa sprin// sems can de 'brug lhag mthong grog gi 'phreng ba dang // byang chub yan lag bde bsil char rgyun dra ba yis// 'gro ba yun ring dus nas gdungs pa bsan
33b2(mdo sde): bar bgyi// rgyal po bdag ni de dran gyur nas 'dir mchis te// bdag ni 'dus byas kun la 'dod pa smon ma mchis// byang chub don gnyir sems can ched du 'dir spyad bgyi// gcig tu nges te
33b3(mdo sde): bdag ni srid la dga' ma mchis// rgyal po 'di na shes bzhin su zhig dgra khrod gnas// blo dang ldan pa su zhig 'jigs bcas lam du 'gro/ mig dang ldan pa su zhig 'di na g.yang sar lhung /
33b4(mdo sde): byang chub lam shes nas ni su zhig bag med 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad rgyun 'gro ba dag ni rgyun bzlog pa// rgyal po tshig tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi nus// lhun po rtse nas rgya mtsho'i nang du
33b5(mdo sde): mchod spro yi// bdag 'dir 'dod pa rnams kyis yid dga' de lta min// rgyal po dam pa rang gnyen thabs cig myur du bzhud// yul 'khor dga' ba thams cad 'jig rten kun la stsol// gang
33b6(mdo sde): dag bsam pa ji bzhin blangs nas mchi bar 'gyur// yab bdag bag med rgyal srid bye ba 'tshal ma lags// bud med tshogs kyi nang du gnas pas byang chub dang // grub bde ni bad+ma
33b7(mdo sde): med gnas ni thob mi nus// dgon par dgyes pas rgyal byang chub brnyes pas na// bdag ni ri dang nags khrod mchis te gnas par bgyi// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po gzhon nu bsod nam
34a1(mdo sde): kyi 'od zer khang bzangs kyi nang na 'dug bzhin du yid byung ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis bud med de dag dang lhan cig 'chag cing / de spyod lam gsum gyis gnas so//
34a2(mdo sde): gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'greng ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa ste/ rmugs pa dang gnyid yongs su spangs so// khang pa'i steng du song ste/ sa brgyad la gnas nas/ de nam gyi gung la bab
34a3(mdo sde): pa'i dus kyi tshe/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod cing / bar snang las 'gro ba dang / chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod cing 'gro ba thos so//
34a4(mdo sde): thos nas kyang yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas mchi ma zag cing / skyo ba skyes te thal mo sbyar nas/ lha rnams la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
34a5(mdo sde): lha rnams sdug bsngal bdag la thugs rje bskyed nas ni// gal te skyo mi mdzad nas cung zhig zhu bar bgyi// su yin yon tan brjod cing bde bar 'di nas bzhud// tshig 'di thos nas bdag 'dir
34a6(mdo sde): yid ni bde bar gyur// yul 'khor skyong de nas lha de dag gis/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod kyis sangs rgyas thos par ma gyur
34a7(mdo sde): tam// don grub blo zhes bya ste skyabs med rnams kyi bskyabs/ de bzhin spyod mkhas bsod nams shes rab yon tan mchog/ de yi dge 'dun khrag khrig stobs bcu bsam gtan pa// bsod
34b1(mdo sde): nams kyi 'od bar gyis smras pa/ bdag ni rnal ba 'tshal de sri gzugs ci 'dra// de yi kha dog ci 'drathams cad bka' stsol cig/ ji ltar spyad na sems can kun mgon gcig 'gyur ba// bAs
34b2(mdo sde): chub spyod pa ci 'dra bdag ni yongs su 'dri// de nas lha de dag gis/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ de yi gtsug tor ri yi rtse la gser mdzes pazhin/
34b3(mdo sde): dbu skra 'jam zhing mdzes la g.yas su 'khyil pa ste// de yi mdzod spu mkha' la nyi ma lam me lta// nor bu shel ltar rnam par dag cing g.yas su 'khyil// spyan dag bung ba'i tshogs dang ut+pal
34b4(mdo sde): sngon po 'dra// mi dbang seng ge'i 'gram parang byung ba yi smos// sems can lhan cig 'od zer bye ba mtha' yas 'gyed// stong gsum rgyas par 'gengs shing ngan 'gro rnams kyang skems// de yi/
34b5(mdo sde): tshems ni rab dkar kha bdud ltar drag/ bzhi bcu mnyam zhing thags bzang rmad byung legs par grub// rgyal ba dam pa mchog de'i tshems kyi mche ba bzhi// de yi ljags ni rab yangs rang gi
34b6(mdo sde): zhal gdong khengs// rgyal ba de yi gsung nI ri mchog 'dra ba'i don// shin tu tshim byed 'brel cing gya gyu med pa ste// tshangs sbyangs shin tu rigs pa sil snyan stong 'dra ba// yid gnyis 'joms
34b7(mdo sde): pa 'dod pa rnams ni tshim byed pa// rgyal ba'i gsung ni lha yi sgra skad tshim byed pa// yon tan sna tshogs tshang ba byang chub yan lag mthun// chos kyi 'phreng ba yid 'ong brgya stong rab brgyus pa// sil/
35a1(mdo sde): snyan dga' ba bslags pa lha klu nyams dga' ba// mi tsi ka la bing+ga khu byug ngur ba dang // rma bya dang bsgra snyan kun la ka'i sgra// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs mi ci dbyangs kyi
35a2(mdo sde): lag 'dra// ma 'khrul sdig med don rnams thams cad rtogs byed pa// rmad byung shel ltar 'jam zhing mkhas pa'i yid 'ong ba// sku la 'dul ba 'gyur ba sbyong ba dgar 'gyur ba// gzhan gyi spyo
35a3(mdo sde): dang mthun pa zhus na tshim byed pa// chos kyi dbang phyug de yi gsung gi yan lag 'di// ston pa'i mgul mdzes dung dang 'dra zhing dpung mgo zlum// dbyug po lta bur phyag ring de yi bdun yang mtho/
35a4(mdo sde): phyag mdzes sna tshogs sor mo rnams ni ring zhing zlum// rgyal ba de yi sku ni btso ma'i gser gyi mdog/ ba spu g.yas su 'khyil cing gyen du re re skyes// lte ba mtha' dag zab cing gsang sbubs rta yi
35a5(mdo sde): 'dra// rang byung e n+ya'i byin pa glang po'i sna 'dra'i bla// zhabs mthil mdzes par bris pa bkra shis 'khor lo'i mtshan// glang po'i dbang po'i 'gros stabs seng ge'i rtsal gyi stabs// khyu mchog
35a6(mdo sde): bsgyings pa'i skabs can dbang po'i mchod sdong rgyas// mkha' las me tog char babs me tog gdugs su gyur// gshegs pa'i rjes 'gro 'di dag de yi rmad byung chos// rgyal ba rnyed dang ma rnyed bde
35a7(mdo sde): dang sdug bsngal dang // grags dang ma grags de bzhin bstod dang smad pa yis// pad+ma chu ltar thams cad du yang gos pa med// mi yi seng ge de 'dra mtshungs pa'i sems can med// yul 'khor skyo
35b1(mdo sde): de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa thos shing / chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba
35b2(mdo sde): dang yid bde ba skyes par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ci 'dra ba dang / de'i dge 'dun phun sum
35b3(mdo sde): tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / des mngon sum du byas pa'i chos ni 'dra ba dang / de'i slob ma phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / ji ltar 'khor yang ba dang phrad pa dang / byas pa mi bzo ba dang / ji ltar 'khor ba
35b4(mdo sde): na byis pa so so'i skye bo dag byas pa mi gzo ba dang / ji ltar khyim gyi gnas nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa dag nyes pa mang ba dang / ji ltar mkhas pa rnams kyis bag med pa spangs pa dang /
35b5(mdo sde): ji ltar ma rig pa'i mun gnag rmongs pa dang / ji ltar 'du byed rnams tshogs par dka' ba dang / ji ltar sems gdul dka' ba dang / ji ltar ming dang gzugs zab pa dang / ji ltar skye mched drug
35b6(mdo sde): dbugs 'byin pa med pa dang / ji ltar reg pa yongs su ma shes te/ sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa dang / ji ltar tshor ba nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar sred pa'i 'ching ba dam pa dang / ji ltar
35b7(mdo sde): bar len pa las 'byung bar dka' ba dang / ji ltar srid pa'i sred pa 'phags pa ma yin pa dang / ji ltar srid pa yod na/ skye ba rgyun gcad dka' ba dang / ji ltar rga ba rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa dang /
36a1(mdo sde): ji ltar nad kyis rnam par 'jig par byed pa dang / ji ltar 'chi ba rjes su mi srun pa dang / ji ltar 'jug pa'i ro bro ba rung ba dang / ji ltar srid pa mngon par 'grub pa nyes dmigs mang
36a2(mdo sde): ba dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa nyams dga' ba ltar 'di mi nus te/ 'dod pa'i khol po nyon mongs pas rmongs pa/ sems tha ba can/ bag med pa la dga' ba/ byis pa'i nang na 'dug
36a3(mdo sde): pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'khor ba la chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ skye bo ma rungs pa'i nang na 'dug pas ni/ bde 'gro'i lam yang rnam par sbyang bar mi nus na/ bla na med pa
36a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par lta ga la 'gyur snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag sgo nas byung na ni/ nye du'i tshogs par chad byas su 'ong gis/ bdag
36a5(mdo sde): khang steng 'di nas thur du mchong ngo snyam mo// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de ga la ba de logs su phyogs te/ khang pa de na
36a6(mdo sde): mchongs nas tshig 'di skad du/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de thams cad mkhyen cing / thams cad gzigs she na/ de bzhin gshegs bde bdag la dgongs su gsol zhes kyang smras so// yul
36a7(mdo sde): 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blos phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste 'od phyung nas/ 'od des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer
36b1(mdo sde): la reg go// 'od de las kyang pad+ma'adab ma brgya stong pa shing rta'i 'bang lo tsam byung bar gyur to// pad+ma de las kyang 'od zer brgya stong byung ste/ snang ba chen por gyur nas/ snang ba des rgyal bu gnon/
36b2(mdo sde): nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khyab par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer pad+ma de la 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
36b3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes lan gsum ched du brjod do// yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don
36b4(mdo sde): grub blo des 'od de brdud pa dang / gzhon nu de sdong po bcad pa sgyel ba bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du babs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan brgya stong du phyug 'tshal to// yul
36b5(mdo sde): 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag ni ring nas na ste ring nas 'dod// tshegs
36b6(mdo sde): ches sman pa'i rgyal po khyod rnyed do// ji ltar bde gshegs bstan la gnas nas ni// bdag gis thob 'gyur mgon po bstan du gsol// 'dren pa bdag gis bag mchis thos pa ni// mtshan mo
36b7(mdo sde): bar snang lha las thos lags te// thos nas skyo ste bdag ni 'dir mchis na// mi rnams bag mchis 'gyur ba ji lta bu// lam nyams pa la de ring ston gyur cig/ ldongs par gyur pa'i mig tu ngar
37a1(mdo sde): gyur cig/ dad pa'i 'byung gnas gso mdzad thugs rje ldan// g.yangs chen po 'di las bdag phyung zhig/ dbul po gyur pa dag ni bsu bar mdzod// mgon po bcings
37a2(mdo sde): pa bdag ni deng sgrol mdzod// som nyi bcas pa'i yid gnyis bcad du gsol// byang chub lam la spyod pa bdag lung ston// chus khyer bdag la 'gram ni bstan du gsol// mun pa bdag la sgron me
37a3(mdo sde): mdzad du gsol// rmar gyur bdag la rma med mdzad du gsol// sman pa'i rgyal po bdag gi zug rngu phyung // khyod kyis ngan 'gro dag las bdag thar mdzod// srid par dmigs pa 'dzin pa gcad du
37a4(mdo sde): gsol// yan lag brgyad pa'i lam gyi lam chen gyis// mya ngan chu chen pha rol bsgral du gsol// srog ni zad pa'i chos can tshe yang thung // dge bar chad mang po 'byung ba ste// bsod nams rnam
37a5(mdo sde): smin ring por mi thogs 'grub// bdag gis dal ba gdod rnyed cig nges gsungs// byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bag mchis 'gyur// ji ltar byang chub spyod pa mchog spyad na// 'gro ba srid pa'i
37a6(mdo sde): 'ching las thar 'gyur ba// 'jig rten mgon po de dag bdag lung ston// yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blos/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi lhag pa'i bas
37a7(mdo sde): pa mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya cher yang dag par bstan to// rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis/ de thos nas rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob bo// mngon
37b1(mdo sde): par shes pa lnga yang thob ste/ de nam mkha' la gnas nas me tog rnams mngon par sprul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la gtor/ mngon par gtor to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsong
37b2(mdo sde): rnams kyi 'od zer bar snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/ mtshan mchog ldan pa dri meng tha ba'i zhal// gser mngos
37b3(mdo sde): 'dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdul bral khyod 'dra srid pa gsum ma mchis// mnyam med mkhyen can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i dbu skra 'jam mdzes snum zhing bzang // khyod kyi gtsug tor
37b4(mdo sde): 'di ni ri rgyal bzhin// gtsug tor mi mthong khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis// thub pa khyod kyi smin mtshams mdzod spu mdzes// kun da zla ba khwa bdud ltar dkar// thugs rje gang gis 'gro ba 'di gzigs pa/
37b5(mdo sde): spyan mchog bzang po ut+pal sngon po 'dra// rgyal ba dri med spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// ljags yangs srab la zangs kyi mdog 'dra ba// de yis rang gi zhal gyi gdong yang khebs// chos gsung bas ni 'gro ba
37b6(mdo sde): 'dul bar bgyid// 'jam snum gsung ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// tshems bzang shin tu brtan pa rdo rje 'dra// bcu dang sum cu snyoms shing thags bzang ba// 'dzum pa mdzad nas 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid/
37b7(mdo sde): bden gtam snyan pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba khyod kyi gzugs dang mtshungs ma mchis// 'od kyis zhing brgya dag kyang snang bar bgyid// 'jig rten na ni tshangs dbang skyong de dag/ bcom ldan khyod kyi
38a1(mdo sde): 'od kyis zil du rlag/ e n+ya'i byin pa mnyam med bcom ldan 'das// glang po'i rgyal po rma bya seng ge'i stabs// bcom ldan gnya' shing gang du gzigs shing gshegs// sa dang /
38a2(mdo sde): ri dang dam pa g.yo bar mdzad// bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan gyis rgyas pa ste// khyod kyi pags pa 'jam zhing gser mdog 'dra// 'gro ba gzugs 'di blta bas ngoms mi 'gyur// khyod ni mtshungs pa
38a3(mdo sde): ma mchis gzugs dang ldan// khyod sngon bskal pa brgyar ni bka' thub spyad// khyod gtong dul dang sbyin pa kun la dgyes// sems can kun la thugs rje byams thugs ldan// mchog tu thugs rje can la
38a4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo// khyod ni sbyin dang tshul khrims rtag tu dgyes// khyod ni bzod dang brtson 'grus dgyes rab brtan// khyod ni bsam gtan shes rab 'od gzi mnga'// mtshungs med ye shes mnga' la phyag
38a5(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// khyod ni smra ba ngan pa'i tshogs can 'jom// khyod ni seng ge lta bur 'khor du sgrogs// khyod ni sman pa'i rgyal po dri gsum sel// mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// thub pa sku gsung
38a6(mdo sde): thugs ni rnam par dag/ pad+ma chu ltar srid pa gsum mi gos// khyod ni tshangs dbyangs ka la bing+ga'i skad// srid gsum pha rol gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyis 'gro 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang // gar
38a7(mdo sde): la lha dang rmi lam 'dra ba dang // bdag med sems can med cing srog 'gro med// chos rnams smig rgyu chu zla 'dra bar mkhyen// stong pa zhi pa skye ba med pa'i tshul// ma shes pas na 'gro ba 'khyam 'gyur/
38b1(mdo sde): thugs rje thabs tshul rigs pa brgya dag gis// de dag rnams ni 'dzud par mdzad pa lags// 'dod chags la sogs nang mang brgya dag gis// skrag par gyur pa'i 'gro la rtag gzigs te// bde/
38b2(mdo sde): gshegs sems can brgya dag yongs 'grel cing // zla med sman pa lta bu rnam par rgyu// skye dang rga dang 'chi dang mya ngan no// sdug dang bral dang smre sngags 'don pa brgyas// rtag tun pa'i 'gro ba
38b3(mdo sde): gzigs nas ni// thub pa thugs rjes yongs su 'grel cing rgyu// dud 'gro yi dgas dmyal ba'i 'gro rnams su// 'gro kuni shing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin du 'khor// glen pa dmigs bu ma mchis
38b4(mdo sde): mgon ma mchis// dral lam gyi dam pa ston pa mdzad// gtso bo mtshungs pa med pas gang bstan pa// 'phags lam de nyid gang dag sngon chad kyis// chos kyi dbang phyug 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/
38b5(mdo sde): rgyal ba de dag rnams kyis rab tu gsungs// 'jam zhing mnyen la ying du 'ong ba'i mchog/ tshangs las lhag par mchog tu dga' bgyid pa// dri za mi ci lha yi bu mo mchog/ sgra de zil gyis mnan
38b6(mdo sde): nas gdung ba mdzad// bden dang drang ba mi bzad thabs tshul gyis// yongs spyang yon tan mtha' yas ldan pa'i gsung // de thos sems can khrag khrig phrag brgya dag/ theg pa gsum gyis zhi bar
38b7(mdo sde): mchi bar bgyid// khyod la mchod pas lha yi bde ba ni// rnam pa mang dang de bzhin mi yis thob// mi yi bdag po 'gro la phan bgyid pa// phyug cing nor che 'byor pa chen por gyur// mtshungs med khyod
39a1(mdo sde): la dad pa skyed pa ni// gling bzhi'i bdag po 'khor los sgyur ba'i mchog/ 'gro la dge ba bcu po kun 'byed pa// rin chen rab bzang bdun ldan thob par 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod/
39a2(mdo sde): la mchod pa bgyis pas ni// tshangs pa brgya byin 'jig rten bdag po dang // yongs su dga' ldan lha yi bdag po dag/ gzhan 'phrul pa dang 'thab bral rab dgar 'gyur// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnams
39a3(mdo sde): mang sel mdzad pa// mnyam med khyod la mchod dang mthong ba dang // thos pa'ang de ltar 'bras bu mchis lags te// gnas mchog rga shi med pa thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan lam la mkhas shing lam ma/
39a4(mdo sde): pa// 'jig rten 'di ni ngan pa'i lam las bzlog/ bcom ldan 'gro ba dag ni 'phags pa'i lam// bde bzhi pa rdul dang bral la 'god// bsod nams gter khyod bsod nams don gnyer ba'i// bsod
39a5(mdo sde): nams bgyi ba rtag tu mi bas te// byang chub dam pa ma thob bar du ni// bskal pa bye ba mang por bas mi 'gyur// gzhan 'phrul 'dra ba rtag tu dga' bgyid pa// yongs su dag cing mdzes pa 'thob par
39a6(mdo sde): 'gyur// dam pa'i zhing du lus dang ngag yid kyis// sems can dag ni rnam par dag par 'gyur// rgyal ba mchod pa'i mi yis 'di la sogs// yon tan rnam pa dum 'thob par 'gyur// mtho ris thar pa mi
39a7(mdo sde): mi yide pa dang // 'gro bkun gyi bsod nams gter thob 'gyur// khyod kyi brjod dang grags pa rgya chen po// phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing mang brgyar yang mchis// rgyal ba khyod kyi bsngags pa'i 'phreng ni/
39b1(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs rnams 'khor du rtag par sgrogs// rims nang bral zhing 'gro bathar mdzad pa// mthong na dga' ba thugs rje mchog ldan pa// bcom ldan dbang po zhi ba zhing gyes pa// mi mchog dam pa khyod/
39b2(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis rgyal ba khyod kyi gsung thos nas// mngon par shes pa lnga thob mkhas la gnas// dpa' bo bde gshegs mtshungs par bdag 'gyur te// dri med chos ni 'grol rnam par duH/
39b3(mdo sde): lha dang mi dang klus mchod bde bar gshegs// yon tan kun gyi mthar phyin deng bston pas// bsod nams rgya chen gang bsgrubs gyur pa 'dis// 'gro ba sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par shog/ yul 'khor
39b4(mdo sde): skyong de nas mtshan mo de'i nam nangs pa dang // rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzhon nu'i bud med kyi 'khor ngu ba'i sgra thos so// thos nas kyang myur ba myur bar rings pa'i gzugs kyis grong khyer dga' mchog gal
39b5(mdo sde): ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so// khyed ci'i phyir ngu/ de dag gis smras pa/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer mi gda' ba'i slad du'o// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gnon/
39b6(mdo sde): nu'i phyir/ shing bcad pa sgyel ba ltar sa la 'gyel te/ langs nas ngu zhing grong khyer der lan stong du yongs su btsal to// yul 'khor skyong de nas grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa des/ rgyal po 'od zer ldan la
39b7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu ni de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ shar phyogs logs su song ngo // yul
40a1(mdo sde): 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhon nu btsal ba'i phyir/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu shar gyi phyogs chag
40a2(mdo sde): la ba der song ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs
40a3(mdo sde): gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/ srid gsum khyod mtshungs ma mchis lhag pa ga la
40a4(mdo sde): mchis// sems can dam pa lha dbang lha min rgyal pos bkur// skye bo khyod kyi gzugs la blta bas ngoms mi 'gyur// yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba khyod sku sum cu
40a5(mdo sde): rtsa gnyis mtshan rab dag/ lhun po rin chen mchog gis spos ltar yongs su dag/ rgyal ba sdug cing 'jam pa gser gyi kha dog 'dra// blta sdug gzugs mnga' thub pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo//
40a6(mdo sde): bskal pa bye brgya bsam gyis mi khyab brtul zhugs spyad// bskal pa bye ba brgya mang sangs rgyas bsti stang mdzad// sngon chad mchod sbyin brgya phrag bsam gyis mi khyab mdzad// des na khyod sku bzang
40a7(mdo sde): zhing shin tu mdzes pa lags// sbyin dang tshul khrims ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang // bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan thabs kyis khyod gzugs sbyangs// khyod kyi spyan sngar brgya byin tshangs
40b1(mdo sde): 'od gsal ma lags// chu shel nor bu glog gi 'od kyang mdzes ma lags// 'gro ba'i don du yid du mchi ba'i gzugs kyang ston// chu zla 'dra zhing sgyum 'dra bar gda' ba lags// rang gi phyogs nas/
40b2(mdo sde): kun tu rgyal ba'i sku yang gda'i// bde gshegs rnams kyi sku yi tshad ni gda'am lags// khyod ni dga' ldan 'ga' zhig na yang bzhugs par gda'i// 'chi 'pho mdzad cing rab dkar glang por gyur nas/
40b3(mdo sde): ni// dpa' bo yum gyi lhums su gshegs par gda' bar mdzad// thub chen nam mkha' lta bur thams cad rjes su zhugs// bcom ldan phyogs 'gar bltam par ston pa'ang mdzad pa ste// sa 'ga'
40b4(mdo sde): drag tu gom pa bdun 'dir gda' ba mdzad// nga ni lha mir bcas 'gro nang gtso shin tu lha// 'gro ba sdug bsngal mtsho las gdon ces gsung yang byung // thub khyod chos gang la yang the tsom mi mnga' yang /
40b5(mdo sde): yi ge shes pa slob ltar 'jig rten dag na gda'// bsam gtan ting 'dzin spyod yul zhi ba brnyes gyur kyang // kha cig tu ni bud med rang na bzhugs par dga'// yab dang yum dang sras dang bud med rnams
40b6(mdo sde): kyang btang // gnyen rnams mya ngan non te rnam par brgyal zhing du// sems can dam pa bye ba brgya lhas yongs bskor nas// nags gnas gcig po 'byung bar gda' ba'ang mdzad// khyod ni bdud pa ni
40b7(mdo sde): pham par mdzad nas yun ring yang // zhing na bdud 'dul bar yang gda' ba ston par mdzad// sngon chad 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab yongs bskor kyang // khyod ni thugs rjes 'khor lo bskor bar gda' ba
41a1(mdo sde): mdzad// rtag tu rtag lta 'du shes ldan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas// mya ngan bzla zhes 'khor gyi nang du rig tu gsungs// rtag tu 'khor bar gda' ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni// khyod
41a2(mdo sde): ni zhi ba bsil gyur mya ngan 'das pa gsung // khyod kyi bsod nams ye shes shes rab thabs mtshungs med// thub pa khyod sku 'od kyis zhing mang rgyas par 'gengs// phyogs rnams dag na 'dren pa khyod kyi
41a3(mdo sde): bsngags pa gsung // kun tu spyod yul thub pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid ma lus brnyes par gyur la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can kun gyi bgyi bar sgyu ma ltar gda' yang // thub pa khyod ni
41a4(mdo sde): gang du bzhud pa'am byon ma lags// sgyu ma'i chos tshul gnas la mngon par phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i don du gang gis byang chub mchog thob pa// lam mchog ma yi dpa' bo khyod legs gsung /
41a5(mdo sde): bdag gis chos nyid 'di ni myur du sangs rgyas nas// mi dpa' 'gro ba'i don du chos nyid bshad par bgyi// mi yi dpa' bo thub pa kun mkhyen rims bral ba// srid gsum mtshungs pa ma mchis
41a6(mdo sde): lhag pa ga la zhig/ bdag gis 'dir bstod bsod nams mtha' yas gang bsgrubs des/ 'jig rten byang chub bla med zhi mchog thob par shog/ yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
41a7(mdo sde): don grub blo des rgyal po 'od zer ldan de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ ci nas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldeg par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan to//
41b1(mdo sde): yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub bro de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi grong
41b2(mdo sde): du gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo //
41b3(mdo sde): yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis/ pha ma de gnyis dang / grogs de dag dang / bud med de dag la smras pa/ khyed cag thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig/
41b4(mdo sde): ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te/ ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul du rung bar gyis shig/ de dag gis sgra skad gcig tu rjes su yi rang ngo // yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gno//
41b5(mdo sde): nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te/ ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo// ro bro ba bkod pa lnga brgya pa'i zhal zas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi
41b6(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la gsol to// dge slong de dag thams cad kyi phyir/ rin po che sna bdun gyis g.yogs pa'i gtsug lag khang nor bu'i 'chags bshams pa/ steng du rin po che'i dra ba'i dra bres/
41b7(mdo sde): pagayas g.yon du me tog gi shing ljon pa legs pa yongs su grub par byas pa/ me tog pad+ma dkar po'i rdzing gis mdzes par byas pa/ ras bcos bu mu gnyis dri ma med pa/ brgya stong bting ba'i mal/
42a1(mdo sde): bshams pa/ dge slong re re la gos kha na ma tho ba med pa gang byin pa de phyi nyin mi sbyin gyi/ nyin gcig bzhin gos gzhan dang gzhan sbyin par 'gyur ba byas so// de lo bye ba phrag
42a2(mdo sde): gsum gyi bar du rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur/ bdag la dga' ba ma byas/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i phyir/ gzhan yid la ma byas so// bar skabs der 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang
42a3(mdo sde): gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par ma gyur/ rgyal srid la sred par ma gyur te/ lus dang srog la yang mi bltan/ dngos po gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/
42a4(mdo sde): bar skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs pa de thams cad kun tu bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la de lan gnyis su ma zhus so// bar skabs der khrus ma byas/ 'bru mur gyis lus ma
42a5(mdo sde): bskus/ rkang pa ma bskus ngal ba'i 'du shes ma bskyed de/ zan za ba dang / bshang gci byed pa ma gtogs par nam yang 'dug par ma gyur to// gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan
42a6(mdo sde): las 'das pa de'i tshe/ tsan dan dmar po'i zhugs la bzhin pa byas so// gang du de bzhin gshegs pa de zhugs la bzhen pa'i sa phyogs de nyid du/ 'dzam bu gling thams cad pa'i me tog thams cad dang /
42a7(mdo sde): 'phreng ba thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / rol mo'o sgra thams cad kyis lo brgya stong du ring bsrel la mchod pa byas par gyur pa nas/ rgyu dang rkyen thams cad bsogs te/ phyis mchod rten bye
42b1(mdo sde): brag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du byas so// mchod rten de dag la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po che'i dra bas g.yogs so// mu tig gi dra ba'i bla re dag zes so// mchod rten re re la yang rin po sna bdun gyi
42b2(mdo sde): gdugs lnga brgya lnga brgya phul lo// mchod rten thams cad la sil snyan brgya stong phul lo// 'dzam bu gling khor yug tu me tog gi shing ljon pa bskur to// mchod rten re re la yang mar me'i rdza bo brgya stong
42b3(mdo sde): nas mar me bus so// mar me'i rdza bo re re nas kyang spos kyi 'bru mar drug cu rtsa bzhi pa stong gi mar me bus so// spos dang / 'phreng ba dang byug pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod par byas so// tshul de
42b4(mdo sde): lta bus lo bye ba'i bar du mchod pa byas te/ byis rab tu byung ngo // de rab tu byung nas/ chos gos gsum par gyur cing / rtag tu bsod snyoms spyod pa dang / rtag tu cog pu pa ste/ nam yang blos ma
42b5(mdo sde): phab bo// nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to// de zang zing med pa'i sems kyis lo bye ba phrag bzhi'i bar du chos kyi sbyin pa byin te/ des gzhan la tha na legs so zhes bya ba tsam la
42b6(mdo sde): yang re bar ma gyur na/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de chos nyan pa 'am/ chos bshad pas kyang ngal bar ma gyur to// de la lha rnams kyang bsnyen bkur byed do// yul gyi mi thams/
42b7(mdo sde): cad dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / nang mi thams cad dang / grogs po thams cad kyang de'i rjes su bslabs te rab tu byung ngo // yul 'khor skyong de nas gnas gtsang mi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams 'di
43a1(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi rjes su slob cing / yul gyi mi thams cad rab tu byung gis/ bdag cag gis de la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byas na/ dkon
43a2(mdo sde): mchog gsum la rim gro byas par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / dam pa'i chos lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du gnas te/ dge slong bsod nams
43a3(mdo sde): kyi 'od zer gyis thams cad yongs su bzung ngo // tshul 'di lta bus sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi la rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byas so// yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na
43a4(mdo sde): rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod de ltar dogs shing the tsom za 'am/ yid gnyis su gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
43a5(mdo sde): pa 'od dpag med de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa
43a6(mdo sde): snyam du khyod de ltar dogs shing the tsom za 'am/ yid gnyis su gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer ces bya ba
43a7(mdo sde): gyur to// grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
43b1(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'dod pas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas sgrub pa dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa yongs su spangs pa dang / bag yod pa'i spyod pas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod
43b2(mdo sde): nams kyi 'od zer de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// ngas bya dka' ba mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo// de lta bas na de dag mi brtson pa dang / rnyed pa dang /
43b3(mdo sde): bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa lhur yin pa dang / shes kyi khel chags pa dang / nga rgyal gyis bcom pa dang / 'dod pa'i rgyus nyon mongs pa dag sha zang ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyus bstan pa las ring
43b4(mdo sde): du gyur pa dang / dge sbyong sun par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngamu rgod dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems mi drang ba dang / lhas lta ba dang / khas 'che ba nor ba dang / rang gis dam bcas pa la
43b5(mdo sde): nyams pa dang / gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i ched kyi sman dang / yo byad kyi mtshan ma la chags pa dang / ngo tsha mi shes pa dang / khrel med pa dang / tshogs nyams pa dang / dam pa'i chos
43b6(mdo sde): ma yin pa la 'jug pa dang / spyod yul dang bral ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las ring du gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang bral ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang bral bar
43b7(mdo sde): gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de lta bas na/ rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos nas sdig pa'i bshes gnyen rigs pa med pa/ rnyed pa don du gnyer ba dang / mi bsten pa shes par bya'o// de nas bcom
44a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// stobs bcu mnga' ba'i spyod pa dpag med na// snying ni 'thob dang shes kyi khe la song // byang chub yon tan
44a2(mdo sde): brgyas khebs bor nas ni// de dag 'thob phyir gzhan gyi khyim la dga'// khwa 'dra sdang ba khrel dang mos blo bral// shes kyi khe phyir bdud kyi dbang du song // nyon mongs rag lus srid pa'i 'gro bar
44a3(mdo sde): gzhol// bdag 'dir yon tan ldan zhes de skad smra// lus ni dgon na dran pa grong khyer du// 'thob phyir de dag rnam par rtog pas spyod// gnam dang sa ltar thar las ring ba ste// de 'dra'i de dag sprul
44a4(mdo sde): ltar ring du spang // de dag sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin du// dge 'dun yon tan brgyas gang dga' ma yin// mtho ris bor nas ngan pa'i lam du song // sdug pas 'phongs nas srid pa'i 'gro bar
44a5(mdo sde): 'khyams khang yi spyod pa nye bar bstan pa 'di thos nas// yang dag lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgrub pas 'di la sbyor// bskal pa bye ba mang pos rnyed dka' ngal rnyed kyis// de lta ji skad bstan pa'i chos
44a6(mdo sde): nyid 'dir brtson gyis// gang zhig theg mchog byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod // de yos rgyal po de yi yon tan dran par bya// bsams te yang dag ji bzhin tshul bzhin gan par / de nas bde gshegs
44a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi byang chub chags med 'grub// yon tan 'di dag rtogs pas 'phags pa'i rigs la bsten// rang gis 'dir ni kun tu shes pa bskyed par bya// bstan pa yon tan snying po 'di 'dra ma spangs
44b1(mdo sde): shig byis pa lta bur 'gro ba lngar ni 'khyams pa ste// 'dir ni ri dang dgon pa phug tu gnas par bya// der gnas nas ni bdag mi bsnyems shing gzhan mi spong // sngon chad sangs rgyas bye ba
44b2(mdo sde): phrag brgya mnyes ma byas// rjes su dran nas rtag par rgyun du bdag la spyod// lus dang srog la sred pa ma chags spang bar bya// gus pa drag po bskyed nas chos la brtson par gyis// nga yis
44b3(mdo sde): mdo 'dir bsgrub pa bshad pa 'di gnas nas// de dag rnams kyis phyi nas byang chub rnyed mi dga'// gang dag rgyal ba'i theg pa 'di la dga' brtson pa// thos nas phyir yid ni 'jug par bya ba'i
44b4(mdo sde): rigs// de lta bas na bstan la mos pa bskyed par bya// rnam par rgyu ba'i tshe na phyis 'gyod gyur ta re// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la spyod pa// yang gang
44b5(mdo sde): zhig bdag 'di bslab po// bdag sdom pa 'di la gnas par bya'o snyam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nan tan gyis bsgrub na/ bsod nams kyi phung po de bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i gnan/
44b6(mdo sde): brgya'i char yang nyer bar mi 'gro ste/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bcom
44b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sngon sems ma bskyed pa'i lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu khrag khrig phrag sum cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang /
45a1(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// dge slong bdun stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems
45a2(mdo sde): rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags 'di ji ltar gzung
45a3(mdo sde): par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong de lta bas na/ khyod kyis chos kyis rnam grangs/
45a4(mdo sde): 'di dam bcas pa don yod pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ skyes bu dam pa rnam par rol pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par nges pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ don yongs su rdzog
45a5(mdo sde): pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/
45a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang
45a7(mdo sde): dA na shI la dang / mu ne bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ sho lo ka stong ste/ bam po gsum dang /
45b1(mdo sde): shu lo kra bar+N+Na/ @/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA pa ri nirbA Na ma hA yAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen
45b2(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po drang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
45b3(mdo sde): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer ku shi na/ chu klung gser ldan gyi 'gram gyad kyi nye 'khor shing sA la zung gi tshal na bzhugs te/ de na bcom ldan 'das dge slong bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad cus
45b4(mdo sde): bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ dpyid zla tha chung nya'i nang par yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus dang nye bar gyur pa na/ sems can thams cad kyi rang rang gi yul gyi skad du/ shin tu zur phyin par don brda
45b5(mdo sde): spyod pa'i tshig rnams kyis srid pa'i rtse mo man chad go bar mdzad de/ deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad la thugs brtse ba can/ 'jig
45b6(mdo sde): rten thams cad skyob pa/ sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin dang 'dra bar gzigs pa/ skyabs chen po'i gnas dang gzhi por gyur pa/ thub pa chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/
45b7(mdo sde): zhes bka' stsal to// sems can thams cad kyi zhu ba lung bstan pa tha ma la de lta bu'i gsung rnams byung bar gyur to// gzhan yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi zhal nas 'od zer sna tshogs
46a1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / shel gyi kha dog dang / rdo'i snying po'i kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi
46a2(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can de dag
46a3(mdo sde): dag la phog nas/ de'i mod la nyon mongs pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral te/ nyes sdig thams cad kyi rgyun chad par gyur to// de nas mya ngan chen pos non te/ tshig mthun par kye mkhebs so khebs
46a4(mdo sde): so zhes kyang 'dzer to// kyi hud ces kyang skad cher 'bod cing / lag pa brkyang bas kyang mgo bo la rdob par byed de/ 'dar zhing shin tu ngu'o// de'i tshe sa chen po nags tshul dang bcas/ rI dang bcas
46a5(mdo sde): pa rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa yang rab tu g.yos te/ sems can de dag kyang gcig la gcig 'dzin cing / 'di skad du/ grogs po dag rings/ grogs po dag rings/ gyad yul gyi grong khyer
46a6(mdo sde): ku shir 'dod 'dong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs pa las bathog la/ bsgrim mi dgos par bskul pa 'am/ bskul ba las
46a7(mdo sde): lhag par yang bzhugs par gsol ba gdab bo zhes 'dzer to// gcig la gcig 'jus nas/ 'di skad du kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro// kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro// kye ma
46b1(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni zad do// las mi bzang par ni byung ngo // tshe dang ldan pa dag myur cig/ tshe dang ldan pa dag myur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
46b2(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang gi lung tsam 'di la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro// kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro// de
46b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs na/ bdag cag mgon med pa dang / rtsa lag med pa dang / 'phongs par ji ltar mi 'gyur zhing / bdag cag gi the tsom dang / som nyi ci dang ci yod pa de dang de dag zhu bar
46b4(mdo sde): bya'o zhes kyang 'dzer to// nyan thos chen po 'di dag kyang de na 'khod de/ 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan ka t+ya ya na chen po dang / gnas brtan ba ku la dang / gnas brtan nye dga' bo dang / de dag la sogs
46b5(mdo sde): pa gzhan dag kyang de na 'khod de/ de dag la 'od zer gyis bog nas/ 'dar rab tu 'dar / dam dam rab tu dam dam/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ brtags rab tu brtags/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur
46b6(mdo sde): 'khams rab tu 'khams/ rmugs rab tu rmugs/ rings rab tu rings te/ de la sogs pa dag tu gyur nas chas so// de'i tshe dge slong sa ya phrag brgyad so shing bos nas phyir byung ste/ gnas brtan de
46b7(mdo sde): dag la 'od zer gyi snang ba de phog nas/ shin tu rings par kha gdong bkrus te/ gcig la gcig 'jus so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras de dag thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ dbang thong ba/
47a1(mdo sde): bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ cang shes pa/ gtso bo chen po/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis rang gi don thob pa/ tsan dan chen po lta bu'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan pa/ seng ge chen
47a2(mdo sde): po lta bu'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de la sogs pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa de dag thams cad snga dro nyi ma 'char kar yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu rgyu skyegs kyi shing gi me tog
47a3(mdo sde): ltar rtsa dmar ba ni langs/ mig ni mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir dang /
47a4(mdo sde): gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba la der
47a5(mdo sde): dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de
47a6(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe ko ta ka'i bu mo rab bzang ma la sogs pa dge slong ma bye ba 'bum phrag drug thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ dbang thob pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa
47a7(mdo sde): byas pa/ khur bor ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ gtso bo chen mo/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis rang gi don thob pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ go ta ka'i bu mo dge slong ma rab bzang ma dang / dge slong ma nye dga'
47b1(mdo sde): mo dang / dge slong ma rgya mtsho blo gros dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong ma bye ba 'bum phrag drug snga dro nyi ma 'char kar yan lag tham cad kyi ba spu rgyu skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni langs/ mig
47b2(mdo sde): ni mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du/
47b3(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/
47b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu
47b5(mdo sde): 'khod do// 'khor de na dge slong ma 'khod pa rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa' mi mchog bcu thob pa sha stag ste/ gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir bud med kyi gzugs dang / bud med kyi dbyibs dang /
47b6(mdo sde): sha dang / khrag dang / rgyus pa mang po dang / rus pa'i lus 'chang ba/ rtag tu tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi cho 'phrul chen po'i don byed nus pa sha stag
47b7(mdo sde): gogazhan yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos byin la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang mi mchog sa bcu thob pa/ thabs kyi lus 'chang ba sha
48a1(mdo sde): stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya mtshos byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa dang / de dag la sogs pa/
48a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang theg pa chen po thos par 'dod pa/ thos pa chen po la zhugs pa/ theg pa chen pos bkres pa/ theg pa chen po la sred pa/ theg pa chen po la
48a3(mdo sde): ser sna med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mthun par byed nus pa sha stag dang / bdag cag brgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o snyam ste/ sngon gyi bskal pa bye ba snyed du tshul khrims kyi bgrod pa'i
48a4(mdo sde): dam bca' ba legs par blangs pa 'dzin pa'i spyad pa spyod pa sha stag dang / de bzhin du bdag cag grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o snyam pa dang / de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad
48a5(mdo sde): par bya'o snyam pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam pa dang / go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o snyam du sems pa sha stag dang / de bzhin du yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa dang / bu gcig
48a6(mdo sde): pa la bya ba bzhin du/ sems can thams cad la snyoms par lta ba sha stag ste/ de dag thams cad snga dro nyi ma 'char kar yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba
48a7(mdo sde): ni langs/ mig ni mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar
48b1(mdo sde): bya ba'i dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste lpags/
48b2(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar babatu dang phyogs gcig
48b3(mdo sde): tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs shing / tshul khrims dang / cho ga dang / yon tan dang ldan pa'i dge bsnyen 'od dri ma med par grangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ dge bsnyen
48b4(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang zung dang zung du shes par 'dod pa sha stag ste/ sdug bsngal ba dang / bde ba dang / rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / bdag yod pa dang / bdag
48b5(mdo sde): med pa dang / stong pa dang / stong pa ma yin pa dang / de kho na dang / de kho na ma yin pa dang / skyabs dang / skyabs ma yin pa dang / sems can dang / sems can med pa dang / brtan pa dang /
48b6(mdo sde): brtan pa ma yin pa dang / zhi ba dang / zhi ba ma yin pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / ther zug dang / ther zug ma yin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / yongs su mya
48b7(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang / khyad par du 'phags pa shes par 'dod pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen 'od dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang //
49a1(mdo sde): dge bsnyen rab sbyin la sogs pa/ dge bsnyen theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la/ thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o snyam du dam bcas shing / tshul khrims blang /
49a2(mdo sde): pa/ theg pa chen pos skom la ngoms nas kyang / gzhan skom pa dag ngoms par bya'o snyam dung ma bcas pa/ theg pa chen po la sred pa// theg pa chen po la ser sna med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang
49a3(mdo sde): mthun par byed nus pa sha stag dang / bdag cag brgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o// bdag cag grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o//
49a4(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du slob par 'dod pa/ go cha chen po bgos pa/ bslab pa rnams la sems gus pa dang / de bzhin du yon tan grangs med pa dang ldan pa/ bu gcig pa la bya ba
49a5(mdo sde): bzhin du/ sems can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa shra stag ste/ de dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la zhen pa'i phyir/ re res kyang tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang /
49a6(mdo sde): thang shing gi mchog dang / tsan dan sa mchog pa'i bud shing rnams dang / yam sreg shing dri bsung dang ldan pa/ yon tan lnga stong lnga stong khyer te 'ongs so// de la yam sreg shing sA re zhing yang
49a7(mdo sde): gser gyi skud pa rin po che sna bdun rigs bdun dang ldan pas spras pa dkris pas ka ri mo la bris pa kho na bzhin du 'dug pa/ rang bzhin gyis gzhon sha can legs par bcos pa sha stag ste/
49b1(mdo sde): sna zhing yang 'od nam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i phung po chen po/ mdog sngo ba dang / bar bar kha cig tu mdag dkar/ kha cig tu s+hoswA/ kha cig tu rtsa dmar/ kha cig tu ser rab/ mig tu sdugapa
49b2(mdo sde): byas pa sha stag go// bam po re re'i g.yogs ma'i phyar bu yang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa sha stag go// chings ma'i the gu mang po re re shing yang / ldong ros kyi mdog lta bu dang / bar ma ma /
49b3(mdo sde): gri mdog lta bu dang / sngon po dang / ser po rnams kyis bar bar du spel ba sha stag go// de la chings ma'i the gu mang po re re zhing yang gser thags kyi mchog rnam par dag pa yul mang por grags pa dag
49b4(mdo sde): gis spel ba sha stag go// de la yamra sreg shing sA re re zhing yang spros dri bsung zhim po dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang / gur kum gyi phye ma dang ldan par byas pa/ gser thags kyis g.yogs pa/ dang
49b5(mdo sde): snas brgyan pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shubs sngon po dang / ser po dang / sngo skya dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka lta bu dag gi nang du bcug pa/ yul ka ling ka'i ras dang / zar ma'i ras dang / zab
49b6(mdo sde): dar dang / rgya dar gyi mchog rnams kyis dkris pa/ me tog mang pos brgyan pa/ byug pa dri bsung zhim po dag gis byugs pa sha stag go// yam sreg shing sna re'i shing rta re re zhing yang rin po chesna
49b7(mdo sde): bdun gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyis mdzes par byas pa/ kha cig tu sngon po dang / dkar po dang / bab la'i kha dog dang / li khri'i kha dog pas lhag pa'i 'od gsal ba dang ldan pa sha stag go// shing
50a1(mdo sde): rta de dag gi gnya' shing rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa dang / dpe med pa/ rta cang shes mgyogs pa dag dang sbyar ba sha stag go// rta de dag kyang rlung gi shugs
50a2(mdo sde): pas mgyogs pa/ spu kha chu skyar gyi mdog dang / ldong ros kyi mdog dang / sprin gyi mdog can sha stag ste/ thabs de 'dra ba'i shing rta re re'i mdun logs dang / rgyab logs dang / rgyab logs su
50a3(mdo sde): rgyal mtshun dang / bu dan bsgreng ste/ rgyal mtshan thams cad kyang rin po che las byas pa/ gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa sha stag go// rgyal mtshan gyi mdun logs su yang gdugs rtsibs dang / rtsu ba
50a4(mdo sde): nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od can las byas pa/ mu tig gi chun po sbyangs pa sha stag khyer ro// gdugs re re'i mdun logs su yang gser gyi me tog ku mu da dang / ut+pal dang / pad+ma dkar po sdong bu baM
50a5(mdo sde): DUR+Ya las byas/ ze ba rdo rje las byas pa/ bung ba mang po skad 'byin pa/ dri bsung zhim po dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba 'od dang ldan pa/ che ba mang ba sha stag dang / lnga ldi chen po sha stag khyer ro//
50a6(mdo sde): sde lnga chen po rnams kyi mdun du yang byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs kyi spyod pa ri mor bris pa chen po dag thogs so// ri mo'i thur re re'i bro g.yas g.yon nas kyang / zlos gar gyi gar stabs yul
50a7(mdo sde): dbus nas byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs byed / gar stabs byeng pa de'i nang na/ sol snyan rin po che las byas pa'i rnga rnga dang / 'khar rnga dang / rnga zlum dang / bi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gcig
50b1(mdo sde): pa dang / rnga bo che dang / dung la sogs pa dag brdung zhing 'bud do// gar stabs kyi sil snyan de dag las kyang kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro zhes zla ba delta bu'i rnam pa brjod cing / gdung gdung dang /
50b2(mdo sde): du dbyangs len to// grwar stabs kyi sil snyan re re'i mdun du yang me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs rnam par 'tsher ba rnams kyi phye mas rin po che'i skon bu legs par bcos pa gzhon sha can dag gis pa dang
50b3(mdo sde): be sha stag dang / de ma yin pa'i skon bu mang po blta na sdug pa gur kum gyi phye mas bkang ba mang po sha stag thogs so// de dag gi mdun du yang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang
50b4(mdo sde): bcas pa khyab par 'gyur ba'i zhal zas dag khyer zhing 'dong ngo // zhal zas de dag kyang bud shing tsan dan dmar po dang / a ka ru dang / thang shing gi me chung ngus bcos pa dang / gang+gA'i klung gi chus
50b5(mdo sde): bcos pa sha stag ste/ skyur ba dang / lan tshwa'i ro dang / mngar ba dang / bska ba dang / tsha ba dang / kha ba'i ro dang ldan pa/ mdangs skyed pa/ phan par gyur pa sha stag go// sA la zung gi drung gi nye 'khor
50b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyang gser gyi bye ma 'jam pos bkram ste/ ga pu sha'i ras dang / snam bu dang / btsos snam dang / dre'u rngog dang / ka ling ka'i ras dang / zab dar 'jam zhing mdog dkar ba rnams kyang
50b7(mdo sde): bting ngo // grub pa'i gnas de'i bzhi dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis kho ra khor yug kyang gur kum gyis byugs so// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i seng ge'i khri chen po
51a1(mdo sde): gser las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis spras shing snang bar byas pa/ ri rab ltar che zhing 'phang mtho ba dag kyang bshams so// g.yog ma yang de dag gi rkyen du tshum pa
51a2(mdo sde): sha stag gis g.yogs te/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka s+tha si li li 'khrol zhing gi sgra 'byung ba'i dra ba can gyi yol ba rnams kyis ni bskor/ rgya dar spu sdug yug khyim chen po'i bla re rnams ni bres
51a3(mdo sde): gdugs dkar po rnams kyis ni nyi tshan bsgribs/ rnga yab dkar po rnams kyis ni g.ya bas/ rgyab rten glang po che'i mche ba la chu srin ma kar rten pa'i kho nas/ zla ba nya ba'i 'od zer ltar dkar ba'i
51a4(mdo sde): mu tig gi chun po 'byung zhing sbyangs pa ldan pa rnams ni bcas/ sa phyogs rnams ni me tog dri zhim po'i sil snyan mas gtor to// dge bsnyen de dag re re nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi/
51a5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas sbyin no// skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom sbyin no// mgo bo dang mig la sogs pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad 'dod pa rnams la
51a6(mdo sde): yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyin no// dbul po dang / bkren pa dang / 'phongs pa rnams la yang / 'dod pa dang / dug dang / gnod pa dang / ma brtags pa'i sbyin pa rnams ma gtogs par/
51a7(mdo sde): gang dang gang dag ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de dag chog par sbyar ro snyam du sems kyi/ gzhan ni ci yang mi sems so// de bzhin du dge bsnyen gyi sde tshan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa de
51b1(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyis bsam pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi bshos gsol te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi bshos gsol te/ yo
51b2(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'das par bya'o snyam ste/ so so nas de 'ba' zhig snying la sems shing / yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gri me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni langs/ mig ni mchi ma khrags
51b3(mdo sde): bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas/ rang rang gi mchod pa'i yo byad bud shing dang / yam srog shing dang / shing rta dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / ba dan na
51b4(mdo sde): dang chas te/ zhal zas kyi mchog gis sbyar ba'i snod rnams thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ brjod
51b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / phye ma dang / phye ma zhi bu dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dran dang / bla re rgya chen dag gis mchod nas/ lan 'bum bskor ba byA te/
51b6(mdo sde): mig nas mchi ma rgyun mi 'chad par char bzhin du phab nas/ bdag nyid la sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa mang po byed cing / kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro// kye ma 'jig rten spongs par 'gyur ro zhes
51b7(mdo sde): de skad du skad chen po 'don te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs drung na/ srog chags shi shu mar bzhin du 'gre ldog cing / gsol ba 'debs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag
52a1(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pas/ bdag gis sbyar ba'i bshos gsol bar ci gnang / bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ sbyin pa'i tha ma de bzhin
52a2(mdo sde): gshegs pas zhes su gsol zhes gsol ba 'debs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen bzhin du cung mi gsung bar gyur to// de dag gis lon gnyis lan gsum
52a3(mdo sde): du de skad ces gsol kyang / lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas dge bsnyen gyi tshogs de dag re thag chad de cang mi zer bar 'khod nas/ bu gcig pa
52a4(mdo sde): shri nas dur khrod du bor ma thag pa'i pha ma 'gre ldog pa bzhin du shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur to// de bzhin du dge bsnyen de dag thams cad mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur pa las langs te/ rang rang
52a5(mdo sde): gi mchod pa'i yo byad rnams bsdus nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa/ gzhan yang de'i tshe bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs shing tshul khrims dang / cho ga dang / yon tan dang ldan pa dang /
52a6(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos kyi gces pa 'dzin pa'i dge bsnyen mtshong dpon gyi bu mo 'tsho ba'i dpal la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang / bud med kyi gzugs kyis sem/
52a7(mdo sde): can bye ba phrag mang po nges par sgrol ba/ khyim gyi gnas la smod pa sha stag ste/ lus 'di ni nyes pa'i khams brgyad cu rtsa bzhi las lhag pas bsdus pa'o// lus 'di ni srin bu'i rigs bye ba phrag
52b1(mdo sde): brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i zas so// lus 'di ni rgyal po'i khri mon du brubs pa'i drimanam pa'o// lus 'dis phyi ro rul ba'i dri bas kyang lhag par grags pa'o// lus 'di ni skrong ga nas me gcung ba /
52b2(mdo sde): pra'o// lus 'di ni sha dang / chub dang / rus pa dang / khrag dang / pags pa'i zhal zhal can/ rkang lag gi bya sgo dang / ra ba dang / ba gram can/ mig gi skar khung can// mgo bo'i yang thog can/
52b3(mdo sde): yid rgyal po lta bu'i pho brang grong khyer lta bu'o// lus 'di ni mkhas pa thams cad kyis spangs shing byis pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'i 'dod chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la sogs pa'i
52b4(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa bye ba snyed kyi srin bus bsten pa/ 'dam bu dang / e ran da dang / dbu ba dang / chu shing lta bur snying po med pa/ glog dang ri gzar po'i 'bab chu'i dba' rlabs ltar shin tu mi brtan pa'o//
52b5(mdo sde): sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / brag cha dang / zla ba'i gzugs brnyan ltar slu bar byed pa/ rlung shugs drag pos rnam par dkrugs pa'i chu'i shugs kyis brkos pa'i 'gram gyi sdong po ltar g.yang sran 'dug
52b6(mdo sde): po'i chos can/ spyang ki dang / wa dang / bya rgod dang / bya rog rnams kyi zas yin na/ su zhig 'di lta bu tshang ba la dga' bar byed/ rgya mtsho'i chu thams cad skra'i rtse mos blangs te ba glang gi rlig rjes
52b7(mdo sde): su blugs par ni nus srid kyi/ lus nad brgya rtsa bzhis gzir ba 'di snying po med pa dang / mi gtsang ba ni tshig tsam gyis bstan par mi nus so// sa chen po 'di rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i rus pa'i 'bru tsam/
53a1(mdo sde): sha stag tu byas pa 'am/ yungs 'bru tsam mam/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul tsam sha stag tu byas pas ni zad par 'gyur yang srid kyi/ lus 'di yod kyi bar du 'di'i nyes dmigs
53a2(mdo sde): ni mthar thug par mi 'gyur te/ de bas na dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i phyir 'di mchil ma bzhin du dor bar bya'o snyam ste/ 'di ltar dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad chen po stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
53a3(mdo sde): pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgoms pas sems bsgoms pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen ma 'tsho ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / dge bsnyen ma dpal 'phreng zhes bya ba dang / dge bsnyen ma
53a4(mdo sde): sa ga zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa thams cad kyang theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la/ thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa/ bsrung ba lhur len pa/ bud med kyi
53a5(mdo sde): lus ngan no snyam du smod pa dang / lus snying po med do snyam du smod pa/ so so nas shas cher sgom pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo gzhig go snyam du sems pa sha stag dang / theg pa chen pos skom la
53a6(mdo sde): ngoms nas gzhan skom pa dag ngoms par bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa sha stag dang / theg pa chen po la sred pa/ theg pa chen po la ser sna med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mthun par slob par 'dod
53a7(mdo sde): pa dang / grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o// brgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du slob par 'dod
53b1(mdo sde): pa sha stag dang / go cha chen po bgos pa/ bslab pa rnams la brtul zhugs brtan pa dang / de bzhin du yon tan du ma dang ldan pa dang / bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la sbyi
53b2(mdo sde): rje dang ldan pa sha stug ste/ de dag kyang nyi ma 'char kAr shin tu rings par gcig la gcig 'jus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i phyir/ yam sreg shing dge bsnyen pa rnams
53b3(mdo sde): kyi nyis 'gyur khyer ba las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ bu shi ba bzhin du mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te/ dus nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
53b4(mdo sde): gzhan yang de'i tshe li tsa byi gzhon nu gtsang ma dri ma med pa'i snying po la sogs pa yangasra pa can nu gnas pa'i li tsa byi gzhon nu grong khyer gyi nang na gnas pa dang / phyi rol na gnas pa dang bcas pa rnams
53b5(mdo sde): dang / 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i rgyal phran blon po dang bcas pa gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed thams cad kyang dam pa'i chos bsrung ba la mkhas pa/ tshul khrims dang / cho ga dang / yon tan
53b6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ dam pa'i chos sun 'byin cing rtags can 'chal pa rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa sha stag la/ de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta bur 'dod de/ bdag cag gi nor dang 'bru'i tshogs dang
53b7(mdo sde): mdzod dang bang ba'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni/ bdud rtsi mi zad par bya ba dang / bdud rtsi gnas par bya ba'i phyir yin gyis/ bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos la nan tan bya'o// dam pa
54a1(mdo sde): chos la sun 'byin cing / log par lta ba rnams kyi lce gcad par bya'o zhes legs par dam bcas pa/ tshul khrims 'chal pa/ tshul khrims la mi gnas pa rnams ni gos
54a2(mdo sde): dkar po gyon du bcug ste/ khyim pa'i las byed du gzhug go snyam du sems brtul ba/ dam pa'i chos sprugs pa la ni bla ma bzhin du rim gror bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa/ dge 'dun la phan pa dang bde
54a3(mdo sde): par gnas par bya ba ni yongs su rdzogs par byas tang des chog go snyam du sems pa dang / theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o snyam du yi dam bcas pa
54a4(mdo sde): la brtan pa dang / de la sogs pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ la tsi byi gzhon nu gtsang ma dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / sgrib pa dag zhes bya ba dang /
54a5(mdo sde): gang+gA'i chu dri ma med pas byin pa zhes bya ba dang // de la sogs pa'i li tse byi gzhon nu de dag kyang gcig la gcig 'jus te/ re res kyang gdung zhugs la zhen pa'i bud shing thang shing gi mchog dang /
54a6(mdo sde): tsa na dan dang / a ka ru rnams dang / yam sreg shing bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang / mchod pa snga me'i nyis 'gyur rnams khyer nas/ mchod pa rnams bsgrags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
54a7(mdo sde): thad du dong ngo // li tsa byi gzhon nu re re la yang glang po che brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / shing rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / nor bu chu shel brgyad khri bzhi stong dang chas so//
54b1(mdo sde): glang po che re re'i mdun du yang che ba la 'os pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dar gyi bla re chen po rnams thogs so// gdugs rnams kyi nang na thung ngu gang yin pa de la yang khor/
54b2(mdo sde): khror yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod do// dar gyi bla re chen po rnams kyi nang na chung ngu gang yin pa de la yang chu zheng du dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do// rgyal mtshan rnams kyi nang na thung ngugang
54b3(mdo sde): yin pa de la yang 'bang du dpag tshad brgya yod do// ba dan rnams kyi nang na thung ngu gang yin pa des kyang dpag tshad stong phyin to// de ltar de dag mchod pa rnams dang chas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
54b4(mdo sde): thad du dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas phul ba las/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung ste/ ma bzhes nas/ mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te
54b5(mdo sde): thag chad nas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus ta la bdun gyi srid tsam du 'phags te 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe 'dzam bu gling pa'i blon po dang / tshong dpon dring
54b6(mdo sde): khyim bdag gang+gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma sred thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la dad pa/ tshul khrims dang / cho ga dang / yon tan rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa/ dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams kyi ser ba
54b7(mdo sde): lta bur gyur pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ khyim bdag gi rgyal po rnam par snang byed ces bya ba dang / 'gro ba skyong zhes bya ba dang / chos skyes zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa dag kyang de'i tshe der lcag/
55a1(mdo sde): te/ de dag thams cad kyis kyang rang rang gi mchod pas/ mchod pa snga ma rnams zil gyis mnan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po'i tshogs kyis mchod nas/ nul/
55a2(mdo sde): zas ma bzhes pa'i phyir mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te/ re thag chad nas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus ta la bdun gyi srid tsam du 'phangs te 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i
55a3(mdo sde): tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra ma gtogs par/ yangs pa can gyi rgyal po zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po/ grong khyer gyi nang na gnas pa dang / phyi rol na gnas pa'i g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa la sogs pa
55a4(mdo sde): 'dzam bu gling thams cad kyi grong khyer dang / ri khrod kyi grong dang / yul po che dang / kha lungs kyi rgyal po gang+gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas te lhags
55a5(mdo sde): so// rgyal po de rnams re re la yang dmag 'khrug sa ya phrag bco brgyad bco brgyad yod do// de dag la glang po che rtag tu 'gram pa nas rdul 'dzag pa dang / rta rlung gi shugs pas lhag par mgyogs pa
55a6(mdo sde): dag kyang yod do// de dag gi mchod pa'i yo byad gang yin pa de dag kyang / mchod pa'i yo byad snga ma de dag las nyis 'gyur gyis ches bzang la ches mang ste/ de lta bu'i mchod pa'i phul dag khyer nas/
55a7(mdo sde): dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas te lhags so// de dag mchod pa de rnams kyi nang na gdugs thung ngu gang yin pa de yang dpag tshad brgyad cu chu zheng gab par 'dug go// ba dan gyi nang na rlung ngug
55b1(mdo sde): yin pas kyang dpag tshad brgya stong du phyin no// rgyal mtshan phal pa gang yin pa de la yang 'bang du dpag tshad sum du yod do// de ltar yangs pa can gyi rgyal po zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / nyi 'od ces
55b2(mdo sde): bya ba dang / de la sogs pa rgyal po rnams nyi ma 'chur kar langs te/ de dag kyang dam pa'i chos su ni 'byin cing rtags cad 'chal pa rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa/ mthus kyang sems can rnams dang
55b3(mdo sde): pa'i chos la 'god par byed pa dang / bdag cag gi nor dang 'bru'i tshogs dang / mdzod dang bang ba'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag ni dam pa'i chos gnas par bya ba'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa sha stag dang /
55b4(mdo sde): bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos la nan tan bya'o// dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams kyi lce ni drungs nas bcad do zhes dam bcas pa brtan por byas pa sha stag dang / theg pa chen po 'dod pa dang / 'dzi/
55b5(mdo sde): rten thams cad la snying brtse ba sha stag ste/ de dag gi mchod pa rnams kyis yangs pa can nas grong khyer ku shi'i bar thams cad kun tu gang bar gyur to// de dag gri gdugs kyi grib ma 'dab chags su
55b6(mdo sde): 'dug pas ni// nyi ma'i 'od kyis mi phog go// de dag gi kha zas kyi dri bsrung gis ni dpag tshad bzhir khyab par gyur te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la rang rang gis sbyar ba'i zhal zas bzhes par
55b7(mdo sde): gsum gyi bar du gsol ba btab kyang / zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste/ langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo ma
56a1(mdo sde): / gtogs par/ yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ma la sogs pa 'dzam bu gling ba'i rgyal po dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi chung ma
56a2(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu lhags te/ de dag thams cad kyang bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can mang po nges par sgrol ba/ rtag tu lus bsgom pa dang ldan pa chen po stong pa nyid dang /
56a3(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas sems rnam par dag pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ma zhes bya ba dang / btsun mo bri yang ku zhes
56a4(mdo sde): bya ba dang / de la sogs pa thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa shwa stag ste/ gcig la gcig 'jus nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la
56a5(mdo sde): bzhin pa'i phyir/ yam sreg shing rnams khyer te/ mchod pa snga ma thams cad rang rang gi mchod pa rnams kyis zil gyis mnan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la nyis 'gyur du mchod pa byas te/ de dag gi mchod
56a6(mdo sde): pa'i yo byad rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang / gdugs rnams kyi 'phang dang / chu zheng gi tshad kyang snga ma'i nyis 'gyur bas lhag go// kha zas rnams kyi dri bsrung can ni dpag tshad brgyad du khyab par
56a7(mdo sde): gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang / zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la skor bar byed cing / skra 'bal la/ rang rang gi
56b1(mdo sde): rgyan rnams 'thor zhing / skad mi snyan pas ngus te/ bu gcig pa shi ba bzhin du mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus sbrul zung gi drung nyid du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
56b2(mdo sde): gzhan yang de'i tshe lha mig yangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa lha'i tshogs gang+gA'i gleng brgyad kyi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu lhags nas/ lha de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// grogs pongs
56b3(mdo sde): ltos / gyogs po dag ltos// mi rnams kyi mchod pa'i yo byad mchog tu khyud par du 'phags le/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang bkur sbyi
56b4(mdo sde): mas mchod par 'dod de/ mi rnams kyi zhal zas kyi tham pa zhes pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs kyis/ grogs po dag bdag cag gis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
56b5(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la so so nas mchod pa bya zhing / tha ma'i dus su zhal zas dbul bar bya na/ ji ltar bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas de bzhin gshegs pas gsol te/ yongs
56b6(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs par mdzad cig gu/ grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni shin tu dkon no// de bas kyang zhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa ni ches
56b7(mdo sde): dkon no// kye ma bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das na ni/ 'jig rten stengs par 'gyur ro zhes smras so// lha de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la/ thos nas kyang gan/
57a1(mdo sde): dag la bstan to snyam du dam bcas pa theg pa chen pos skom pa/ ngoms nas kyang gzhan skom pa rnams ngoms par bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen po la ser sna me/
57a2(mdo sde): pa/ theg pa chen po la phrag dog dang / dus che ba dang / 'chab pa dang ga sgyu med pa theg pa chen po sun 'byin pa'i sems can rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa/ dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i tshul khrims
57a3(mdo sde): blang ba/ 'jig rten dang mthun par slob par 'dod pa/ bdag cag brga la nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o// bdag cag grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o// dkon/
57a4(mdo sde): mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o snyam du slob par 'dod pa/ go cha chen po bgos pa/ bslab pa rnams la dam bcas pa brtan pa dang / de bzhin du yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ bu
57a5(mdo sde): gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad la snying rje lta ba sha stag ste/ de dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i gdung zhugs la bzhin pa'i phyir/ bud shing dang
57a6(mdo sde): yam sreg shing rnams khyer te/ de dag kyang snga mas phul ba'i yam sreg shing gnyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur bas bzang ba'i lha rjes dri bsrung dang ldan pa// yid du 'ong ba mi la dkon pa sha stag go/ shing /
57a7(mdo sde): rta yang rta'i mchog mgyogs pa dag dang sbyar ba/ dar la dkar pos g.yogs pa/ gzugs dang dbyibs ri mor bri bar mi nus pa/ dril bu g.yer kha'i dra can gyi yol bas bskor ba/ dar yug
57b1(mdo sde): khyim chen po'i bre re rgya chen po/ rtsa ba ri mo can dag la btsugs pa dang / gar stabs dang / rol mo yid 'ong ba rnams kyis mdun du dungs pa/ kha zas zhim po mang po dag dang / seng ge'i khri bai DUR+Ya /
57b2(mdo sde): rgyub rten rtse mo nor bu'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa/ zhabs rten gsem las byas pa dag kyang bshams pa dang / sa phyogs kyang me tog dri bsrung zhim po sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas la/ me tog
57b3(mdo sde): gi sil ma bkram zhing bkod pa/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi phyi bzhin 'brang ba sha stag ste/ so so nas mchi ma khrag lta bu mi thub cing / mchog tu sdug bsngal bas gdungs nas/ sam
57b4(mdo sde): can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya'o dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa
57b5(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mchod pa dang bkur sti'i
57b6(mdo sde): mchog rnam pa mang po dag byas te/ bskor ba yang byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnams kyi phyir rang rang gi bla gos sa la bting ste/ rang rang gi rgyan rnams phog cing gtor nas/ rang rang
57b7(mdo sde): gi sla 'bal zhing skad mi snyan pas ngu ste/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gis sbyar ba'i bshos gsol te/ yongs su ma
58a1(mdo sde): ngan 'da' bar mdzad du gsol zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes te/ cang mi gsung na/ de dag re thag chad de langs
58a2(mdo sde): nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod // gzhan yang de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po phyogs bzhin gnas pa klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang / dga' bo dang / he dga' bo la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po gang+gA'i
58a3(mdo sde): klung dgu'i bye ma snyed shin tu rings par nyi ma 'char kar lha rnams kyi mchod pa las kyang nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad rang rang gi 'byor pa dang 'tsham pa dag khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong
58a4(mdo sde): ste/ phyag 'tshal nas zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang / bsam pa bzhin du ma grub nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa gan//
58a5(mdo sde): sbyin gyi bdag po g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed gcig la gcig 'jus nas/ rang rang gi mchod pa rnams kyis klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi mchod pa sngam zil gyis mnan nas/ tshogs chen
58a6(mdo sde): po drang chas te lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal to// zhal zas pa zhes par gsol ba btab kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste/ langs nas phyogs
58a7(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod // gzhan yang de'i tshe nam mkha' lding gi bdag po dgra'i mdza' bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gang+gA'i klung nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyis rang rang gi mchod
58b1(mdo sde): bas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po snga ma dag gi mchod pa rnams zil gyis mnan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang / zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste/
58b2(mdo sde): langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe dri za'i bdag po mes byin gyi bu la sogs pa dri ba'i bdag po gang+gA'i klung sum cu'i bye ma snyed kyis mchod pa snga ma thams cad pas kyang ches mchog tu
