58b3(mdo sde): gyur pa'i mchod pa rnams khyer te 'ongs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te/ rol mo sman dgu byas nas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas pa zhes par gsol ba btab kyang
58b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis mA bzhes nas/ de dag kyang yid mi dga' bar gyur te/ langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe mi 'am ci'i bdag po legs mthong la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i
58b5(mdo sde): bdag po gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed lhags te/ snga ma rnams kyi mchod pa de dag bsdoms pa bas kyang de dag re re'i mchod pa ches khyad par 'phags par gyur te/ de dag kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas/
58b6(mdo sde): yid mi dga' bar gyur te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po legs mthong chen po la sogs pa lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis mchod
58b7(mdo sde): pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur khyed pa las/ snga ma bzhin du zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ yid mi dga' ste phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi bdag po bode mchog rigs la sogs pa
59a1(mdo sde): lha ma yin gyi bdag po gang+gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed lus che zhing snang ba chen po dang ldan pa/ lha ma yin gyi bsam pa med pa sha stag gis mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyi
59a2(mdo sde): mchod pa dag khyer te 'ong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas zhal zas ma bzhes te/ yid mi dga' bar gyur nas langs te/ shing sA la zung gi drung du rang rang gi gzi byin gyis snang bar byas te
59a3(mdo sde): 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe sbyin byed ma'i bu'i bdag po gang+gA'i chu dri ma med pa rjes byin la sogs pa sbyin byed ma'i bu gang+gA'i klung bdun cu'i bye ma snyed lus chi zhing snang ba chen po dang ldan pa sbyin byed ma'i
59a4(mdo sde): bu'i bsam pa med pa sha stag gis mchod pa snga ma thams cad las mchod pa nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur bas bzang ba dag khyer ba las/ snga ma bzhin du zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ yid mi dga' bar gyur te/
59a5(mdo sde): shing sA la zung gi drung du rang rang gi gzi brjid kyis snang bar byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe srin po'i bdag po 'jigs byed la sogs pa srin po'i bdag po
59a6(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed srin po'i bsam pa med pa sha stag gis/ gzi brjid chen po'i tshogs kyis sA la zung gi drung snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig
59a7(mdo sde): tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe 'bras bu'i shing gi bdag po dri sil la sogs pa 'bras bu'i shing gi bdag po gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis snga ma'i mchod pa thams cad pas nyis 'gyur nyis
59b1(mdo sde): 'gyur gyis lhag pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs khyer nas/ khu byug po rgyags pa rnams dang / bung ba rnams skad 'byin pa dang ldan pa'i me tog 'tsher ba'i 'khri shing mang po'i dog pa dang / lo mkha 'a bus pa
59b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis sa phyogs brgyan te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul chen po la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po gang+gA'i klung stong gi bye ma
59b3(mdo sde): skyed kyis mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa'i mchod pa dang khyer nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe lha mo 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can legs mthong ma la
59b4(mdo sde): sogs pa gang+gA'i klung bye ba'i bye ma snyed kyis yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo'i mchod pa'i nyes 'gyur bas lhag pa dag khyer te/ rang rang gi rgyan rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sa la spung
59b5(mdo sde): nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe lha'i bu mo ram b+ha dang / ur+tha shi la sogs pa lha'i bu mo gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed kyis mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur
59b6(mdo sde): bas ches lhag par mang zhing spa ba dag gis mdun du drangs te/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe 'byung po'i tshigs pa wa sangs ltar 'khor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ban+d+ha
59b7(mdo sde): klung bye ba phrag stong gi bye ma snyed snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi'i lha'i bu gang+gA'i klung gi bye ba phrag 'bum dang lhan cig tu mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'thun
60a1(mdo sde): nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa dag khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe
60a2(mdo sde): rlung lha bzhi rlung gtong bar lha gad+hA'i klung bye ba phrag 'bum dang lhan cig tu/ dus ma yin par yang shing ljon pa dang / 'khri shing dang / shing gel ba dang / nags ma rnams dang / skem dang / ma tog
60a3(mdo sde): gi 'khri shing dang / byu ru rnams kyis sa phyogs rgyan par byed cing / dus tshig thams cad kyi me tog gis dpal rnams phyogs su rgyas par byed la/ lo ma kha 'bus pa rtswa dmar ba rnams kyis shing sAl
60a4(mdo sde): zung nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od zer ser po dza hong kar 'dug pa bzhin du byas nas/ mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa'i mchod pa dag khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ snga ma bzhin du shing
60a5(mdo sde): sA la zung gi drung du 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe char pa 'bebs pa'i lha gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed sprin chen po dang / chu skyar rnams phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing glog 'gyu ba'i gsob nas rma bya'i mgrin pa ltar
60a6(mdo sde): mdog sngo ba'i char gyi rgyun 'bab la/ 'brug sgra la nas sgrogs pa'i sprin dang ldan pas/ chur zim bu bsil ba dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi char 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te
60a7(mdo sde): zhal zas ma bzhes nas rezag chad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la bzhin pa'i mi gsadang pa'i phyir nam mkha' nying la 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe spos kyi glang po sgra tsan dang / lung ba
60b1(mdo sde): mdog dang / sbrang rtsi'i mdog sel dang / 'dod dgu'i spos ldan la sogs pa spos kyi glang po gang+gA'i klung nyi shu'i bye ma snyed theg pa chen po 'dod pa sha stag gis ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir/
60b2(mdo sde): gangs kyi sman dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / sdong bu shing rta chen po'i 'bang lo tsam sha stag dang / dgon pa chen po dag nas pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu/
60b3(mdo sde): dang / rdo gu sU tha dad pa dum dag sna'i thor tos phyung zhing khyer te/ rlung gi shugs pas kyang ches mgyogs pa dang / shin tu rings par dbyar gyi 'brug sgra bzhin du sgrogs shing lhags nas/ pad+ma'i 'dab
60b4(mdo sde): ma bcer ba'i seng ge'o khri'i lnga ldi dag shams te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ zhal zas ma bzhes pas re thag chad de/ phyogs gcig tu 'khong ngo // gzhan yang de'i tshe seng ga seng
60b5(mdo sde): ge'i sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa seng ge ga d+hA'i klung sum cu'i bye ma snyed sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa sha stag gis/ seng ge'i rtsal chen pos spos kyi glang po che rnams dang 'dra ba
60b6(mdo sde): me tog dang 'bras bu rnams khyer te/ rings par lhags nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe bya ngang ba dang / khrung khrung dang / ngud pa dang / ka dam pa dang / zal mo dang / bzhad dang /
60b7(mdo sde): khu byug dang / ba li ka dang / ka la bing+ka dang / shang shang te'u la sogs pas kyang spos kyi glang po che rnams dang 'dra bar me tog dang 'bras bu khyer te/ rang rang gi skad phyung nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
61a1(mdo sde): gzhan yang de'i tshe sa'i steng na ba dang ma he mo dang / ram mo yod do cog gis kyang nu ma 'o mas bkang ste/ shin tu rings par lhags nas/ shing sA la zung gi drung nas sa/
61a2(mdo sde): phyogs gshong zhig mthong nas der rang rang gis nu ma 'o mas gang ba de dag las/ 'o ma gseg ma dang / bye ma dang / ba tshwas ma 'gags shing / tsha ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba med pa dag gzigs te/
61a3(mdo sde): 'o ma de dag gi nang na sbrang bu dag bsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe drang srong bzod par smra ba la sogs pa gling bzhin gnas pa'i drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa theg pa
61a4(mdo sde): chen po 'dod pa sha stag la gang+gA'i klung dkrigs kyi bye ma snyed rang rang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis yam sreg shing dang zhal zas dag khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu
61a5(mdo sde): 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe 'od srungs chen po la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun kha cig dang / gnas brtan kun dga' bo la sogs pa ma gtogs par/ yul phyogs na gnas pa'i dge slong dang //
61a6(mdo sde): dge slong ma ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang ma lus par der lhags so// gzhan yang de'i tshe ri rab la sogs pa ri chen po rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi bar mtshams kyi ri gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye
61a7(mdo sde): ma snyed kyang / shing ljon pa dang / 'khri shin mang po nyi tshan gyi grib ma byed pa dang / brag zang yag grib mche ba dang / brag kha nas 'bab pa'i chus gang ba dang / sman gshong rdo gu dang / rtsa ba dang / 'bras
61b1(mdo sde): bus gang ba dag kyang de balhags so// lha'i bu mthu po rje'i mdun mu chen po dag kyang rirab dang bcas te/ mchod pa'i phyir lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bgu 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khor po/
61b2(mdo sde): gzhan yang de'i tshe lha'i bu mthu bo che 'od chen po rgya me tsho chen po bzhi'i nang na gnas pa dang / chu klung chen po dag gi nang na gnas pa ga d+hA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma skyed mchod pa snga ma pas ches nyis 'gyur gyis
61b3(mdo sde): mdzes pa'i mchod pa sngon du btang nas/ nyi ma'i 'od zil gyis mnan pa bzhin du/ rang rang gi'i dkyis nyi ma'i 'od zil gyis mnan// nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od kyis shing mya ngan 'tshang gi lom thams cad
61b4(mdo sde): dmar lam mer snang bar byed pa bzhin du/ rang rang gi 'od kyis chu klung gser ldan gyi chu thams cad dmar lam mer snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
61b5(mdo sde): gzhan yang de'i tshe grong khyer ku shi nas/ shing sA la zung gi drung gi bar skabs kyi bar snang la/ khang bzangs ri'i dbang po'i rtse mo lta bu/ ngang pa'i thal gong ltar dkar ba sha stag gis 'khrigs par gyu 'o//
61b6(mdo sde): sa gzhi ni skyed mos tshal dang / rdzing bu'i chu bad+mas mdzes par byas pa dag gis gang bar 'dug ste/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi skyed mos tshal bas kyang lhag par mdzes so// gcig tu dga' ba'i tshal dang / shing
61b7(mdo sde): rta sna tshogs can dang 'dra bar gyur te/ sa phyogs de dag de ltar dga' dga' ltar 'dug kyang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / mi de dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir shin tu du'o//
62a1(mdo sde): gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams rang rang gi 'khor la la 'di skad ces 'dzer te/ grogs po dag ltos/ grogs po dag ltos/ lha dang / lham yin dang
62a2(mdo sde): mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las khyad du 'phags la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma 'bul ba la brtson gyis/ grogs po dag bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs
62a3(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la so so nas mchod par bya'o// zhal zas kyi tha ma yang dbul bar bya'o// gal te bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas kyi tha ma bcom ldan 'das/
62a4(mdo sde): kyis bzhes par gyur na/ de las bdag cag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro// zhes de dag gis de skad ces smras nas/ g.yog 'khor mang po grangs med pa dang bcas pas mchod/
62a5(mdo sde): pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur gyi mchod pa dang / zhal zas mang po dag khyer ro// me tog mang po dag kyang khyer te/ 'di lta ste/ man+da ra ba rnams dang / man+da ra ba chen po rnams dang / ke ke ru ka rnams dang / ke ke/
62a6(mdo sde): ruka chen po rnams dang / many+dzu sha ka rnams dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po rnams dang / san tanag rnams dang / san tanag chen po rnams dang / 'od can rnams dang / 'od can chen po rnams dang / kun tu
62a7(mdo sde): 'od can rnams dang / 'od mtha yas pa rnams dang ni mdzes sdug rnams dang / mdzes sdug chen po rnams dang / dga' byed rnams dang / dri mchog rnams dang / dri mchog chen rnams dang / sa
62b1(mdo sde): kyi nga b+hU rnams dang / sbos kyi dang byung chen po rnams dang / kun tu brdzang rnams dang / kun tra da rngung chen po rnams dang / mtha' las dang rdza rnams dang / mtha' yas dang rten po dus da
62b2(mdo sde): lha rdzas kyi 'dab ma rnams dang / klu shing gi me tog rnams dang / yongs 'dus brtol rnams dang / de lta bu gzhan dag kyang khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der ngong ste/ nye ba'i ga'i byin gyis srin pa
62b3(mdo sde): me khyer gyi 'od zil gyis mnan pa bzhin du/ rang rang gi gzi byin gyis thams cad kyi 'od zil gyis mnan te/ zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod // gzhan yang de'i tshe lha'i dbang po
62b4(mdo sde): brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi 'khor dang bcas pas/ mchod pa snga ma de'i nyis 'gyur de'i rkyen du 'tsham pa de na yod pa'i me tog gi sna grangs du ma yid du 'ong ba rnams dang / yid du 'ong ba chen po/
62b5(mdo sde): rnams dang / dri bsung zhim po rnams khyer ro// khang bzangs chen po rdo thal gyi mdog ltar dkar ba/ them skas kyi rim pa dang ldan pa/ skar khung gi 'phreng ba du ma/ phug ron shug rtse ba dang ldan pa dag kyang
62b6(mdo sde): sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud te/ bcom ldan 'das
62b7(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni theg pa chen po'i mdo'i sde tshan srung ba lags na/ bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes
63a1(mdo sde): gsol/ de skad ces gsol kyang / zhal zas ma pa zhes nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// / 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'a/
63a2(mdo sde): pa theg pa chen po'i mdo las bam po gnyis pa// / de'i rjes la mthar gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug po rnams kyis steng gi bar snang la mchod pa dang / 'od snga ma las khyad par du
63a3(mdo sde): 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ de dag gi mchod pa'i nang na/ gdugs phal pa gang yin pa de yang kho ra khor yug tu gling bzhi pa'i khyon tsam mo// ba dan phal pa gang yin pa de yang rgya
63a4(mdo sde): mtsho chen po bzhi'i mthar thug ste/ shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho nas/ nub phyogs kyi rgya mtshor mthar thug ste/ rlung gis bskyod dam/ rlung gis phyar na/ ba dan de dag las pi wang gi sgra snyan pa khong nas 'khyig pa
63a5(mdo sde): lta bur snyan pa dag 'byung ste/ de dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ zhal zas pa zhes par gsol ba btab kyang / bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung nas/ re thag chad de/ phyogs gcig tu
63a6(mdo sde): 'khod do// de'i tshe srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa rnams ma gtogs par/ gong mgong ma'i sems can gzhan gang yin pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ mchod pa rgya chen po'i tshogs
63a7(mdo sde): dang nas te lhags nas/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dpag tu med pa dag gis bskor cing mdun du bdang te/ rang gi ga zi byin gyis rgya
63b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyig pa byin des gyis pas nas/ mchod pa tshams chen po dang ngas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyithad du dang // dngagagi bdan pa lwa ba gang yin pa de yang dngas pa'i 'ag smran pa 'gyun/
63b2(mdo sde): shing sbrul zung gi drung du thug go// des kyang bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas pa zhes par gsol ba las/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ma bzhes nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'a'adado// de nas de'i tshe l+h+wam y-i
63b3(mdo sde): dbang po zag bzangs ris lha ma yin gyi g.yog 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas pas/ tshangs pa dang / dbang po gnyis ma gtogs par/ de'i byar gyi lha yod de cig gi 'ong rang po 'od kyis chog mog
63b4(mdo sde): byas nas/ de'i rkyen du 'tsham pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs dang / rkyen du 'tsham pa'i zhal zas ngag dang chas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo // de'i gdugs pal pa yang chu zheng du 'jig rten gyi kham
63b5(mdo sde): chung ngu khyab pa tsam ste/ des kyang bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas pa zhes par gsol ba la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas/ langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas
63b6(mdo sde): bdud sdig can chung ma grangs med pa'i 'khor dang bcas te/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi bar srung thams cad phye nas/ de dag la chu dang kha zas la sogs pa ci 'dod pa byin te/ de dag la /
63b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran par gyis shig/ sbyin pa'i tha ma la rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig ces smras nas/ de dag la khyed bde bar gyur cig ces
64a1(mdo sde): kyang dbugs byung ngo // sems can dmyal ba'i grong khyer mtshon chas gang shing / me chen po 'bar ba rnams su yang sprin chen po bzhin du rgya chen po pab nas/ sems can
64a2(mdo sde): dmyal ba pa rnams kyis sngon ma myong ba'i bde ba dang ldan pa'i 'du shes skyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus/ bdud kyi sems kyi gnas skabs de lta bur gyur to// de'i 'khor gang yin pa de dag gis
64a3(mdo sde): kyang / gzhu dang / ral gri dang / tho ba dang / dgra sta dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / mtshon ka ma pa na pa/ lcags kyi bai ra ka dang / lcags mda' dang / sha ta ga ni dang / mda' dang / 'phang mdung dang /
64a4(mdo sde): mdung rtse gcig pa la sogs pa mtshon cha rnams yongs su spangs te/ chos lhur len par gyur to// dri'i mchod pa yang lha snga ma rnams la med pa de lta bur gyur te/ de'i gdugs pal pa'i chu zheng du yang 'dzin
64a5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams bar ma'i khyon tsam mo// de ltar de mthu chen po dang ldan zhing / rang gi chung ma rnams kyi rnga yab kyis g.yo ba bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nahA/
64a6(mdo sde): lamago bos phyag 'tshal to// thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / 'khor dang bcas pas bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas pa/
64a7(mdo sde): su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ngasran chad theg pa chen po'i slad du yings bca' bar 'tshal te/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung / 'jigs pa'i slad du'am/ rnyed pa
64b1(mdo sde): dang dkur sti 'tshal ba'i sad dbu ma/ thob tu ba'i slang du'am/ gzhan gyis bgying du myal ba'ang/ gzhan gyis ying bsrung ba'i sang dumang nga ste/ theg pa chen porjod par babyed// da /
64b2(mdo sde): pa dang mi dga' ba thams cad bsal ba'i gsung sngags bshad par 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ jug/ thathar thag ke/ rI rure/ mahA ri/ A la mA la/ tA la swAhA/ chos smra ba 'phrul po dang /
64b3(mdo sde): 'jigs pas gnod par gyur pa rnams chos kyi tshul la spobs pa bskyed par bgyi ba dang / mu stegs pa rnams myos par bgyi ba dang / dam pa'i chos bsrung ba da/ bdag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i slad du/
64b4(mdo sde): bdag gis rang gi dam tshig gis smras pa'i gsang sngags 'di glang po che'i 'jigs pa 'am/ nags khung gi 'jigs pa 'am/ chu klung gi 'jigs pa 'am/ me'i 'jigs pa rnams kyi nang du/ bsrung
64b5(mdo sde): pa'i gzungs sngags kyi don du brjod pa gang lags pa de dag ni brjod pa tsam gyis ji ltar rus sbal rang gi lus bsrungs pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis g.yo dang sgyu ma mchis par/ de dag 'jigs pa thams
64b6(mdo sde): cad las bsrung bar bgyi/ stobs dang ldan par bgyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ngazhal zas 'di bzhes par gsol zhes bskul to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
64b7(mdo sde): bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sdig can khyod kha zas kyi phyir gsol ba ma 'debs shig/ gsang sngags kyi tshig ni sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir/ chos kyi sbyin par
65a1(mdo sde): 'gyur bas na bzhes par bya'o// zang zing gi sbyin pa ni de lta ma yin gyis/ sdig can khyod gsol ba ma 'debs shig ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ca
65a2(mdo sde): mi gsung bar gyur to// lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du yang / bdud dang bdud kyi bu mo rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa las/ ma bzhes te/ re thag chad nas phyogs
65a3(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod do// de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po lha'i bu dpag tu med pa/ mthu dpag tu med pa dag gis mdun du bdar te/ rang gi 'od kyis tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po/
65a4(mdo sde): dang / lha ma yin dang / bdud kyi 'od rnams snag tsha'i gong bu bzhin du 'od mi gsal bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod pa rgya chen po nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa dag khyer nas
65a5(mdo sde): der song ste de'i mchod pa rnams kyi nang na/ gdugs bal pa gang yin pa de yang chu zheng du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par 'dug ste/ mchod pa de lta bu sngon du btung
65a6(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phyin te/ lan du ma bskor ba byas nas/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom
65a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la bdag mchod pa bgyid pa ni/ sbrang bu mchod pa bgyid pa dang 'dra ste/ bdag sbrang bu dang 'dra bas// bcom ldan 'das la
65b1(mdo sde): mchod pa bgyid pa'i rngog la thog gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das bdag 'thugs brtse ba'i srang du/ zhal zas kyi tha ma gsol bar cig rlung / zhes lan gnyis lan gru sum dug sol bab
65b2(mdo sde): kyang / lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur te/ re thag chad nas langs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing
65b3(mdo sde): 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa gtams phrag dkrigs kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid 'phrog sgra skar mu thug ces bya ba zhig
65b4(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des sbas kyi thu bo nyan thos lus rlon mtha' yas la
65b5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu khyod mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song la/ don de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba ring po mi
65b6(mdo sde): thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de'i don du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas zhal zas zhim po phan pa dag khyer te song zhig/ mchod pa chen po ngag
65b7(mdo sde): kyang khyer te song la de la 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas 'di gsol te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad du gsol zhes kyis shig/ khyod kyi
66a1(mdo sde): the tsom dang yid gnyis ci dang ci yod pa de dang de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa de kho na la legs par zhus shig dang / des khyod la lung bstan par 'gyur ro zhes bka'/
66a2(mdo sde): stsal to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas des legs so legs so zhes gsol nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bskor ba byas nas/
66a3(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen po grangs med pas bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs//
66a4(mdo sde): so// de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di g.yos rab tu g.yos 'gul rab tu 'gul/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ 'khor rab tu 'khor/ 'ur
66a5(mdo sde): 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ shig shig rab tu shig shig/ mAr mer rab tu mer mer/ ldem ldem rab tu ldem ldem mo// de dag la sogs pa byas te/ sra chen po rab tu g.yos so// de nas
66a6(mdo sde): 'khor de dag gi nang na tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha ma yin dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams kyis sa gzhi de lta bur gyur pa mthong nas/ skye
66a7(mdo sde): bung zhes byas te/ 'jigs shing / kha dang lkog ma bskams nas 'bros par chas te/ rang rang gi 'od kyang mi mthong zhing 'od nyams par gyur to// de nas 'khor nyid kyi nong /
66b1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yangs te/ rtswa'i tshogs de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig/ shar blogs logs su 'jig rten gyi lja
66b2(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung grangs med pi ga tams phrag dkrigs kyi bye ma'i rdul phra rab grangs med pa snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid 'brog sgra snyan mu thug ces bya ba zhig yo da/ de na bzhin ga /
66b3(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs la 'tsho zhing gzhes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa des/ rang gis sras kyi thu bo nyan thos la bos
66b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song la/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba yongs su mya ngan
66b5(mdo sde): las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis/ de dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma phul la/ khyod kyi the tsom dang yid gnyis ci dang ci yod pa de dag kyang legs par zhus shig dang / des khyod la
66b6(mdo sde): lung bstan par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas 'dir btang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pas bsgo
66b7(mdo sde): cing mdun du bdar nas/ 'dir 'ongs pa de'i gzi brjid kyis khyed kyi 'od nyams par gyur to// de 'ong ba la rjes su yi rang bar gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pas/ bdag cag ni
67a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa mdzad pa la'ang ltos shig ces byas so// de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis me long gi ngos la bdag gi gzugs mthong ba bzhin du
67a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thag ring po na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de mthong ngo // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ 'khor de dag la 'di/
67a3(mdo sde): skad ces smras so// ji ltar khyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'di mthong ba de bzhin du/ phyogs gcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
67a4(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang ltos shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni 'di ltar bdag nyid che ba yin te/ rang rang gi gnas na bzhugs bzhin du yang khyod la zhal ston par mdzad do// 'khor de dag gis smras pa/
67a5(mdo sde): kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar bdag nyid che ba yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba lta kyi hud ces zla zhing 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas
67a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag gis bskor ba yang mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga re re nas pad+ma rten po byung ngo // pad+ma chen po re ril yang grong khyer bdun khri
67a7(mdo sde): brgyad srong mong la / grong ze ngas kya yul yangs pacan gyims gru cam gas sa ste/ rin po 'i sde bdu byer dang / 'obs bdun rim gyis pa nor la gang ta' 'phreng 'dun mi gyis/
67b1(mdo sde): mdzes par byas pa shastag ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang ldan rnying dga' 'ga' ltar 'dagal/ rab de dag kyang 'jam smra nu ba'i gsan gyi ba gapa chen po gastag gis bsgo // bas/
67b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bar bar na yang shing ljon pa gzhon sha can 'bras bu dang / mi tog dang ldan pa snga mang po dge yod do// shing ljon pa de dag gi yal garlung gis bskyod bu las kyang // sil skya dga' bar
67b3(mdo sde): byed pa'i sgra snyan cing chags su rung ba 'byung ba sna lnga lnga sgrogs te/ sgra de dag gis sems cani de dag rtse zhing dga' dgur spyad // 'obs de dag thams cad kyang chubasil zhing she lnga bzhin du dang ba dag bri/
67b4(mdo sde): gang bar 'dug ste/ de dag gi nang kho khor yug tu/ sems can de dag rin po che'i gru dag gis brgal zhing rgyu bar byed do// chu de dag kyang pad+ma dang / ut+pal dang / ku ru du shing rta'i 'pheng lo tsam
67b5(mdo sde): sha stag gis brgyan to// 'obs kyi khor khor yug kyang skyed mos tshal gyi 'phreng bas mdzes par byas te/ skyong mos tshal re re la yang rdzing bu thug glu dpag tshad byed pa lnga lnga yod do// rdzing bu'i chung dag
67b6(mdo sde): byung ba d+ha dang / ung+yas dang / gu mung la dag sa tshigs drinam po shing rta'i 'bang la cang gastag gis lebs par 'dug la/ shing sbyi pa mi kri rgyas pa'i 'byung bas mdzes par byas so//
67b7(mdo sde): thos tsha lal bar yug na yang ngong du dang / ral mo dang / khrung khrung shugs ngag gis bad+ma'i ba 'bru byung bar byed do// kho khor lug gi myong mas tshal dang dpan lang ling khyi ma nga ga yong
68a1(mdo sde): khang pa re re la yang chu zheng du dpag tshad bzhi bzhi yod do// rtsig pa ni gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel las byas/ sa gzhi ni ke ke ru las grub pa ste/ nor
68a2(mdo sde): bu'i 'dzin tshar gyis spel cing / snang bar byas pa'i mu tig gi do shal sbyangs pa dang ldan pa/ graser gyi rta babs chen po dang / skar khung dang / dra ba dag gis brgyan pa'i khang bzangs mthon po/
68a3(mdo sde): sa gzhi gser gyi bye ma 'dal ba dang ldan pa shaM stag go// rdzing bu rnams kyang 'dul ba'i lam/ gser gyi them skas them pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa dang / mtha' thog thag gser gyi chu shing gi 'breng
68a4(mdo sde): bas mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i tsan dan gyi dri bsung can gyi chu dang ldan pa sha stag go/ grong khyer chen po de dag re re'i nang na yang rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/ de dag thams
68a5(mdo sde): cad kyang bud med kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa/ dpag tu med pa dag gis bskor cing / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// sems can gzhan dag kyang de dang /
68a6(mdo sde): 'dra ste/ sa phyogs ka tsa lin+da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab la/ me tog gi sil mus gtor ba/ gzhan dag na rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// grong khyer chen
68a7(mdo sde): po de dag na theg pa chen po'i sgra ma gtogs par theg pa gzhan gyi sgra med do// pad+ma chen po de dag la yang seng ge'i khri chen po/ rkang pa gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel las byas pa/ 1/
68b1(mdo sde): ling ka'i ras kyis g.yogs pa/ rje ba la 'os bA/ 'jig rten gsum na dul du b+ha ba she stag gis dkrigs te/ seng ge'i khri de dag la rgyal po de dga'akhod cing / sems can gzhan dag thegs/
68b2(mdo sde): chen po'i mdo sde rnams slob par byed de/ rgyal po de dag gi mdun na la la ni yi ga 'dri/ la la ni klog/ la lam kha ton slob bo// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung
68b3(mdo sde): mtha' yas kyis ba spu'i khung bu nas skyes pa'i pad+ma dag la 'khod pa'i sems can de dag/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i dga' ba dang ldan yang de dag yongs su spangs nas/ mya ngan gyis
68b4(mdo sde): gdungs te/ smre sngags 'don cing / kyi hud kyi hud ces bla zhing 'khod do// nyis 'gyur du mchod pa'i tshogs 'bul bar byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
68b5(mdo sde): chen po lus chen mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pas bskor te/ de lta bu'i 'byor pa'i rnam pa dag ston cing / mchod pa'i tshogs chen po dang / zhal zas rgya che ba dag khyer te 'ongs nas/
68b6(mdo sde): zhal zas de ngag dang / pad+ma de dag gi dri bsrung tshor ba gang yin pa de dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang mthong
68b7(mdo sde): bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas kyi lus kyi tshad kyang nam mkha' dang mnyam par 'dug ste/ sus kyang mthong bar mi nus so// de nas
69a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces/
69a2(mdo sde): gsol to// bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur te/ lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol kyang / bcom ldan
69a3(mdo sde): 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de bzhin du lce phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs logs nas kyang byang chub sems
69a4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'khor gyi tshogs chen po dang ldan pa sha stag lhags te/ de dag gis pad+ma dang / grong khyer gyi tshad kyang snga ma snga ma las nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur
69a5(mdo sde): gyis che ba dang / 'byor pa nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyis che ba sha stag dang chas te/ de dag der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma dag gis mchod pa byas te/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khor
69a6(mdo sde): do// shing sA la zung gi drung grub pa'i gnas de nyid ni/ dkyil 'khor sum cu rtsa gnyis tshad kyi khyon gyi sa gzhi la sems can mi 'khod pa'i go skabs ci yang med do// de nas byang chub
69a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de ltar lus che bar nga rang gi g.yog 'khor dag dang bcas pa de rnams kyang / kha cig ni sa phyogs sbyang bu'i rtse mo'i khyon tsam la 'khod do// kha cig ni khab kyi rtse mim
69b1(mdo sde): khyod tsam la 'khod do// kha cig ni rdul phra rab kyi khyon tsam la bas yangs su 'khod do// 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab kyi rdul sted dgun/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khod pa gang yin pa de babyung /
69b2(mdo sde): thabs de lta bur lhags te 'khong ngo // 'dzam bu gling gi sems can yang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs dang / gnas brtan kuni dga' bo dang / rgyal ngel skyes dgra rnams ma gtogs par / de
69b3(mdo sde): pasu yang med de/ tha na mi gdug pa dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / sdig pa dang / sdom la sogs pa las mi bzung ba bcu drug byed pa yan chad kyang der lhags so// sbyin byed ma'i bu dang / lA ma yin
69b4(mdo sde): rtag tu khon gyi bsam pa can thams cad kyang sdig pa'i las spangs nas/ gcig la gcig pu dang / ma dang / sring mo dang 'dra bar sems par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
69b5(mdo sde): khams na 'khod pa'i sems can thams cad kyang / gcig la gcig pu gcig pa la byas pa bzhin du byams par byed de/ 'dod chen po ni ma gtogs so// mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
69b6(mdo sde): yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus/ bong ba dang / rdo dang / gseg mdung / du ba dang / tsher ma med par gyur te/ shing ljon pa rin po che'i khri shing gris dkris pa/ mnyen zhing rag na 'jam/
69b7(mdo sde): bdag dang ldan zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can dang 'dra bar gyur to// sems can der lhags pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang de na 'khod bzhin du/ ji ltar mo long gi ngos la rang gi gzugs
70a1(mdo sde): brnyan snang ba bzhin du// rdul phra rab kyi rdul skyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byor pa dang ldan pa gzhan dug kyang mthong ngo // de nas/
70a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dam po dang dag po dang btsod kha dang / shel gyi kha dog lta bu dang / me lce lta bu dag byung ba gang yin pa de dag gis
70a3(mdo sde): pa thams cad byas te/ phyir log nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi zhal du zhugs te mi snang bar gyur to// 'khor thams cad kyi 'od kyang des zil gyis non par gyur to// de nas lha dang / mi dang /
70a4(mdo sde): ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'od zer de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du mi snang bar gyur pa mthong nas/ 'jigs shing spyi bung zhes byas te/ rgyu med per bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer rnams
70a5(mdo sde): phyir log nas mi snang bar 'gyur ba'i mi rigs nas/ gor mchag par phyogs bcu dag tu bya ba rnams zin nas/ da ni gdon mi za bar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mA ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro//
70a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gang las kyang zhal bsam bzhes na/ kye ma sems can thams cad la tshad med pa bzhi spangs sapa/ ci smyung bar bzhugs par chad dam/ kye ma ci nyi ma dang zla ba nub pam/
70a7(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos kyi gru bying ngam/ kyi hud kyi dud ces blang zhing 'khod do// de nas de dag rang rang gi yan lag rnams rmas par byas pa'i khrig gis sa gzhi 'dam du gyur to// chu klung gser ldan kyang khrag tu
70b1(mdo sde): par gyur to// de nas 'khor de dag gi nang na/ grong khyer ku shi pa mgar ba'i bu dge bsnyen skul byed ces bya ba de/ mgar ba'i bu bco lnga dang thabs gcig tu langs te/ rang rang gi spyong
70b2(mdo sde): 'am bac+doMs nas/ 'jig rten dgal bltas te/ pra gos phrag pa gcig tu ga zur nas/ bus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la gtsug te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba logs smrabral mo sbyar ba btud nas/
70b3(mdo sde): ma ma mi thub pa bzhin du zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad nges par sprul pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de
70b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma 'bul bar 'tshal te/ bdag ni mgon ma mchis pa lags/ rtsa lag ma
70b5(mdo sde): mchis pa lags/ skyabs ma mchis pa lags/ 'phongs te re ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad du gsol/
70b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/ khyim bdag gam/ bram ze shin tu dbul po 'ga' zhig gzhan gyi yul du mchis la/ bdag nyid spros paskyed de/ mthar gyis zhing blas brtsams nas// des chon
70b7(mdo sde): glang rmo sbyin pa thong gshol dang sbyar bdag gis zhing la rdo dang / rngub dang / tshe ma ma mchis pa bgyis te/ ri ba chen po bskyed nas/ sprin chen po las char 'bab pa la sdod cing mchis pa de bzhin du/
71a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lus kyi zhing la/ skyes pa gsum da / banyid du bral ba'i rid dang / drug gi rlon grang dang / shes 'i thong ga shol gyis nyon mongs panam /
71a2(mdo sde): rdzogs kyi rdo dang / rngub dang / tshulas mchis par bgyis nas/ khyong gyi chos kyi sbyin chen po las chos kyi char 'bab pa la rjod cing mchis tI dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par smra 'dren// 'a /
71a3(mdo sde): gi dbul ba bsal ba dang / sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du/ bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes su gsil/ bdag ni mgon ma mchis pa/ skyibs ma mchis pa lags na// de bzhin
71a4(mdo sde): gshegs pas bdag la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs par gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/ rgyal ba gang zag bla na med pas/ mgar ba'i bu skul byed
71a5(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skul byed de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ khyod kyi zhal zas tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po bzhes par
71a6(mdo sde): mdzad do// de nas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin de dag gis/ skul byed kyis phul ba'i zhal zas kyi tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas
71a7(mdo sde): pas bzhes so zhes thos nas/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos thob ste/ legs so zhes skad chen po phyung nas// mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces smras so// kye ma mgar ba'i bu skul byed
71b1(mdo sde): rgyung dab kyang kyis mi lus thob na pa phyogs pa gyur to// megs pa me so// yul byed 'dig rtenadu mdapal 'im ga shi tu mangs pa'i rnyed pang 'gro// das /
71b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dka'a'o// de bas kyang dang pa rnyed pa shin tu dkar re// de bas kyang ches rgyas thos pa rnye par bka'a'o// de bas kyang ches de bzhin ga shegs pa ldan sa
71b3(mdo sde): zas kyi tham dbul ba rnyed par dka' 'o// de bas na zhal zas kyi tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa mgar ba'i bu skul byed khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dper na ston zla 'bring po'i nyal sprin med
71b4(mdo sde): pa'i tshe/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa mdzes pa mthong ba na/ zla ba 'ba' zhig mngon du snang ba de bzhin du/ khyod kyis phul ba'i zhal zas kyi tha ma de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes pa nas/ da
71b5(mdo sde): 'ba' zhig sems can thams cad la mngon du snang ngo // khyod la yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal lo// skul byed khyod ni mi'i lus byed bzhin du/ lha'i yang lha yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
71b6(mdo sde): sras sgra gcan zin dang 'dra'o zhes byas nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// khyod ni mi mo yin te lha mchog yin// mi mchog gtso bo khyad par 'phags pa ste// dpyir khyod la
71b7(mdo sde): gsol pa 'di skad 'debs// ston pa yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar chas// bdag cag kun la brtse bas skul byed khyod// skye bo rnams la yul du phan pa'i phyir// 'dir ni ston pa dpag mod mgon
72a1(mdo sde): po la// bzhugs shing rgyun du bdud rtsi ston ces gsol// srid las rnam grol mya ngan 'da' bzhed la// gal te khyod kyis di ring ma gsol na// bdag cag thams cad ma ru
72a2(mdo sde): shes par gyis// de las phan phyir mgon la gsol ba thob// de nas la la zhig pha ma gnyis shi ba las phyir sos te gson por 'dug pa mthong na/ mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ba de kho na bzhin du//
72a3(mdo sde): mgar ba'i bu skul byed de mchog tu dga' bar gyur nas/ lag pa brkyang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas langs te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// kye ma deng bdag
72a4(mdo sde): rnyed pa legs par rnyed// mi yi 'jig rten skyes pa 'bras bu yod// da ni rnyed la sogs las 'bral mi 'gyur// mi bzad dmyal bar yang ni ltung mi 'gyur// deng 'dir rnyed pa chen po rnyed pa 'di//
72a5(mdo sde): gsar gyi phung po bas kyang lhag pa yin// dpa' bo bde gshegs mgon dang phrad pas na// phyin chad bdag ni dud 'gros 'jigs pa med// sangs rgyas la ni dad pa gting zug pa// dang rnyed u
72a6(mdo sde): du ma wa ra'i me tog bzhin// rab 'jigs yi dgas 'gro ba yongs spangs shing // lha min skye ba'i sa bon mi bzad bcom// de bzhin gshegs 'byung dkon dang de phrad pa// khab kyi rtse mor
72a7(mdo sde): yungs 'bru chags pa bzhin// de la pha rol phyin mchog sbyin phul bas// rtag tu lha yi 'gro bar 'bar bar gyur// chu gnas pad+ma nus mi chags pa lhor// drang srong chen po 'jig rten chos rnams
72b1(mdo sde): kyis// chags med phrad pas srid rtsi'i sabon kun// drungs phyung bdag ni 'khor ba'i mamatshan rgal// mtsho nang gi rus sbal nur ba'i mgrin// gnya' shing mig tu chung dka' 'dra ba lngas/
72b2(mdo sde): bde gshegs deng brang de la sbyin pa phul// de ni sa bdag gis nyon mongs gsog kun bcom// lha rnams kyis ni zhal zlas bzang po dang // phul yang bde gshegs ma bzhis bdag las ni/
72b3(mdo sde): e ra nang yi me tog 'dra ba zhos des// bdag ni 'jig rten rab mchog dpal yon can// tshangs pa brgya byin la sogs 'jig rten 'di// thams cad lhags te gus par bdag la mchod// myur
72b4(mdo sde): gnas su son pa gang yin 'di// skye ba 'di nyid la ni bdag gis thob/ de nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// mgon khyod mya ngan 'da' ba mthong nus
72b5(mdo sde): ni// 'jig rten 'di kun sdug bsngal gzir bar gyur// dbang med kyi hud ces ni skad cher zla// 'di dag ma dor rtag tu sras bzhin gzigs// lhun po'i gser gyi rtse mo rab mtho ba// mtsho
72b6(mdo sde): dbus na mdzes par gnas pa ltar// chos kyi mangs bdag khyod ni chos ston cing // dge 'dun dbus su mdzes par bzhugs su gsol// bai lhor cim gra bi can shar ba na// 'od zer drag kyi
72b7(mdo sde): sprini srab sel ba ltar// drang srong chen po ye shes smon chen gyis// skye ba mang ba' mya ngan dang pos la mdzod// sems can 'di dag dung mos mig spangs shing // sdug bsngal gcig du'i/
73a1(mdo sde): mtsho'i gting du zhugs// de phyir dad pa rnyed bka' bskyed mdzad cing // 'di rnams sdug bsngal chod la yun du zhugs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
73a2(mdo sde): skul byed la bka' stsal pa/ skul byed de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni u dum wa re'i me tog bzhin du shin tu rnyed par dka' 'o// dad pa yang rnyed par dka' 'o// chos
73a3(mdo sde): thos pa yang rnyed par dka' 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe/ zhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yang rnyed par dka'a'o// skul byed/
73a4(mdo sde): gzhan yang khyod ma du mya ngan ma byed par/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa thob bo snyam du dga' ba skyed cig/ de bzhin gshegs
73a5(mdo sde): bral bcom ldan 'das bzhugs su gsol zhes de skad du khyod gsol bam 'debs shig/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi de kho na nyid la rtogs shig/ mi rtag pa nyid la 'jug par gyis shig
73a6(mdo sde): rnams du shes pa gyis shig ces paka'astso nas/ tshigs su bca pa 'di dag gsungs so// na shin tu yang 'jig par 'gyur// 'di na thams cad ngas par
73a7(mdo sde): tsho ba'i 'dzi rten ma com can yin// 'gyis thams cad chu pa gnal par chung / ga tu yang cagapa sangs pa 'dzams// gzugs bza dme nga dkyis 'ag
73b1(mdo sde): srog ni rtsibs su nas 'byin par byed// 'jig rten kun na dam pa ci srung ma // drang drug me d+has yang me rtag ste/ skye ba'i sdug bsngal 'khor lor sa tu 'khor/ 'di rten pam
73b2(mdo sde): na ban po sul med// sring po sa 'grokun gsag tu 'dug/ srid pa 'jig pa'i chos chen rabasal ba/ 'di dag nan pong ba mang med// dang 'tshang nA dang chung nams kyi/
73b3(mdo sde): pas rtag tu kun nas gtse bar byed// srid pa mtha' med mi brtan snying po med// thams cad dgra dang 'khu bar shes par gyis// de na 'khor zhing nyon mongs dra ba yis// 'jig rten dkris te/
73b4(mdo sde): dar gyi srin bu bzhin// 'jig rten dag na ther zug gnod pa'i gzhi// rtag tu 'bras ltar sdug bsngal 'brel ba gang // mi gtsang lus dang 'dod pa de dag la// phan 'dod sdug bsngal bsal
73b5(mdo sde): 'dod su zhig dga'// mi rtag 'dod pa rnams la chags pa med// tshul bzhin rtogs pas 'dod chags bral bar 'gyur// de nas yang dag mthong na 'dod chags 'bral// de dag spangs
73b6(mdo sde): bcang grol ba nyid du 'gyur// nga ni srid pa'i chu chen legs par brgal// nga ni sdug bsngal rnams 'das bde bar zhugs// dpyir ngas ni mtha' yas spos med pa// chags pa kun bas pa
73b7(mdo sde): thar pa thob par gyur// nga la rga dang na dang 'chi ba med// ngal rtag tu tshe yang bang pa med// nga ni me ltar 'bar te 'gro 'gyur gyis// khyod kyis nga ni ming 'gyur ma sems shig/ de bzhin ga shes
74a1(mdo sde): nyid lhun po 'dra bar lto// nga deng yang dag mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// bde mchog de ni nga yi chos nyid de/ rgyal rnams spyod yul yin gyi khyod ma du/
74a2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ mgar ba'i bu skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ni de legs so// de ni de lags te/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni bdag gis kyang bsam
74a3(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab lags na/ sbrang bu dang 'dra ba'i sems can theg pa dman pa gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma bdag deng byang chub sems dpa' mi mchog skal ba chen po
74a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ mchod par 'os pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa dang / zag pa zad pa rnams dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur to// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/ gsar du bsnyen par//
74a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa gzhon nu yang rab tu byung ba de nyid kyi nyin par nas/ dge 'dun gyi nang na dge 'dun du bgrang zhing / yang dag par 'dus par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus
74a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po rnams kyi grangs su gtogs shing / yang dag par 'dus lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa yun du bzhugs par 'tshal gyi/
74a7(mdo sde): kha zas tshigs pa bzhin mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs pa ni mi 'tshal lags so// de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces smras
74b1(mdo sde): so// skul byed khyod 'di skad du/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa yun du bzhugs par 'tshal gyi/ kha zas tshig pa bzhin du mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs pa ni mi 'tshal lo zhes de skad ma zer cig/ 'dra
74b2(mdo sde): byed kyi rang bzhin blta bar bya mod/ de ltar lta ba gang yin pa de ni/ stong pa nyid bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dam pa'i chos 'dod pas ni de ltar bslab par bya'o// sru la/
74b3(mdo sde): byed kyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'jam dpal 'o na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i yang lha'i mchog tu gyur/ gal te 'du byed du gyur na/ lha'i yang lhar 'os pa ma yin no// 'du byed rnams ni chu bur
74b4(mdo sde): lta bur shes shing / shing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin du 'khor ba yin no// lha rnams ni mchog tu tshe ring zhes grags la/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni lo brgya yang mthub ste/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs
74b5(mdo sde): ba lha'i yang lhar 'os pa ma yin no// dper na mi la la zhig grong dpon byed pa las/ de mthar gyis dbang phyug chen por gyur nas/ blon po chen po'i dbang phyug las kyang 'das te/ rang gis
74b6(mdo sde): dbang phyug gi 'bras bu chos kyis rnyed pa la longs spyod pa las/ de'i phyir yang bsod nams zad cing / dbang phyug las nyams par gyur na/ gzhan gyis bkol zhing brnyas par 'gyur ba/
74b7(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbul por gyur pa'i phyir ro// de dang 'dra bar gal te de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed du 'gyur du zin na ni/ 'chi ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir/ lha'i yang lhar 'os pa ma yin no// btsun/
75a1(mdo sde): pa 'jam dpal de bas na// lha'i yang lha de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ de ltar 'du byed dang 'dra bar ma lda zhig/ 'jam
75a2(mdo sde): dpal gzhan yang ci khyod shes bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin du rtog par byed dam// 'on te ma shes pas rtog par byed/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed dang 'dra ba ni/
75a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gsum po dag na chos kyi dbang phyug brnyes pa/ lha'i yang lha mdzad pa'i 'os ma yin no// dper na rgyal po'i dbang po la la zhig la gyad stong gi mchog tu gyur pa'i gyad cig yod la
75a4(mdo sde): de gyang thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i phyir/ gyad stong thub ces bya ba'i ming thob ste/ de la gyang zla med pa'i phyir bla nas dbang thang chen po 'grub na/ ci gyad stong thub pa de'i ming de thos na skad grags pa/
75a5(mdo sde): de mi bden pa yin nam/ 'on te yon tan yod na ni/ yon tan can gyi ming thob pa yin no// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang / phung po'i bdud dang / lha'i// /
75a6(mdo sde): bu'i bdud dang / rang bzhin gyi bdud kyi gyad thams cad bcom pas na/ gyang stong thub bzhin du/ yang dag pa'i yon tan gyi sgo nas 'jig rten gsum po drag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
75a7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya ba yin gyis/ btsun pa'ajam dpal khyod de bzhini gshegs pa la 'du byed dang 'dra bar yongs su ma rtogs shig/ dper na lal zhes phyug ci na
75b1(mdo sde): mang ba'i rigs su skye bgrangs la/ che thung bar 'gyur ba zhig smra dres ma khan dag gis mthong nas/ khye'u 'dri ni che thung ngo zhes bstan te/ de'i bams de skad thos na/ 'din bdag drug
75b2(mdo sde): gi khyim du phan par 'gyur ba ma yin no snyam nas/ grangs su yang mi rdzi zhing / de la byams par mi byed do// de ltar skyes pa'am/ bud med dam lha'am/ tshangs pa lung drung ste/ ga
75b3(mdo sde): thung ba de la khyad du gsod par 'gyur na/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'ba' zhig la yang dag par gzhol ba nyid / 'du byed du gyur tu zin na/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis brnyas par 'gyur ro//
75b4(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi nang na ni/ phyir ltung ba med cing zad pa med pa la thar pa zhes bshad na// gal te de ltar gyur don med par 'gyur gyis btsun pa 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed du
75b5(mdo sde): gyur ces de skad ma gsung zhig/ dper na bud med gzhon nu dbul mo/ bkren pa/ mgon med pa/ nad kyis thebs pa/ par ma dor sdug bsngal bar gyur pa/ sbrum pas nyen pa zhig mgon ming kha
75b6(mdo sde): pa zhig tu song ba las/ bu mo dbu byung nas/ de na snga nas gnas pa gzhan dag gis de de'i nang nas bskrad de/ nyon mongs mad bu btsas ma thag tu byis kha mar khyer nas/ lo legs pa'i yul zhig
75b7(mdo sde): tu rgyas te song ba las/ lam du sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi tshan dang / sdig sbrul gyi gnod pas nyen par gyur te/ gang+gA'i klung chen po rgal bar 'dod pa las/ des rgal bar mdus
76a1(mdo sde): te/ khye'u de khyer bzhin du gang+gA'i nang du gshegs nas/ de bu de lta byams pa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par gyis lus dang bral te/ shi ba'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
76a2(mdo sde): du skyes te/ byams pa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par ji lta bu zhig gis skyes she na/ bdag ni shi yang bra'i/ khye'u 'di nyi zho med par thar par bya'o snyam pa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par gyis skyes pa de bzhin
76a3(mdo sde): du/ btsun pa 'jam dpal skyes bu dam pa dam pa'i chos 'byung bar 'dod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed du gyur par blta bar mi bya zhing / 'du shes kyang bsgyur bar mi bya'o// gal te dri lta
76a4(mdo sde): bu'i mig lus la med na yang / bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo snyam du/ yang dag pa'i lta bcon du bya'o// sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gdom dgra bston pas ni/ de bzhin
76a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'dus ma byas pa yin no zhes bstan par bya'o// dam pa'i chos 'byin par byed pas ni/ ji ltar bud med gzhon nu dbul mos gang+gA'i klung las bu bsgral ba'i phyir/ rang gi srog dang bsngos
76a6(mdo sde): te/ 'bad pa de bzhin du bya'o// dam pa'i chos 'byung ba'i thabs bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dus ma byas pa'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas
76a7(mdo sde): par mthong na/ bdag nyid kyi don du bya ba'i thar pa'i don rtogs par 'gyur ro// btsun pa 'jam dpal dper na mo la la zhig lam du 'gro bas dub par gyur te/ khyim gyi nang du nyal ba las/
76b1(mdo sde): tshe khyim de thog thag nas med chen por 'bar te/ mi de mes tshig pan/ da ni srog med zin no snyam nas/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa dang ldan pas/ bdag nyid gos kyis dmadud kris
76b2(mdo sde): sems dran pa dang ldan bzhin du shi nas/ dang rgya shes shing khrel yod par sems pa'i bsang nams kyi 'bras bu sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i rgyal srid ni lan brgyad rgyu byas/ tshangs pa'i tshul srid ni ldan
76b3(mdo sde): 'bum byas/ mi'i 'jig rten du yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lan du ma byas te/ ngan song rnams su yang mi sgrol/ lan mang du bde bgacig nas gcig tu brgyud pa 'ba' zhig thob pa
76b4(mdo sde): bzhin du/ 'jam dpal khyod skyes bu dam pa dag de ltar mdzes par gyis shig/ ngo rje shes par gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi thabs la 'jug pa spyod du ma zhugs shig/ dge
76b5(mdo sde): slong tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas pa yin no zhes pa zor ba bas ni/ mu stegs par gyur te shi yang bya'o// de
76b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas yin bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas yin zhes zer ba gang yin pa de dag ni brdzun du smra ba yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas yin no zhes par/
76b7(mdo sde): nga rnams ni/ rang gi khyim dang 'dra bar sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dus byas dang 'dra ba ma zhig/ dbyin chang 'khor bar/
77a1(mdo sde): rgyu ba nu/ mi shes pa las bzlas te/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'dus ma byas pa'o snyam pa'i shes pa 'ba' zhig rtogs pa gyis shig/ de ltar byas tang bsgom pa de'i//
77a2(mdo sde): 'bras bus khyod myur ba kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ mgar ba'i bu
77a3(mdo sde): skul byed la 'di skad ces smras so// legs so legs so// tshe ring bar gyur cig/ rigs kyi bus ni de ltar bya ba yin no// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang /
77a4(mdo sde): ther zug dang / 'dus ma byas pa dang / brtan par shes so// da ltar khyod kyis 'di kho na ltar/ 'dus byas khong rlag tu gtang ba'i sgo nas shes pa las na/ khyod kyang ring po mi thogs par de
77a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas nyid kyis kyang de ltar 'u bu cag gnyis kyis khyod du 'phags pa'i bsngags pa brjod do zhes phyis bsngags par 'gyur ro// skul
77a6(mdo sde): byed de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshos sgyur cig/ sbyin pa thams cad kyi nang na ni sbyar te/ sbyin pa mchog yin no// de la sbyar te sbyin zhes bya ba ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis
77a7(mdo sde): bon las myu gu 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir/ gang gi tshe dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mo yang rung ste/ don 'ga' zhig gi phyir lam du zhugs nas/ dub
77b1(mdo sde): par gyur pa de dag la ci yod pa dang / de'i rkyen du 'dzum pa dang / brtags pa'i sbyin pa byed pa de ni sbyar te sbyin pa zhes bya'o// skul bred de bzhin du khyod kyis ci yod pa lus zhal bas kyi rnam dang
77b2(mdo sde): yang rung // nyung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyad par yod kyang rung / khyad par med kyang rung ste/ 'dri mo du chug cig/ bcom ldan 'das yongs
77b3(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'dra' bar gshegs suH'o// de nas skul byed kyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'jam dpal khyod kha zas lnga chags sum ci na/ zhal zas myang yang rung /
77b4(mdo sde): yang rung dri mas shig ces/ bdag gi gzhan 'debs par byed/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyod pa mdzad na/ cing skad cig tsam yang bzhes mi spyod dam/ de bzhi/
77b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni rlos kyi sku yin te/ zhal zas kyi sku ma yin na/ ci bcom ldan 'das zhal zas gsol lam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal skul byed kyis
77b6(mdo sde): ji skad smras pa de ni de bzhin no// skul byed legs so legs so// khyod ni theg pa chen po la shes rab che ba'o// khyod ni theg pa chen po la shed bye ba'o// 'jam dpal gyis kyang 'dis
77b7(mdo sde): ces smras so// gal te de ltar bzhed par gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sku tshe ring bar shog cig/ skul byed kyis smras pa/ ci bdag 'ba' zhig la bcom ldan 'das mnyes sam/
78a1(mdo sde): te sems can thams cad la yang mnyes/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci bcom ldan 'das lta/ khyod dang bdag dang sems can thams cad la yang mi mnyes
78a2(mdo sde): samaskul byed kyis smras pa/ de skad ma zer cig/ gang la mgu ba yod pa de la ni phyin ci log gi 'du shes yod de/ 'u bu cag ni de la spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mnyes pa 'am/
78a3(mdo sde): dgyes pa med do// 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni ba be'u la byams pa'i phyir rtswa zos shing zos shing // grong nyid du 'ong ba de lta bu'i byams pa dang ldan pa ma yin gyis/ sems can thams
78a4(mdo sde): cad la yang sgra gcan zin dang 'dra bar gzigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi shes rab kyi yul ni de lta bu yin no// btsun pa 'jam dpal dper na/ rta cang shes dang sbar ba'i shing rta rgyug pa'i zla la
78a5(mdo sde): bong bu'i shing rta rgyug pa mi srid pa de bzhin du/ 'u bu cag bong bu'i shing rta dang 'dra ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang / 'dri ba dang / dgongs pa'i tshig dang / mnyam du 'gro
78a6(mdo sde): par nus re skan/ dper na nam mkha' lding dpag tshad du mar 'gro ba nu ma mkha' la gnas pas/ chu'i nang na nya dang rus sbal 'khod pa rnams me long gi ngos la rang gi gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin
78a7(mdo sde): du gsal bar mthong yang / byis pa rnams kyang ni mig mi gsal ba'i phyir/ de'i mig gi rtsal brjod par mi nus pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang de dang 'dra'o// 'jam dpal
78b1(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ skul byed de ni de bzhin te/ bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi che ba nyid gleng ba'i phyir de skad du brgal bar zad do// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
78b2(mdo sde): kyi zhal nas 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs bkye nas/ de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lus la phog go// de nas 'jam dpal gyis de rtogs nas/ mgar ba'i bu sul byed la smras
78b3(mdo sde): pa/ skul byed de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar rings kyis/ dus su bcom ldan 'das la bshos 'drim du chug cig/ mthogs shig/ rgyu med par bcom ldan
78b4(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhal nas 'od zer rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas skul byed cang mi zer bar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ skul byed la 'di skad ces bka'
78b5(mdo sde): stsal to// skul byed nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gror// dge slong gi dge 'dun la dus spu zas 'drim du chug ces lan gnyis lan gsum du bka' stsal to/ de nas
78b6(mdo sde): skul byed kyis 'od skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das mi bzhugs na ni/ 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro// bdag cag thams cad kyis ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa
78b7(mdo sde): gdab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ srul byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skul byed ma du zhig/ de ltar lus la rma ma 'byin nig/ mi'i lus chu shing bzhin du snying
79a1(mdo sde): po med par rtogs shig/ smig rgyu dang / dbu ba rdol ba dang / sgyu ma dang / rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i snod dang / glog lta bur khong du chud par gyis shig
79a2(mdo sde): 'dus byas ni nyes pa grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas yin no snyam du shes par gyis shig/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin la ltos shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ skul byed kyis 'di skad
79a3(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dang sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du zhugs su mi gnang na/ bdag ci'i slad du mi du lags//
79a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten stongs kyis ma mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ skul byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nga ni khyod la snying brtse ba dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse
79a5(mdo sde): ba'i phyir/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid dang / 'dus byas kyi chos nyid do// 'du byed thams cad mi rtag go zhes bya ba'i phyir tshigs su
79a6(mdo sde): bcad par khong du chud par gyis shig/ chos thams cad ni 'du byed dang 'dres pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o snyam du rtogs shig/ chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o snyam du spyod cig
79a7(mdo sde): brtan pa/ brtson ma// byin gyi log pa'i snyam du sems shig// lus 'dzin tes dmigs mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i snyam dugs par gyis shig/ 'dind dbu pa bar ltas la/
79b1(mdo sde): dra zhig/ yi ma chad cig de nas bcom ldan 'angs la/ skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin du 'dul lags na/ cang sdug/
79b2(mdo sde): bsngal chen po ma bzod lags so// bcom ldan 'das thabs kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad pa la ni/ bdag gro bi rings lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
79b3(mdo sde): stsal pa/ skul byed legs so legs so// rigs kyi bus ni nga'i mya ngan lus 'das pa/ thabs de ltar blta bar bya'o// skul byed sangs rgyas gshegs pa ni bye ba zhang zas la 'gro ba
79b4(mdo sde): lta bur shes par gyis shig/ skul byed tshe ring ba dang / tshe ring ba ma yin pa'i rtags shes par gyis shig/ skul byed chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i chos can no// de bzhin gshegs pa ni
79b5(mdo sde): chos thams cad la thabs kyi chos can yin la/ de rnams kyis kyang gos par mi 'gyur ba de ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rang bzhin no// skul byed khyod srid pa'i rgyam
79b6(mdo sde): las nges par brgal bar bya ba'i phyir/ zhal zas sbyar te 'on cig/ lha dang / lha mi yin dang / mi rnams kyis kyang nga la rang rang gi mchod pa byas nas/ mi g.yo ba'i bde ba thob par gyur
79b7(mdo sde): cig khyed kyis kyang snod du gyur pa la dus su sbyin par gyis shig/ ma thogs shig/ snod du gyur pa dang / nga dang de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni don tha dad pa ma yin no//
80a1(mdo sde): de nas skul byed kyis kyang sems can thams cad nges par bsgral ba'i phyir/ mgo smad de mchi ma blags nas gsol pa// legs lags so// legs lags/
80a2(mdo sde): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bdag gis bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ ji ltar blta ba de ni/ bdag cag
80a3(mdo sde): sbrang bu dang 'dra ba rnams kyi yul yang ma lags/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul yang ma lags so zhes gsol to// de nas mya ngan byed cing ngu bzhin du g.yog 'khor dang bcas
80a4(mdo sde): pas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te/ mchod pa chen po'i las byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas len du song ngo // /
80a5(mdo sde): 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das po theg pa chen po'i mdo las/ bam po gsum pa/ de nas de'i tshes chen po g.yos rab tu g.yis/
80a6(mdo sde): 'gul rab tu 'gul/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ 'khor rab tu 'khor/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ shig shig rab tu shig shig/ mer mer rab tu mer mer// ldem ldem rab tu
80a7(mdo sde): ldem ldem mo// de la sogs pa byas te/ mi mkhris pa'i nad kyis brgyal ba'i gnod pas thebs pa bzhin du/ sa chen po'i di rgya mtsho dug can pa'i mthas gtugs pa/ tshangs pa'i 'jig
80b1(mdo sde): rten man chang thog thag tu rab tu g.yos so// de nas lha dang / lha ma yin dang / mi de dag thams cad mgo rmongs te/ 'jigs shing spyi bung zhes byas nas/ ngu bzhin du tshig
80b2(mdo sde): mthun par tshigs su brjed pa 'di dag gsol to// mgon po khyod la bdag cag rnams// mgo bos phyag 'tshul gsol ba 'debs// rgyal ba khyu mchog khyod dang ni// bral na bdag
80b3(mdo sde): mgon med 'gyur// deng khyod mya ngan 'da' 'gyur 'di bsams na// bdag cag sdug bsngal shin tu gting zab bying // thub pa bdag cag snying ni ster bar gyur// ba bzhon kun khyer be'u la
80b4(mdo sde): chags pa bzhin// mgon meng dbul po'i ma ni la la zhig/ nad kyis thebs le sman pa med pa dang // rang dgar byed cing kha zas gnod pa rnams// za ba ji ltar mchi bar 'gyur ba bzhin/
80b5(mdo sde): skye bo 'di dag nyon mongs nad kyis thabs// khyod med khyod kyi chos kyi gsos med pas// lta ba'i nyes pa byed 'drar 'chi bar 'gyur// de bas phan phyir 'jig rten mdor cig/ ji ltar grong
80b6(mdo sde): khyer rgyal dang bral ba dang // dbul po rnams la mu ge byung ba dang // ji ltar dgon par skom gyis gdungs pa bzhin// khyod 'das 'og tu bdag cag de 'drar 'gyur// sems can gca
80b7(mdo sde): khyod mya ngan 'da' bzhed pas// sa gzhi rab tu g.yos shing phyogs kyang 'chol// rgya mtsho chen po dag kyang rnam par 'khrugs// bdag cag kun kyang sdug cing bsngal bar 'gyur/
81a1(mdo sde): drang srong chen po dang khyod mya ngan las// 'das na nyi ma'angs la lhung yang dag/ rgya mtsho chen po dag kyang bskam par 'gyur// bdag cag kun kyang deng du 'gum
81a2(mdo sde): lags grang // ji ltar stobs ldan mis ni sgo gas pa nas// glang chen khyer te nang du 'dzul bgyid pa// shin tu nyon mongs 'gyur ba de bzhin du// bdag cag thams cad rab tu nyon mongs
81a3(mdo sde): gyur// ji ltar bu gcig 'gum par mi 'tshal bzhin// mya ngan khyod 'da' bdag cag de mi 'tshal// gal te khyod ni mya ngan 'da' ba las// mi bzhed padag cag thams cad 'phongs par
81a4(mdo sde): 'gyur// khyod ni mya ngan 'das lam gshegs mthong bas// dud 'gro mang po'ang g.yar ngan rjer bgyid ni// bdag cag ji ltar g.yar ngan mi 'tshal lags// bdag cag mchil ma bani/
81a5(mdo sde): du ma dor cig/ nyi ma 'char kar rang gi 'od gsal bas// mun nag rnam par bcom pa de bzhin du// 'phrul can khyod kyis sdug bsngal mun gsal te// dge 'dun dbus su ri rab bzhin
81a6(mdo sde): du bzhugs// bcom ldan 'das dpar gsol na/ rgyal po la la zhig gi bu sdug cing 'phangs pa zhig mchis la/ des chos lugs kyi bstan bcos bslabs nas/ 'di sod cig ces
81a7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bdag bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal sras rnams kyang yang dag pa'i lta ba bskyed nas/ bkum gyi ma mchis na/ bcom ldan
81b1(mdo sde): 'das rgyal po'i bu ji lta ba de bzhin du/ bdag cag mi 'gum par/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du yun ring du bzhugs su gsol/ ji ltar la la zhig gzhung gis rtsod pa'i bstan bcos la bstan
81b2(mdo sde): ba na/ skrag par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ khyod kyis skrag par ma mdzad cig/ de kho na nyid mkhyen bzhin du bdag cag sems can dmyal bar mchis ma ma di cig/ dam pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi
81b3(mdo sde): bcud kyis tshim par mdzad cing de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du bzhugs su gsol/ ji ltar rgyal po'i btson rar gnod pa'i las rnams kyis/ dang por nyon mongs pa na/ la la zhig
81b4(mdo sde): gis khyod kyi na tsha ji lta bu zhig myong zhes smras na/ de ni de bzhin te/ gang gi tshe bdag sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba las thar par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ mya ngan las 'das pa yin te/ bde ba nyams su myong ba
81b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro zhes mchi ba de bzhin du/ bdag cag thams cad kyang khyod bzhugs na/ rgyal po'i btson ra nas thar pa bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa lags na/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring
81b6(mdo sde): du bzhugs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/ sman pa tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad pa la mkhas pas/ bdag gi bu la ni rgyud phyi ma slob par bgyid kyi/ slob ma la ni bdag dang
81b7(mdo sde): mi nyam par 'gyur du dogs nas slob par mi bgyid pa de bzhin du/ chos kyi rgyal po sman pa chen po ser sna mi mnga' ba khyod kyis theg pa chen po'i rgyud phyi ma la de ltar mi mdzad parabacom ldan 'das
82a1(mdo sde): yun ring du bzhugs su gsol/ de bzhin du shing rta shing rta'i rig byed la mkhas pas/ bdag gi bu la ni rgyud phyi ma sgra grag par phog pa'i dpyad thams cad slob par bgyid
82a2(mdo sde): kyi/ slob ma la ni slob par mi bgyid pa dang / rig pa'i gnas gzhan dag la yang de bzhin du sbyar ro// bcom ldan 'das dpar gsol na/ byis pa'am/ rgan po 'am/ nad pa la la zhig lam bzang
82a3(mdo sde): po las gol te/ lam ngan par mchis na/ shin tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das sems can lam ngan par mchis pa rnams lus dang bral ba'i 'og tu sems can dmyal ba/
82a4(mdo sde): rnams su sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur lags na/ bcom ldan 'das lam ston pa yun ring du bzhugs su gsol/ ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / tshigs su bcad pa bzhi bcu rtsa lnga la yang de
82a5(mdo sde): bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong khyed lha dang mi rnams ltar byis pa'i smre sngags 'don pa dag ma byed//
82a6(mdo sde): par brtson 'grus rtsoms shig/ de nas lha dang lha ma yin dang mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung blo gros dang / dran pa dang / de kho na nyid du 'gro ba thos nas/ ji ltar bu gcig pa shi nas dur
82a7(mdo sde): khrod du bor ba bzhin du de dag sdug bsngal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de dag la tshigs su bcad dbaka' stsal pa/ khyed rnams nges par bder gyur cig/ myangan
82b1(mdo sde): mabyed ma bu zhig/ 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos// thams cad mi smra 'khod par gyis// bag med par ni ma gnas par// bag yod pa la dgra' bar gyis// khyed stong pa dang stong pa ma yin pa
82b2(mdo sde): 'grod/ rtag pa dang mi rtag pa 'am/ skyabs dang skyabs ma yin pa dang / 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba 'am/ rten dang rten ma yin pa 'am/ zer zug dang ther zug ma yin pa 'am/ brtan pa dang brtan pa la
82b3(mdo sde): yin pa 'am/ sems can dang sems can med pa 'am/ yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa 'am/ bden pa dang bden pa ma yin pa 'am/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa/
82b4(mdo sde): 'am/ gsang ba dang gsang ba ma yin pa 'am/ gnyis dang gnyis su med pa 'am/ de bzhin du chos rnam pa du ma dag/ som nyi 'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tsom zab ci dang ci yod pa de dang de dag
82b5(mdo sde): zhus shig dang / thams cad gcad par bya'o// bdud rtsi'i mchog kyang khyed la bstan par bya ste/ de'i 'og tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o// dge slong dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'
82b6(mdo sde): 'i// mi lus thob pa rnyed par dka'a'o// ngal ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka' 'o// bzod pa dang / tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa ma zhig ma rul ba yang shin tu rnyed par dka'a'o// 'jig
82b7(mdo sde): rten na dgra bcom pa thob pa ni/ gser gyi bye ma dang / u dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin du rnyed par dka' 'o// dge slong dag 'di lta ste/ sa ni thams cad kyi sgo nas sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba yin te/
83a1(mdo sde): de bzhin du nga'i chos bstan pa rnam pa sna tshogs gsang ba/ thar pa'i grong khyer gyi bdud rtsi'i zas kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o// sems can thams cad dang nga'i sras
83a2(mdo sde): dge slong thams cad la dam pa'i chos mang po brtan por bzhag go// gzhan yang sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan che ba nyid bsgrags te/ yi ge 'bru gcig pa'i
83a3(mdo sde): thig le'i gtam yang bzhag nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o// de nas dge slong de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da'a'o zhes thos nas/ mi
83a4(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur te// skyi bung zhes byas nas/ mig mchi mas gang bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan mang du bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan
83a5(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis sdug bsngal ba dang / mi rtag pa dang / bdag med pa dang / rjes thams cad kyi nang na glang po che'i rjes ches mchog yin par brtan to zhes
83a6(mdo sde): gsungs te/ de ltar mi rtag pa'i 'du shes bsten cing bsgoms te mang du bgyis pas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/
83a7(mdo sde): gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/ ma rig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal thams cad ma lus par yang dag par chad par 'gyur lags so//
83b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/ ston gyis dus su zhing pas rmos cher btab ste/ rtsa ba 'dzings pa thams cad sel bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa'i 'du shes bsten cing
83b2(mdo sde): bsgoms te mang du bgyis pas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod cha grangs cad zad par 'gyur/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/ gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/
83b3(mdo sde): ma rig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal thams cad ma lus par yang dag par zad par 'gyur ro// zhing las thams cad kyi nang na ni sngon gyi zhing las mchog tu bstan to zhes bya ba la
83b4(mdo sde): sogs pa glang po che'i rjes lta bu'i mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/ rgyal po 'chi ba'i tshe/ bdag gis btson ra bsal te/
83b5(mdo sde): sems can rnams btson ra'i gnod pas nyon mongs pa las thar par bgyis nas/ de'i 'og tu 'chi bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis kyang / sems can mi shes pa rnam pa sna chog
83b6(mdo sde): kyi btson ra brubs pa rnams kyi mi shes pa'i 'ching ba rnams bcad nas/ de'i 'og tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang dper gsol na// sems/
83b7(mdo sde): can 'byung po dang sha za'i gdon gyis brlams pa las/ sman chen po dang phrad na/ 'byung po dang sha za'i gdon rnams kyis thabs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ khyod dang mngal
84a1(mdo sde): na nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad mi shes pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'byung po dang / sha za'i gdon rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid khong //
84a2(mdo sde): du chud par bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/ glang po che'i 'dul sbyong gi mkhan pos/ spos kyi glang po che zhags pa chen pos bcings pa las/ glang po chos zhags pa de/
84a3(mdo sde): bcad de bros pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang / bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin pa dang / phrag dog dang / dang na then dang / ser sna dang / g.yo'i zhags pa chen/
84a4(mdo sde): po bcad nas/ glang po che'i 'dul sbyong gi mkhan po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i lag tu 'ongs nas/ sems can thams cad las dang nyon mongs pa'i glang po lnga bcu rtsa bdun yongs su bsal
84a5(mdo sde): bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gsol na/ grang ba'i rims kyis thebs pa sman pa chen po'i thad du mchis na/ sdug bsngal las thar par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
84a6(mdo sde): cag kyang nyon mongs pa dang / log par lta ba dang / log pa'i 'tsho ba nyes dmigs mtha' yas pa'i grang ba'i rims nad can gyis lus dang ldan pa las/ sman pa chen po bcom ldan 'das
84a7(mdo sde): kyi thad du mchis nas/ sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par thar par gyur te/ mi g.yo ba'i bde ba yang thob lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang dper gsol na/ mi zhig gis 'dra/
84b1(mdo sde): skyems 'tshal te/ ru ro bar gyur nas// bdag nyid kyis kyang bdag nyid ma 'tshal te/ chos kyang ma 'tshal/ chos ma lags pa yang ma 'tshal te/ 'di ni bdug gima'o// 'di ni bdag gi
84b2(mdo sde): sdong mo'o// 'di ni bdag gi bu mo'o sam du yang mu 'tshal lo// snang cing bra ste/ byis dang gcin gyis rang gi lus kun bsgos shing mchis pa las/ de'i 'og tu bdag nyid spangs te/
84b3(mdo sde): ci las gyur pa la mkhas par gyur nus/ tshang ni cir yang mi rung ngo snyam du sums te/ bdag ni sdig pa thams cad lus thar to snyam nas/ chang 'thung ba cir yang mi rung bar shas cher bsgoms
84b4(mdo sde): spong bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das 'tsho ba'i 'jog rten 'don zlos gar mkhan bzhin du thog ma ma mchis pa nas/ 'khor ba na 'khor zhing yongs su 'khyam pa na/ 'di ni bdag gi
84b5(mdo sde): ma'o// 'di ni bdag gi sring ma'o// 'di ni bdag gi bu mo'o snyam du ma 'tshal nas/ ma dang / sring mo dang / bu mo rnams dang / lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i 'du shes spyod par bgyid de/ 'bras
84b6(mdo sde): skyems kyis ra ro bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ sdug bsngal rnyed par 'gyur la/ de nas ngo tsha shes pa'i mi de dag 'bras snyems kyi sar ro ba la sras nges pa bzhin du/ cir yang mi rung bar shes cher
84b7(mdo sde): bsgoms nas// sdug bsngal las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang er nang la ni snying po mchis mi srid pa de bzhin du/ lus 'di la yang bdag dang / sems can dang /
85a1(mdo sde): srog dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po mchis mi srid de/ de lta bur bdag cag gis bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgom/
85a2(mdo sde): te na mang du bgyis lags so// dper gsol na/ phub ma skon pa bye ma snyed bor ba ni cir yang mi gces pa de bzhin du/ lus 'di la yang bdag ma mchis so// dper gsol na/ kha sral
85a3(mdo sde): gyi me tog la dri gda' ba ma mchis pa de bzhin du/ lus 'di la yang bdag ma mchis te/ de ltar bdag cag gis pa dge ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms te/ mang du bgyis lags so//
85a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / dge slong dag chos thams cad ni bdag med pa ste/ de ltar sgoms shig dang / de ltar bsgoms pa rnams kyis kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa spong bar 'gyur ro//
85a5(mdo sde): bdag tu 'dzin pa yongs su spangs na/ mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad bdag ma mchis pa'i slad du/ bdag ma mchis pa'i
85a6(mdo sde): 'du shes bsgoms te/ mang du bgyis lags so// gzhan yang ji ltar nam mkha' bya'i rjes gda' ba ni mi srid pa de bzhin du/ bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms na lta ba'i rnam pa thams
85a7(mdo sde): cad dang bral bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsgom pa de ltar bsgom pa khyod kyis shes sam/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal
85b1(mdo sde): dang / mi rtag pa dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes dem lags par bsgom na ni/ ji ltar mi tshe ning 'khyam pas/ lha khang dang / sngo dang / sa gzhi dang / nyi ma dang // zla ba dang / shring dang /
85b2(mdo sde): rnams mi 'khor bzhin du 'khor bar mthong ba de bzhin du/ gang dag gis sdug bsngal dang / mi rtag pa dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes ma bsgom pa'i sems can 'jig rten pa de dag ni/ ra ro ba dang
85b3(mdo sde): 'dra bar blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni yang dag par bsgoms lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ni dpe 'di'i don
85b4(mdo sde): ngas bshad par bya'o// khyed kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i don 'di la// don ni 'di'o// yi ge ni 'di'o zhes gsal bar mi shes te/ ji ltar mi ra ro bas lha khang dang / spo dang / sa gzhi dang / nyi ma
85b5(mdo sde): dang na zla ba dang / shing dang / ri rnams mi 'khor bzhin du 'khor bar mthong ba de bzhin du/ 'du shes phyin ci log du mas zin cing / kun tu rmongs pa rnams bdag go snyam pa dang / rtag go snyam pa
85b6(mdo sde): dang / bde'o snyam pa dang / sdug go snyam pa'i 'du shes kun tu spyod do// de la bdag ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i don to// rtag ces bya ba ni chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i don to// bde zhes bya
85b7(mdo sde): ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don to// sdug ces bya ba ni chos kyi tshig bla dgas/ dge slong dag khyed kyis bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni/ sdug bsngal dang / mi rtag pa dang / bdag
86a1(mdo sde): med pa'i 'du shes sgoms lags so zhes/ rgyags pa dang nga rgyal gyis dregs par ma byed cig/ de ltar rnam pa gsum bsgoms par gyur na ni/ nga'i bstan pa la khyed kyi/
86a2(mdo sde): bsgom pa rnam pa gsum bsgoms pa de/ bsgom pa don med par 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal shes par bya ba bsgom pa rnam pa gsum ni/ khyad par dang / khyad par gyi yang khyad par ro// sdug bsngal
86a3(mdo sde): la bde'o snyam du 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o// bde ba la sdug bsngal lo snyam du 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o// mi rtag pa la rtag go snyam du 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o// rtog pa la mi/
86a4(mdo sde): rtag pa'o snyam du 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o// bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa ni bIn ci ldog pa'o// bdag yod pa la bdag med par 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o// mi sdug pa la
86a5(mdo sde): sdug go snyam du 'du shes pa ni phyin ci ldog pa'o// sdug pa la mi sdug go snyam du 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa ste/ phyin ci log bzhi po 'di dag yang dag par ma shes par khyed kyis bsgom par bya ba
86a6(mdo sde): bsgoms te mang du byas so// khyed kyis bde ba la sdug bsngal bar bsgoms so// rtag pa la mi rtag pa dang / bdag yod pa la bdag med pa dang / sdug pa la mi sdug par bsgoms so// 'jig
86a7(mdo sde): rten pa rnams la yang bde ba dang / bdag dang / rtag pa dang / sdug pa rnams yod do// 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams la yang bde ba dang / bdag dang / rtag pa dang / sdug pa rnams yod do//
86b1(mdo sde): 'di la phan tshun mi mthun pa yod do// yi ge zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go// don rjes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
86b2(mdo sde): la/ dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'du shes bzhi la sogs pa phyin ci log de bzhin gshegs pas lugs su bzhag pa rnams ni/ bdag cag gis yun ring mo
86b3(mdo sde): niganas mthong yang mthong / bsgom yang bsgoms lags na/ daji ltar 'tshal ba bka' stsal du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa'am/ bskal pa lngas lhag par yang bdugs su
86b4(mdo sde): gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pas ci dang ji skad du bka' stsal pa de dang de bzhin du bdag cag gis bgyi bar 'tshal lo// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs su mi gnang na/ bdag cag kyang
86b5(mdo sde): sbrul gdug pa dang khyim gcig gi nang du lhan cig tu mchis par mi 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs na/ tshungs par spyod cing mchis pa'i rngo mi thog gis/ khyod nyid kyi slad bzhin du
86b6(mdo sde): bdag cag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag khyed de skad ma
86b7(mdo sde): zer cig/ dge slong dag ngas 'od srungs kyi lag tu bstan pa gtad bar bya ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar dge slong rnams kyi rten lta bur 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams dang sems
87a1(mdo sde): can rnams kyi skyabs lta bur 'gyur ro// dper na rgyal po grong khyer mang po'i mnga' bdag grong khyer gcig tu song ste/ khyim bdag gcig rgyal por dbang bskur ba de bzhin/
87a2(mdo sde): du'ajig rten gyis khams 'dir ngas 'od srungs chen po la dbang bskur ro// dge slong dag khyed kyis sdug bsngal ba dang / mi rtag pa dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa'i 'du shes ji ltar bsgom/
