263b1(mdo sde): de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dag pa'i gnas zhes bya/
263b2(mdo sde): bsnang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams de na sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyi bla mar me'i 'od ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang na bas
263b3(mdo sde): su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi ning
263b4(mdo sde): bde ba can zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'ang shin tu mnyam zhing gzhi bai DUR+Ya las byas pa/ gser btsoms thig re'ur bres pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing bskyed pa/
263b5(mdo sde): shing de dag kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam du mtho ba/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / yal ga dang / 'dab mas shin tu brgyan pa/ rlung mi drag pas bskyod pas sgra snyan pa 'byung ba/
263b6(mdo sde): sgra de dag so so'i skye bos thos pas mi ngoms pa/ skabs skabs na chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / khrus kyi rdzing bu yod la/ yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ning
263b7(mdo sde): rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye mas bdal ba/ rdzing gi ngos bzhin bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog pad+ma dang / pur+Na ri ka dang / pa ri sha ka dang / de ma yin pa me tog sngon po dang
264a1(mdo sde): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam chu'i steng yongs su khebs te/ chu'i nang na'ang bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyang shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i/
264a2(mdo sde): sgra snyan pa 'byin to// rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru yod de/ den sems can mang po 'dod dgur rtse ning longs spyod do// rin po che'i shing gri bar bar na seng ge'i
264a3(mdo sde): khri mtho khyad dpag tshad gcig pa bshams nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi na bzas khri'i steng du rim par bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'thul ba/
264a4(mdo sde): rdzas kyi me rtog gis chal par bkram pa'i khri de la de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla mar me'i 'od skyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed mdun du
264a5(mdo sde): dar te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la so so nas tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od bzang po kha dog sngon
264a6(mdo sde): po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar por bcas pa dang ldan pa/ rab tu gsal ba/ dper mi bzod pa 'di shar phyogs logs su 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang bar gyur te/
264a7(mdo sde): gang la 'od kyis reg pa thams cad lus sems bde bar gyur pa/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs
264b1(mdo sde): kyi bu legs par nyon la shin tu yid legs par zung zhig dang / khyed la dgrol bar bshad bar bya'o// 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig bca stong 'das pa'i
264b2(mdo sde): pa rol na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang nabs su ldan pa/
264b3(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla ni med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor nas
264b4(mdo sde): 'khor mang po thams cad la thabs mkhas pa chen po dri ldan bsab pa'i mdo sde ston cing / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi log par lta ba'i zug
264b5(mdo sde): rngu rtsad nas 'don pa'i phyir/ sems thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg pa
264b6(mdo sde): gcig gi lam la dgod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cing / sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyis
264b7(mdo sde): drin lcigyi ba dran par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las sgrol ba'i phyir/ so so'i skye bo dag pha ma la sri nu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir 'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no//
265a1(mdo sde): de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po'i gtso bo dang ston par gyur pa stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs te/ bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas nas
265a2(mdo sde): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag rnams mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
265a3(mdo sde): der mchi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa dang / bkur stir bgyi ba dang / thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin ldan bsab pa'i mdo sde dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin
265a4(mdo sde): gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas/
265a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing bkur sti bya ba dang / shin tu phrang dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa
265a6(mdo sde): gzug khrig gis dun tu su da ga ba mam malapa 'dim ces pa mag/ la mngon pa mngasargyas pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams smyig brnyan pa
265a7(mdo sde): kyil / sa rim ma mags pa song pa'i gnas su sems can dag rgya tsha mangs pa dang sal pa/ mtsham sa mang bsnga med ga par dzu gas pa'i sa yang
265b1(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas te/ phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bcad de/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byas nas/ chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs shing lhag ma ma lus pa'i
265b2(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nges thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas/ khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der byin nas
265b3(mdo sde): ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar gnas par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis tshig mthun
265b4(mdo sde): par bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re'ang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor te
265b5(mdo sde): mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der song ste/ de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang du phyin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'od zer chen po'ang kun tu snang bar
265b6(mdo sde): gyur/ steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis me tog mnur ba dang / man+dar ba chen po 'ong char bzhin pab 'o// 'ong bar chen pos snang bar byas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi
265b7(mdo sde): khams gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyeng dag kyang g.yos so// de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyis rol mo tshad med pa brgya stong snyed kyang steng gi bar snang lam dkrol bar rang bar bzhin du byang chub

266a5(mdo sde): blanu med pa/ skyon brgyal ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi nang da'ang shin tu mnyam ning ga ni bi DUn las byas pa
266a6(mdo sde): gsar btsems thig re'ur bres pa/ rin po che sde bdun gyi shing bskyed pa/ shing de dag kyang mnga' rgyang gang tsam du mthong/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / yal pa dang / 'du

268a3(mdo sde): dge ba bcu rdzogs par spyad pa'i gnas der mngon par sangs rgyas te/ phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bcad de/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byas nas/

268b1(mdo sde): par 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tum yos te/ 'ong bar chen po'ang na snang ba gyur/ snreng ga bang snang las lha rnams kyis me tog sun ra ba dang / man+da ba chen pong ba'i /
268b2(mdo sde): babag/ 'od sa na pas snang bar byas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA klung gi d+hI smra kya grus so// dri ba yin pag rgyu mam
268b3(mdo sde): pa brgya stong snyed kyang steng gi bar snang lam dkrol bar rang bar bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang bya rgod spungs pa'i rig la ba der de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas
268b4(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de bzhin du phyogs mtshams bzhi dang / steng dang / 'og gi phyogs
268b5(mdo sde): dang phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyis so so nas 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas
268b6(mdo sde): bachod pa dang bkur sti byas/ mchod pa byas nas/ thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la yongs su bstod do// de ltar sangs
268b7(mdo sde): rgyas la bstod nas kyang phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang yongs su dag par gyur te/ ri wang khrong dang / ri chen po dang / chung ngu dang
269a1(mdo sde): gtsang po dang / chu klung dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing dang / lteng ka dang / shang shong dang / ngam grog dag med cing / de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang
269a2(mdo sde): 'od kyis snang bar byas pas sangs rgyas gang na ba der lhags nas dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems kyis thal mo sbyar ba btud nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ mig mi 'dzums par chags
269a3(mdo sde): pa'i yid kyis lta zhing 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer phyir 'dus par mdzad de 'od zer de dag gis sku la lan bdun bskor nas dbu'i spyi gtsug tu nub par gyur to//
269a4(mdo sde): de ltar gyur pa kun dga' bos mthong nas 'khor mang po thams cad kyang the tsom skyes par sems kyis rab tu shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa thabs mkhas pa mngon par bstan
269a5(mdo sde): pa dang phyis ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo dag gi shes rab kyi mig dbye ba dang / so so'i skye bo thams cad sreng pa'i chu klung las brgal zhing pha rol tu phyin pas bde ba la dgod pa dang / so so'i sgyu
269a6(mdo sde): dag pa ma dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma'i drin lci ba dran zhing shes par bya ba'i phyir stan las langs nas gos tshags su bcos nas bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas te/ bus mo sa la
269a7(mdo sde): gtsugs nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kun dga' bos sangs rgyas kyi zhabs 'bring na mchis na 'dzum
269b1(mdo sde): pa mdzad pa mthong ste/ 'di la nges par dgongs pa ni mnga' na 'khor mang po'i the tsom gyi dra ba gcad pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ sangs rgyas kyis
269b2(mdo sde): bshad du gsol/ thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan byas pa pa'i mdo las gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gcig go// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor ma
269b3(mdo sde): be'i 'dus pa der rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i pad+mo'i sdong po dngul las byas 'dab ma ni gser las byas gzhi ni rin po che shel las byas pa/ mu tig gi dra bas kun tu brgyan pa
269b4(mdo sde): gcig de nyid nas byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa las bzhengs nas pad+mo de la skyil mo krung bcas nas bzhugs so// de la bzhugs ma
269b5(mdo sde): thag tu yongs su dag pa'i sku mngon par bstan to// sku de las lam rgyud lnga'i lus kyi tshogs bstan lus kyi cho ga sa re re la'ang gzugs tha dad pa rnam pa khri brgyad stong skyed bstan to//
269b6(mdo sde): gzugs rnam pa de re re la'ang sku'i tsho gas bstan rdul phra rab kyi sku'i tshogs bad+ma stong snyed bstan sku'i tshogs de dag re re la'ang gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi sku'i tshogs skyed
269b7(mdo sde): bstan to// gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la'ang gling bzhi'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs bstan/ rdul phra rab kyi sku'i tshogs de dag ri ri la'ang stong gsum gyi stong
270a1(mdo sde): na sa rdul na seM su tshigs sa to// thul sa sa sa
270a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi ning dbye ba khrag khrig brgya skyong gi rdul phra rab kyi sku'i tshogs bstan nas/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyis gas pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam hA/ bsam gyis mi khyab paskyed

271a3(mdo sde): mi rtag pa la rtag par lta/ mi bde ba la bde bar lta/ mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar lta zhing / skyes pa dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi bas gzir te/ skad cig tu mi
271b1(mdo sde): rtag pas bsgribs pa lnga dang / kun nas grags pa bcus kun tu thags te/ srid pa gsum du 'khor zhing skye shi thog ma dang ba ma med pa myong bar gyur to// de bas na de bzhin
271b2(mdo sde): gshegs pas ci dang cir 'phrod pa bzhin sde snod gsum dang / mdo sde dgu nas mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi bar du rnam par phye zhing bstan te/ so so'i 'dod pa bzhin mdo sde mang po gsungs so//
271b3(mdo sde): tshig la chags pa kha cig bdag mi 'di kho nas cho ga ste mya ngan las 'das pa thob ces 'dzin pa'ang yod do// de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi thugs rje chen po'i smon lam gyi shugs/

271b5(mdo sde): gsungs par dgongs te/ gzugs brnyan gyi chos nam du rgyun mi 'chad cing so so'i skye bo thams cad bde ba chen po thob par mdzangad ngo // de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'dum
271b6(mdo sde): ni rtson pa'ang ngas las mi sel bar gshegs/ dus las ma yol bar mya ngan las 'da' 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams khacig tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang ma dang ces bya

272a4(mdo sde): de 'dzin yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// klu'i mthu'ang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 'di ni sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi thugs
272a5(mdo sde): la dgongs pa shes par 'dod na sems can dbang po zhan pa tha ma'i bar du'ang kun shes par mdzad do// sems can thams cad las gang yang sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod na/

272b1(mdo sde): sa /
272b2(mdo sde): rnas pa sa sa
272b3(mdo sde): 'a/ des makyang byas bzhi gshegs pa la stor ba pa ba shin du ba ba mi rlob spobs pa gyur/ nga kyis sa pabang ni 'jug pa ma bya mas
272b4(mdo sde): snying brtse ba yin te/ ngan 'gro gsum gyi lam bkas nas wA dang mi'i lam gtong ba yin no// kun dga' bri ngas khyod lab mal mi nu bya pa'i sgong dka' ba'i bang tsam zhig byan pa khya
272b5(mdo sde): legs pa banyon la yid la du zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces
272b6(mdo sde): stsal to// sngon byung ba bskal pa tshad med pa mtha' yas grangs med pa 'das pa'i pha rol na yul wA rA NA sir sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa
272b7(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa
273a1(mdo sde): / smra
273a2(mdo sde): dmas rgyas kyang bsal pa nga gnas pa// gzugs par kyis kyang la gan la// gzugs
273a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten du byung ste/ yul wA rA Na si la dbang sgyur ro// rgyal po de la btsun mo na nyi khri yong/ blon pa na ba stong skyed yod/ bral gyi grang bache'ang lnga brgya mA / rgyal ldan d+hu
273a4(mdo sde): la dbang / grong khyer brgyad brgya zhig yod/ rgyal po dal bu gsum yod do// gsum car yang rdul zan re byed do// de de'i dusan yul b+hA rA Na si'i rgyal po dmakhas pa'i sa
273a5(mdo sde): rab dang ldan te/ rtag tu'ang dam pa'i chos kyis yul gyi srid 'dzin pas/ gang yang skams las rbad ces bya med do// rgyal po'i bsod nams dang yon tan gyi mthus char chu dus las
273a6(mdo sde): mi yol te/ lo tog rgyun du legs pas/ de na gnas pa'i mi rnam kyang bde skyid do// de'i tshe na wA rA Na si'i rgyal po de la blon po chen po sgra gcan zhes bya ba zhig yod do// blon po sgra
273a7(mdo sde): gcan rgyal po la 'khus nas/ dmag rnam pani bshams pa la 'di lta ste/ bgrang gi tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs bshams nas/
273b1(mdo sde): wA rA Na si'i rgyal pol brgol nas rgyal zab srog bcang do// de ltar rgyal po bas nas kyang dmag gi tshogs rnam pa bani brtsenas/ mnga'i rnam dran bur rab kyang bas dang / da
273b2(mdo sde): rgyal bu 'bring po'ang phab nas/ mtha'i rgyal phran rgyal bu tha chung gi thog tu dmag drang bar bshams so// rgyal bu tha chung ngo ngo mtshar du gzugs byang bzang la 'phags par mdzes shing
273b3(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyis dge ba dul ba/ 'dzum zhing smra ba/ smra'o cog kyang phan pa'i don du smra zhing 'gyur gyi/ gnod pa med pa rtag tu drang po'i chos kyis yul gyi srid 'dzin te/ logs pas mi
273b4(mdo sde): 'tsho bas yul mi rnams kyang bde skyid la ngar ba/ longs spyod dang nor ni rin po cher ldan pa/ bang mdzod gang ba/ rgyal po de'i yon tan la kun gyis bsngags shing ba stong pa bar snang gi
273b5(mdo sde): lha dang 'jig rten gyi lha thams cad kyis kyang dga' zhing bkur ba/ de'i tshe na rgyal po de la rgyal bu su sha de ba zhes bya ba gcig pu zhig yod de/ shin tu yid gzhungs shing gsal pa// byams
273b6(mdo sde): pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ lus kyi mdogs gser du 'dug pa/ gnas bdun mnyam par gang ba/ skyes bu'i mtshan rdzogs par ldan pa/ lo bdun lon
273b7(mdo sde): bzhis yong pa de sa ra brgyas pa rang shin tu byams shing sdug pa'i sems so// de'i chen po zang bsrung ba'i lhang sa rgyal ba de la 'di ga kyis sgom pa// rgyal pa mkhyen tam/ blon pam/
274a1(mdo sde): na / sa
274a2(mdo sde): dpag gi rdzogs rnams ring ma mthags par 'di ts+tshin+dan/ rdul bcu'i byi mos sgrubs shing gang dus gro na rgyal ba nga du nA rjes smras pa thasams/
274a3(mdo sde): k+Shi ba s+tha kun gling shes byed de/ lus kyang 'dar nas yi mug cing mya ngan gyis sems gdungs// sa l-i 'gro zhing brtul bar gyur nas/ ri zhig lon pa dang cung zad sangs/ dem
274a4(mdo sde): gyis nam mkha'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar smra ba'i skad ni yod la gzugs ni mi snang ba khyod ci yin/ smras pa'i tshig 'di yang dag par bden nam/ lhas smras pa/
274a5(mdo sde): ba dag ni rgyal po'i pho brang srung ba'i lha yin te/ rgyal po khyod shes pa dang ldan zhing bsod nams dang yod tan du bcas pas/ drang po'i chos kyis yul srid 'dzin te/ ngo bas na bdag
274a6(mdo sde): gis sngar smras pa yin te/ sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs par ma gyur par myur du byol zhing 'gro ba'i rigs so// de nas rgyal po de pho brang du zhugs nas/ da ni bdag yul gzhan
274a7(mdo sde): zhig tu 'gro dgos so snyam du bsams so// yang 'di snyam du bsams so// yul pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam gnyis yod do// lam nye bar zhugs na ni zhag bdun gyis pha rol
274b1(mdo sde): tu phyin par 'gyur/ lam ring por zhugs na mi gag bcu bzhis phyin par 'gyur bas/ ci nas lamanye bar 'gro ba snyam bsams nas/ zhag bdun gyi brgyags dang chas tepo zung gi/
274b2(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa dang / phyir pho brang gi nang du log nas/ rgyal bu su sha de ba pang du blangs te/ mig mi 'dzums par lta ning spangs pa ltar langs nas phyir yang 'dug go// de'i tshen btsun
274b3(mdo sde): mos de ltar mi bde zhing skrag pa ltar gyur pa mthong nas rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyal po chen po ci'i slad du 'jigs skrag pa lta bu'i gzugs ston cing sku la'ang
274b4(mdo sde): rdul gyis gos pa lta bu sla'ang 'dzings te/ dbugs kyang mi bde ste yul stor la thug pa 'am/ mdza' sdug pa dang bye ba 'am/ dgra sdang ba dang phrad pa lta bu dang / bkra me shis
274b5(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan ma dag gda' bci lags bstan du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ kho bo ci nyes pa khyod kyis shes pa ma yin gyis ma smra zhig/ btsun mos gsol pa/ bdag
274b6(mdo sde): rang rgyal po lus gzugs gnyis kyang sems gcig ste/ dper na bya'i 'dab ma gnyis sam/ lus kyi rkang pa gnyis sam/ mgro' mig gnyis sam/ de dang 'dran
274b7(mdo sde): ci'i slad du bdag la gsang ste mi gsung / rgyal pos/ btsun mo la smras pa/ khyod la mi shes sam/ blon pa sgra gcan ngan sems skyes nas/ rgyal po la 'khus te/ 5
275a1(mdo sde): rgyal po'ang bkrongs te/ gcen rgyal bu'ang srog gi bar chad byas nas/ nga lta dmagu dang chas te nga la rgol du 'ong bas kho bo yul gzhan du 'byol du 'gro zhes
275a2(mdo sde): smras nas/ rgyal bu dge don pang du blangs te lam du zhugs so// de nas btsun mo'ang rgyal po'i phyir 'brangs te song ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po mya ngan gyis non te yid 'khrugs nas
275a3(mdo sde): zhag bcu bzhi'i lam du zhugs pas lam yang nor te/ lam de'ang bgrod dka' zhing rtswa'ang rtsub chu tsam yang med de/ zhag du ma zhig song ba las brgyags kyang chad do// thog ma gsang
275a4(mdo sde): ste rgyal po gcig pu 'gro bar byas nas/ zhag bdun gyi brgyags las kyang ma brdzangs pa las lam yang nor/ mi gsum gyis kyang bos te/ zhag bcu bzhi'i lam du zhugs pas
275a5(mdo sde): nga dung lam ring zhig yod pa las brgyags chad nas/ de'i tshe rgyal po dang btsun mos skad phyung nas ngus so// kyi hud kyi hud re sdug thog ma btsas nas da tsam gyi bar du 'di 'dra ba ma
275a6(mdo sde): myong ba 'dir myong bar gyur te/ nga 'dir sdug cing 'phongs so zhes zer te lag pas mgo la brdabs so// sal 'gre zhing lus la rdul gyis gos nas/ tshig 'di skad du smre sngags
275a7(mdo sde): 'dor to// bdag cag gis tshe snga ma la sdig pa mi dge pa'i las ci zhig byas/ 'on tepa ma dang dgra bcom pa bsad dam/ 'oni te dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab pam/ 'on te
275b1(mdo sde): mthun pa'i dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis sam/ 'on te rjon pa dang na pa byas sam/ 'on te mang dang dri bcos te pha rol la phrog rlom byas sam/ 'on te dge 'dun gyinor la spyod spyod pa
275b2(mdo sde): ci byas na 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur cig ru// de skad smyed zhing cung zad bstir ni dgras slebs na/ srog gi bar chad nges par 'byung / lam du zhugs nas 'gror na ba kres pa
275b3(mdo sde): dang sgom pas nyen nas sreg la bab tu cha'o// rgyal po dang btsun mo de lta bu'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen te skad byung ste ngus pa dang / sa la bsgyel nas brgyal bar gyur to// de nas ring zhig yon/
275b4(mdo sde): pa dang sangs nas 'di snyam du/ gsum char lhan cig tu 'di kho nar 'chi bar 'gyur gyis/ btsun mo bsang la bdag dang bu'i srog thar par bya'o snyam bsams nas/ ral gri byung ste btsun
275b5(mdo sde): mo bsang par bshams pa dang / rgyal bu dag don gyis rgyal po'i lag pa nas bzung ste/ da ltar ci zhig mdzang dgongs nas gsol to// yab rgyal pos mi gnas mchi mas gang bzhin
275b6(mdo sde): du rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kyim btsun mo dam pa bsang la khyod kyi srog gso snyam mo// gal te ma bsad kyang rang 'chi bar 'gyur te/ kho bo ni mchi'am gson yang rung na
275b7(mdo sde): bu khyod kyi srog gas pa'i phyir khyod kyim btsun mo bsangs ma mo// de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te btsun mo bsad par gyur na
276a1(mdo sde): bya bya/ de'i sha la bdag mi 'tshal te gang na'ang ma'i sha la bu za ba mi srid pas bdag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur na/ yab rgyal po ci'i slad du bdag bkum ste pa ma'i
276a2(mdo sde): srog thar par mi mdzad yab rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas mod la 'khams te 'gyel nas sa la 'gre zhing rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kho bo'i mig dang 'dran
276a3(mdo sde): su zhig rang gi mig byung ste za bar byed kho bo ni shi'ang bla bas bu mi gsod do// bu bsad de sha za mi nus so// de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis yang yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces
276a4(mdo sde): gsol to// gal te yab yum gyis bdag bkum na sha khrag kyang ring po mi thogs par rul sums nas dgos pa ma mchis par 'gyur te/ bdag gi gsol ba gcig gcig ma gnang na
276a5(mdo sde): byams pa'i yab yum ma lags pas/ bdag gi yid dang mi 'gal bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas yab rgyal pos sras rgyal bu la khyod kyi yid dang mi 'gal bar bya bas ci gsol ba'i
276a6(mdo sde): rnams myur du smros shig ces bsgo ba dang / rgyal bu dge don gyis yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// yab yum gyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du nyin re bzhin
276a7(mdo sde): bdag gi lus las sha rgya ma gsum gsum bcad de/ cha gnyis ni yab yum la 'bul/ cha gcig ni bdag rang 'tshal na/ lus srog gi zungs su 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal pos
276b1(mdo sde): kyang rgyal bus gsol ba bzhin du gnang nas nyin gcig bzhin sha rgya ma gsum bcad de/ cha gnyis ni rgyal po dang btsun mo ba cha gcig ni rgyal bu rang ba ste/ lus dang srog gi
276b2(mdo sde): zungs byas nas/ lam du zhugs te song ba las/ zhag gnyis kyis yul pha rol ma sleb par rgyal bu'i lus kyi sha zang de/ rus pa'i tshigs drang chub tsam zhig 'brel te/ srog
276b3(mdo sde): gau lhag ma tsam zhig lus nas sa la 'gyel to// de nas rgyal po dang btsun mos rgyal bu bang du grangs nas/ skad chen po phyung nas chongs btab ste 'di skad ces smras so// de gnyis
276b4(mdo sde): kyis ma rig par khyod kyi sha zos te/ khyod 'di lta bu'i na tsha'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur la/ lam yang da dung ring bas khyod kyi lus kyi sha ni zad de/ da ni lhan cig tu gnas 'dir ro
276b5(mdo sde): gzhag go/ de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis skad chung ngus yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol lo// da ni 'di nas pha rol tu zhag gcig tsam gyi lam las ma lus te/ bdag
276b6(mdo sde): ni g.yo zhing bskyod mi nus pas srog 'dir 'dor ro// rgyal po dang btsun mo ni mi ma rabs ngan pa ltar lhan cig tu gnas 'dir ro gzhag go ma gsungs shig/ bdag la byams shing
276b7(mdo sde): thugs brtse bar dgongs na/ bdag gis bsam pa dang mi 'gal bar mdzad du gsol/ da dung yang bdag gi rus pa'i gseb na sha tsi yod pa ma lus par btogs la yul pha rol tu ga
277a1(mdo sde): stsa sa rnal las pa sgyu thus pas 'bya du/ tshigs dang sa sa ga ga sgru
277a2(mdo sde): nyis ni rgyal pa dang brgyad ma mamasagacig rgyu 'bras sa// rgyal ba dang bcu ma 'ang la du mgus nas // mdzu na pa pa nas
277a3(mdo sde): dang btsun pa song sa la lta'o// rgyal po dang btsun pa gnyis srang byung nas ngu bzhin song nas rgyal bu dgi dron gyis mig gis ma song kyi bar du rgyal po dang btsun mol chags parje
277a4(mdo sde): sems kyis mig mi 'dzums par lta blta nas ring zhig lon pa dang / phyir sa la 'gyel to// sha dang khrag gi ji bro bas phyogs bcu nas spang ma dang sha sgang mang po 'dus nas
277a5(mdo sde): rgyal bu yog pa tsam du lus la ba zhing 'jus te sdug bsngal gyis gdungs so// de'i tshe na rgyal bu de srog gi lhag ma tsam zhig ma chad de// skad phyung nas 'di skad rjes smon lam du
277a6(mdo sde): btab bo// bdag gi sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las rnams ni 'dis byang zhing zad par gyur cig/ deng slan chad mi bgyid do// bdag gi lus pha ma la phul te sbyin pa byas pas
277a7(mdo sde): bdag gi pha ma snga ma bas lhag pa'i bsod nams bcu gcig dang ldan te/ bde bar nyal ba dang / bde bar sad pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa mi rmi ba dang / lhas bsrung ba dang / mis/
277b1(mdo sde): nga / rnan pa nga/ bya sa sa klu
277b2(mdo sde): mabyin pas thams su ma sa gang rjes pa gyur/ bdag ma 'das pa'i sa na sangs rgyas zlu pa pag c-i/ sang+yas rgyas ma tha kyi na
277b3(mdo sde): kyi skus thams cad kyi bkrim sgom pa'i su me dang/ smye shir 'khor ba'i nang ldi ba sel bar go gcig/ rgyal bus dus sngon lam btab pan// gnams 'ang rnam pa drub tu
277b4(mdo sde): g.yos nyi ma'ang 'od mi gsal bar gyur/ gcan gzan dang ri dgas rnams kyang skrag nas kun tu rgyug/ rgya mtsho'ang rab tu 'khrugs ri rab kyang 'gul zhing ldeg
277b5(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi bar du'ang rab tu g.yos so// de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang pos 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dag dang / 'dzem bu'i gling dag tu babs nas/ rgyal bu don grub
277b6(mdo sde): bsdigs pa'i phyid/ seng ge dang / stag dang / 'bar spyad la sogs pa'i lus su sprul nas mig bgrang/ kha gdangs sru bsgreng nas skad rjen po 'ang b+hung ste
277b7(mdo sde): rgyal bu mchong ba bzhin bsdigs so// de'i tshe rgyal bu don grub kyis gcan gzan khro bo de dag mthong nas kyang skad mi che bas 'di skad ces smras so// khyed rnams kho bo za 'dod nacha
278a1(mdo sde): ba der tho zhig/ 'di 'dra ba'i mthu rtsal gyis bsdigs ci dgos zhes pad+ma'o// de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos smras pa/ bdag cag ni seng ge 'am
278a2(mdo sde): gcan gzan ma yin te/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po yin te/ khyod bag ma zhing sad du 'ongs so// de'i tshe rgyal bus bad+ma byin lha'i dbang po mthong nas shin tu dga' mgur rangs par yang
278a3(mdo sde): gyur to// de nas brgya byin gyis/ rgyal bu la smras pa/ khyod kyis shin tu gtang dka' ba btang ste lus kyi sha khrag gis pha ma la bstabs pa 'di'i bsod nams kyis khyod bdud kyi
278a4(mdo sde): rgyal por 'dod dam 'on te tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'dod dam/ lha'i dbang po 'am/ mi'i rgyal po 'am/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'dod/ rgyal bus smras pa/ bdag
278a5(mdo sde): ni bdud kyi rgyal po 'am/ tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i rgyal po 'am/ mi'i rgyal po 'am/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang yang mi 'dod de/ sems can thams cad rnam par gro
278a6(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod ngo do// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ khyod ni shin tu'ang gti mug can zhig yin pa 'dra/ bla na med pa yang nga//
278a7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni yun ring po nas shin tu dka' bas bsgrubs pas gsong 'bru ci'o// khyod kyis shin tu sdug ba sngal pa bzod ngam/ rgyal bus smras pa/
278b1(mdo sde): mas kyis laga' ya gang tha sa n+dan ma yang pa sa mam gyis pa sa than me gas ma
278b2(mdo sde): smras bya/ rgyud kyis smras pa kyang pa 'dis su rnaMs mau rjes pa / nas rgyal bras dam bcas nas sgron mam 'dig ces pa/ ga/ zhal khye
278b3(mdo sde): ti lha'i dbang po bslus par gyur na/ bdag gi lus kyi rma 'din mo du'ang 'tsho bar ma gyur cig/ gal te smra ba'i tshig bdenan bdag gi lus kyang sor chung cing khrag kyang 'o mar
278b4(mdo sde): ces smras ma thag tu lus kyi rma bang snga ma kho na bzhin sor chud de/ khrag kyang 'o mar gyur nas/ rgyal bu'i byad gzugs kyang sngam pas lhag par bzang zhing sdug pa dang mangs
278b5(mdo sde): par gyur te/ langs nas lha'i dbang po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal bu khyod legs so// shin tu legs so// shin tu
278b6(mdo sde): dpa' ba'i brtson 'grus kyis gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
278b7(mdo sde): chub thob pa na thog mar bdag gi don mdzad par gyur cig ces smras nas/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po'ang nam mkha'i phyogs de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal po dang
279a1(mdo sde): btsun mo'ang rgyal po pha rol po de'i drung du byin nas rgyal po des kyang rgyang ma nas bsu nas dgos pa'i yo byad yod bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe
279a2(mdo sde): rgyal po dang btsun mo des rgyal bu sa lus kyi sha khrag gi sa pha ma la ji ltar bsta bas pa rgyal po de la zhib tu brjod pa dang / rgyal po des ji ltar brjod pa de dag thos nas rgyal bu de'i
279a3(mdo sde): lus kyi sha khrag gis pha ma la bstabs pas sri zhu cher byas pa'i drin la na ba sa ba nas dmag rnam bzhi pa sha ma sa nas rgyal po de dang yul wA rA Na sir dmag drangs so// de'i
279a4(mdo sde): tshe rgyal po de dmag rnam bzhi dang chas na sa lam du zhugs te/ rgyal bu dang bral ba'i gnas su phyin pa dang / 'di snyam du bdag gi bu ni gdon mi za bar 'di nyid du shi na/ bu'i rus pa
279a5(mdo sde): tsam bsdus te phyir ba dag gi yul du bskur ro snyam du sems nas skang phyung nas ngu zhing bu'i rus bu sdud du song song ba las rgyang ma nas bdag gi bu'i lus kyi rma'ang sos nas
279a6(mdo sde): snga ma ba sa bzang zhing mdzes te drung du 'ongs so// de nas rgyal po sa pa nga du blangs te khyod da dung gson na ma zhes smras pa dang / rgyal bu'i ji ltar gyur pa yab rgyal po dang btsun
279a7(mdo sde): mo la smras so// rgyal po dang btsun mo rab tu dga' ste/ thams cad ba glang la zhon nas phyir bdag gi yul du phyin pa dang / rgyal bu de'i bsod nams de'i mthus pa dag gi
279b1(mdo sde): yul yang byir thob nas rgyal bu don grub rgyal por dbang bskur te rgyal por bcug go// bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bol bka' stsal pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na lab
279b2(mdo sde): rgyal por gyur pa de gzhan yin snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe de'i dus na yab rgyal po de ni da ltar nga'i yab zas gtsang ma zhes bya bar gyur to/
279b3(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na yum du gyur pa de ni gzhan yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o// da ni da ltar nga'i yum lha mdzes zhes bya ba yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu don
279b4(mdo sde): grub ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o// de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu de ni da ltar shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba nga yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na
279b5(mdo sde): brgya byin lha'i dbang por gyur pa ltar kun shes ko'u di n+ya zhes bya ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyi sa pha ma la sri nu byed pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe'akhor gyi dkyil 'khor den byung
279b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' khri phrag nyi shu snyed kyis 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don la mkhas pa'i tshig gi spobs pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag bcu gnyis kyis
279b7(mdo sde): mi skye ba'i chos la chos kyi bzod pa thob bo// gzhan yang phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rdul phra rab snyed kyis theg pa gnyis kyi sems spangs
280a1(mdo sde): te/ theg pa gcig gis mthar phyin par gyur to// dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rdul phra rab snyed kyis 'bras bu dang po nas theg pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu'i/
280a2(mdo sde): bar du thob par gyur to// lha dang mi brgya stong snyed ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de ma yin pa lha dang / klu dang / yi dgas dang / lha
280a3(mdo sde): ma yin dang / dri za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma lags pa la sogs pa mang po'i rnams la la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub
280a4(mdo sde): tu sems bskyed pa nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems bskyed par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
280a5(mdo sde): dag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du pha ma la sri zhu bya ba'i phyir/ lus kyi sha khrag gis kyang pha ma la bstabs shing / shin tu spyad dka' ba spyod pa ni 'di lta bu yin no// 'khor
280a6(mdo sde): mang po thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas/ so so nas phan pa dang bde ba'i don rnyed de/ dga' rangs nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba
280a7(mdo sde): byas nas phyir dong ngo // thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las/ sri nu'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o// // bam po
280b1(mdo sde): gnyis pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po'i nang na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis skar ma mang po zil gyis mnan pa lta du'am/
280b2(mdo sde): 'khyil ba'i 'anga'atshon ltar 'tsher zhing gsal ba la bltan mi chags pa bzhin nam/ bsams na yid 'khrul pa tsam du 'od zer lham me lhang nger bzhugs te/ dper na mi bzod pa ni srin
280b3(mdo sde): bu me khyer gyi 'od nyi ma shar ma thag tu mi snang ba 'am/ nyi zla la 'od zer brgya stong snyed yod kyang / brgya byin gyi drung na sol phung lta bu 'am/ brgya byin la 'od gsal ba yod kyang / tshangs
280b4(mdo sde): pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi drung na gyo mo 'am/ gseg ma lta bu 'am/ mtshan mo dang / nor bu rin po che'i 'od du bskrun pa tsam mam/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po'i 'od zer dam pa brgya stong
280b5(mdo sde): snyed yod pa'i 'od thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi drung na sol ba'i phung po ltar gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshes pa'i 'od zer mdog gang gis phyogs bcu'i
280b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu snang bar gyur to// de dag na gnas pa'i sems can dag la 'od zer des reg na/ dmus long ni mig gis gzugs mthong bar 'gyur/ lus sgur po ni lus
280b7(mdo sde): rangs par 'gyur/ dbang po nyams pa rnams ni dbang po tshang zhing yan lag dang nying lag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// myos pa rnams ni dran pa phyir rnyed par 'gyur/ mdor na ji tsam du yid
281a1(mdo sde): du mi 'ong ba thams cad dang bral te 'dod pa bzhin thob par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun cu
281a2(mdo sde): snyed stan las langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// thams cad kyis skad mthun par
281a3(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod pa byas pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtog med
281a4(mdo sde): dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' bde ba 'da' zhig sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med par grags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshad med dbyangs dang / byang chu
281a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' grags pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' gtsug pud 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa'i seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig rol dang /
281a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rtog pa spong dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dge gnas blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu mtshan
281a7(mdo sde): med dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros 'od zer dang / byang chub sems dpa' khro zhi blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu srung 'gyur dang / byang chub sems dpa'
281b1(mdo sde): dad pa brtsan dang / byang chub sems dpa' me tog 'phags dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bde dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i shes rab las dang / byang chub
281b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' bo 'phral 'chang dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsam du med dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa sbyin dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen las dang / byang chub
281b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' me tog gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpag med chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags pa'i yid dang / byang chub
281b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang phyug sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu 'chang dang
281b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa chen pos skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ni pha rol dang / byang chub sems dpa' de na gnas dang /
281b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' grangs med d+hA dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu lci ba'i sdong po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgyu las 'phags dang /
281b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu 'gro dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid 'phags dang / byang chub sems dpa' sde chen khams dang / byang chub sems dpa' ris skyob dang /
282a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gsum 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' bo bral yod dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags brjo dang /
282a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nyi 'od gsal dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge brtsan dang / byang chub sems dpa' dus tshong rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i snying po dang
282a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' srid mngon ston dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'od rgyang gsal dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i dang / byang chub sems dpa' srid len byin dang
282a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan mchog dang / byang chub sems dpa' dga' mgu rangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus
282a5(mdo sde): bstan dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'gribs med dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med dang / byang chub sems dpa' ma chags
282a6(mdo sde): lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgron ma chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thabs chen stob
282a7(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' mun nag bsal dang / byang chub sems dpa' mnyam med phyogs la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar yi ngas/
282b1(mdo sde): 'di skad bcas so// bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu sangs rgyas sde chos bsrung zhing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu rgyas
282b2(mdo sde): par bgyi zhing rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer ngan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthong nas 'od zer de dag
282b3(mdo sde): las sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang thos par 'gyur/ chos de dag thos nas sems kyi sgrib pa dang bral te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad byang nas/
282b4(mdo sde): rin po che gser ltar sems rnam par dag par 'gyur bas thams cad gsal bar snang bar gyur pa'i phyir ro// bdag cag gis phan pa dang bde ba'i yon tan 'di lta bu dag dran pas
282b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la ston pa chen por 'du shes skyes so// byams pa'i blta bu'i 'du shes skyes nas/ rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin dranA te/ sangs rgyas kyi bka'
282b6(mdo sde): drinashes par bgyid do// detso'i slad du 'in dam bran ches thos pas ring ba mi thogs par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing / dam pa 'irnas kyi 'kho ma bskur
282b7(mdo sde): can thams ca skal par 'gyur ro// de dag kyang ches thos pas blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu tho par gyur pa'i phyir ro// nganas de zhin ga gags pas
283a1(mdo sde): sa nga sgyu @
283a2(mdo sde): brgya spyang gi rdul phrar rab snyed kyi ldan yol na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kAng+gA'i klung gi bye mu brgya stong snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul narang snyed la bsnyen bkur byas/ @
283a3(mdo sde): rgyus de dag las rtag tu tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing // rgyal ba de dag la mi spro ba'i sems kyis mnyes par byas nas/ byams pas bdag gi lus bsrungs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dzin cing /
283a4(mdo sde): snying rje chen pos rgyun du phyogs bcur thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed do// sems can gang zhig tha ma shi kar byang chub sems dpa' de dag la gcig gi ming ngam/ gnyis sam/
283a5(mdo sde): gsum mam/ bzhi nas/ bdun bcu'i bar du rdzogs par thos te/ de la srog phyogs skyabs su song na/ tshe 'phos ma thag tu gang na sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams/
283a6(mdo sde): su pad+mo las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing / 'dod chags dang yongs su bral ba dang / mngal gyi gnas nas mi skye ba dang / mnam zhing bcog pa dang bral bar 'gyur te/ lus yongs su/
283a7(mdo sde): dag cing lus dri zhim pa dang / thams cad kyi yid du 'o zhing bkur sti byed par 'gyur ro// kun gyi yid du 'ong zhing bkur sti byas pas sems rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// sems
283b1(mdo sde): rab tu dga' bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams/
283b2(mdo sde): cad la byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i sems skyed par 'gyur/ de ltar byams pa snying rje'i sems bskyed pas/ 'gro ba ma lus pa la btang snyoms su mi gtong ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur//
283b3(mdo sde): gzhan yang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i sems dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed pa'i sems dang / sgrib pa dang bar chad du 'gyur ba bsal ba'i sems dang
283b4(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa'i sems dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la snyan cing rtag tu bkur sti byed pa'i sems dang / 'dun pa'i yid kyis chos nyan pa'i sems dang / mi brjed par
283b5(mdo sde): yid la byed cing / don bzang po gzungs su 'dzin pa'i sems dang / nyung ngu thos la don mang du shes pa'i sems dang / mang du thos la don mi shes pa mi 'dod pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro//
283b6(mdo sde): de nas yang dag pa nyid la dad pa'i sems dang / de bzhin nyid kyi don bden pa la dad pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i don bden pa la ngad pa'i sems skyes pas 'i n+d+ha bstan pa pozhin/
283b7(mdo sde): rnam bya dzung pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du la 'byor spyong ba'i sems smos pas phyir mi ldog pas sems skye bar 'gyur/ debar phyir mi ldam pa'i mapas
284a1(mdo sde): pas/ sems can thams cad la mnyam snyoms gnyen po'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar bdag khams gsum pa'i srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar skye bar mi dag pa bzhin/
284a2(mdo sde): du gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / rkang bzhi dang / rkang mangs dang / grog sbur nas/ srog chags thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni
284a3(mdo sde): lus dang srog gi bar du stor yang pha rol po'i srog 'phrog pa'i las mi byed do// ji ltar bdag la nor rdzas dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / zas dang / skom dang / ba glang dang / shing rta dang /
284a4(mdo sde): theg pa dang / yul dang / grong khyer dang // chung ma dang / bu dang / lus kyi yan lag gi bar du longs spyod rnams la srung zhing rim gror byed do// gzhan gyis khyer zhing 'phrog pa la mi dga' ba
284a5(mdo sde): bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog stor kyang sems can rnams kyi nor dang // gos dang / zas dang / skom dang / longs
284a6(mdo sde): spyod la 'phrog pa'i sems mi skyed do// ji ltar bdag gi gzugs dam pa sring mo 'am/ chung ma 'am/ slad la gzhan gyis mi rigs par byed mi 'dod pa bzhin du/ sems can thams
284a7(mdo sde): cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog stor kyang / pha rol po'i gzugs dam pa la 'du shes ngan pa log pa'i sems mi skyed na/ mi rigs pa'i chos
284b1(mdo sde): ngan pa lta ci smos ji ltar bdag phra ma dang tshig rtsub po 'khrug par 'gyur ba la mi dga' ba bzhin du/ sems can rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang /
284b2(mdo sde): srog yal yang brdzun du smra ba dang phan tshun 'khrug pa'i tshig mi smra'o// ji ltar bdag rdo dbyug gis brdeg pa dang / lcag gis gzhu ba dang / nan la 'bor ba la mi dga' ba bzhin du/ sems
284b3(mdo sde): can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog yal yang rngod dbyug dang / lcags dang / chad pas bcad pa'i las kyis sems can rnams la
284b4(mdo sde): mi 'tshe'o// ji ltar bdag ljags sgrog dang / khong sgril dang / mtshon cha dang // bzung ba dang / btags pa dang / bcing bas bcings pa'i gnod pa rnams la mi dga' ba bzhin du
284b5(mdo sde): sems can kun kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang srog yal yang lcags sgrog dang / khong sgril dang / mtshon cha dang / bzung ba dang / btags pa dang
284b6(mdo sde): bcing ba la sogs pa'i gnod pas 'tshe bar mi byed do// ji ltar bdag gzhan gyis brnyas pa dang / dbang dang drag shul byed pa dang / dbang rlom btsan byed bsnyems shing ngan du byed pa la mi
284b7(mdo sde): dga' ba bzhin du// sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gcig pu'i lus dang srog yal yang tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i mi rigs pas/ sems
285a1(mdo sde): can la gnod pa mi byed do// ji ltar bdag la pha rol po gzhan gyis bkur sti byed cing mchod dam/ tshig snyan pas bstod na/ bdag bde ba la dga' ba bzhin
285a2(mdo sde): du bdag kyang sems can rnams la gos dang / zas dang / skom dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis sbyin par byed do// gal te bdag gis
285a3(mdo sde): lam chen po zhig sgrub bam/ sangs rgyas kyi phyir ram/ chos kyi phyir ram/ dge 'dun gyi phyir ram/ don bsgrub pa las blos mi lcogs grub par ma gyur nas mi dga' zhing mya ngan gyis gdung
285a4(mdo sde): pa las// mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhig gis bdag gis sgrub pa'i don ma grub pas mi dga' zhing mya ngan byed par mthong na bdag la 'di skad zer ro// rigs kyi bu khyod mi dga' bar ma byed cig/
285a5(mdo sde): khyod kyi don grub pa'i grogs bya'o// don yin bzhin du grub par bya'o zhes zer na/ de la rab tu dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur te/ de bas na bdag gi sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du
285a6(mdo sde): bsgrub pa'i las kyi grogs bya'o// ji ltar bdag la rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / chu 'am/ mes gnod par 'gyur ram/ blon po la sogs pa'i bzung ngam/ btags sam/ bcings
285a7(mdo sde): nas mi dga' ba'i mya ngan gyis gdungs par gyur pa las/ mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhig gis bdag de ltar mya ngan gyis gdungs pa mthong na/ snyan pa sgra'i tshig gis bdag la khyod mya ngan ma byed cig
285b1(mdo sde): khyod kyi phyir kho bos rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po la gsol ba btab ste/ gal te na nor sug sbyin pa 'am/ thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ci nas kyang khyod mi bde ba'i sdug bsngal las tha
285b2(mdo sde): par bya'o zer na/ bdag gis tshig de thos pa tsam gyis sems dga' bar gyur te/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni shes par bya ba'i sgyu rtsal dang bzo'i bar du mthar byin par brtson 'grus
285b3(mdo sde): su slob bo// 'di lta ste/ shes par bya ba rig pa'i gnas dang / bzo'i gnas dang // rol mo dang / rtsed mo dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / mig 'phrul gyi sngags dang / spyan dang /
285b4(mdo sde): ba glang dang / rta dang / bzhon pa dang / dgra chos dang / dmag drang ba dang / dpyad la sogs pa la mkhas par slob ste/ de ltar smra rtsal ci la'ang mkhas par bslabs nas// 'gro ba mang po dang
285b5(mdo sde): rgyal po dang // blon po chen po la sogs pa'ang bsams pa'i yid dang / 'gal bar mi byed/ de ma yin pa gzhan yang longs spyod kyi rkyen gos sa pa/ nor ram/ bas sam/ bza' ba 'am/ btu
285b6(mdo sde): ba 'am/ nor bu 'am/ gdu bu 'am/ lus kyi rgyan nam/ gser ram/ dngul lam/ bai DUR+Ya'am/ man shel lam/ spug gam/ mu tig gam/ asma gar b+ha 'am/ nor bu rin po che 'a
285b7(mdo sde): ba glang ngam/ rta 'am/ theg pa 'am/ bran po 'am/ las byed pa'i mi 'am/ chung ma 'am/ sras kyang yod// chu mig gam/ khrus kyi rdzing bu 'am/ rin po che yang thog bzang po 'am
286a1(mdo sde): longs spyod kyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs yod kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de la rlom pa 'am/ rgyags pa'i sems med do// de ltar sgyu rtsal kun yang mkhas// /
286a2(mdo sde): rin po che'i bang mdzod brgya stong dang yang ldan// ba glang dang / rta dang / theg pa'ang yod na chung ma bzang mo'ang grangs med par yod/ yang thog bzang po'ang yod/ chu mig dang khrus kyi rdzing la
286a3(mdo sde): sogs pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod gang yang yod mod kyi/ de la ma chags te/ rtag tu 'dod pa nyung ba dang / chog shes pa la dga' zhing // bas mtha' dgon pa dang / ri dang / tshal dang / shing drung
286a4(mdo sde): du bsam gtan la zhi bar gnas pa la mos so// skye bo mang po dang smra zhing gtam zer yang / sems ni rtag tu gnyen po'i sgor 'jug par byed do// so so'i skye bo dang spyod tshul mthun pa ltar
286a5(mdo sde): byed kyang sems can la phan pa'i don du nor bu rin po che gtong bar byed kyi/ sems can la gnod pa mi phan pa'i don mi byed do// gang dbul ba 'phongs pa nyam thag par gyur pa dag byang chub sem/
286a6(mdo sde): dpa' la slong du 'ongs na/ de la ci 'dod pa bzhin byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin par byed do// sems can gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos shing dad de/ byang chub sems dpa' la
286a7(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur dang mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rim gro dang g.yog byed cing / rkang pa 'khru ba'i las byed dam/ lus bkru ba dang mnye ba'i las byed dam/ chag chag dang phyag bdar byed dam/ so
286b1(mdo sde): shing dang khrus chus sbyor ram// mal stan 'ding zhing mal gos sprug pa'i las byed dam// srog dang po rangs la mar me 'bud ngam/ khye sus dang / drol kha bas tha na pa na dang / pu sha ni dang / khang
286b2(mdo sde): ni 'bul lam/ 'thung ba'i skom yuli shi dang / bu lar sha ka'i 'bras bu'i skom dang / rgun chu dang / khar nug po'i chu la sogs pa sbyar sbyar nas// yo byAd de lta bus zhag bdun nam nag dgu
286b3(mdo sde): bcu'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' la chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'bul bar byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe mchod pa'i yo byad 'bul ba de la dga' ba'i sems med do// de ci'i phyir nan/
286b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa grangs med pa yun ring po nas sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la skyed 'bri'i sems med pa'i phyir/ byams pa dang snying rje'i sems
286b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i phyir/ mnyam snyoms pa'i sems la gnas pa'i phyir ro// de bas na dus kha cig tu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byed de/ rtag tu dge ba bcu'i chos kyis sems can gyi don byed do//
286b6(mdo sde): sems can de dag kyang rgyal po'i yid bzhin du dga' zhing spyod pa'i tshe'i dus byas na'ang lha dang mi'i 'jig rten du 'dod pa lnga'i longs spyod mchog dam pa dang ldan te/ rigs che zhing mtho bar skye bar 'gyur//
286b7(mdo sde): bsams pa'i yid bzhin du nyal ba dang / ldang ba dang / 'gro ba la gnod pa med par 'gyur// gnas gang du 'gro'ang bzhon pa'i rta dang theg par ldan te skyed mos tshal du rtsed mo dang // rol mo la rtse zhing
287a1(mdo sde): longs spyod par 'gyur/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dam pa dang / dga' dgur spyod par 'gyur yang / tha ma mi rtag pa brten te rga ba dang na bas gzir te shi bar gyur na/
287a2(mdo sde): khyim gyi bu smad mya ngan gyis gdungs te skad phyung nas ngu zhing / la la ni mgo la thal mo rdebs/ la la ni rang rang gi skra 'bal te/ mchi ma 'dzag cing sa la 'gre'o// de nas khyogs sam shing rta
287a3(mdo sde): steng du bzhag nas/ dur khrod du skyel te/ de ltar bskyal nas kyang bu smad dag phyir khyim du 'ongs nas mya ngan gyis gdungs te/ la la ni 'argyal nas sa la 'gre/ la la ni de'i rkyen gyis nang du gyur/ la
287a4(mdo sde): la ni mi dran pas myos/ la la ni tshe'i bar chad du shi bar byas te/ de ltar byas kyang gson pa rnams la ni phan pa med// shi ba la ni rab tu gnod do// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po
287a5(mdo sde): 'khor dang bcas te yul rgyu zhing song ba las/ sems can mya ngan gyis gzir ba mthong nas// snying brtse ba'i sems skyes te 'di skad zer ro// rgyal po zhes bya ba ni yul sa dbang gis 'gro ba
287a6(mdo sde): mang po'i dbang sgyur te/ de ltar dge ba bcu'i lam gyis 'gro ba rnams btul te/ 'bras bu 'dod pa lnga mchog dam pa thob tu zin kyang skye ba dang / rga ba dang // na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mi rtag pas
287a7(mdo sde): 'jigs pas thar par ma gyur na/ bdag gis drang po'i dbang chos kyis yul gyi srid btsas kyang phan pa'i don med do// de ltar 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i don med na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po
287b1(mdo sde): chen po zhes kyang ji skad ces kyang bya/ byams pa chen po'i bzhi 'am/ sman pa rgyal po chen po zhe'am/ 'dren pa'i ston pa chen po zhes bya ba ni// yang dag pa'i lam du 'dren cing // mya ngan las 'das/
287b2(mdo sde): pa'i lam ston te/ 'dus ma byas pa'i rab tu bde ba thob par byed do// bdag cag ni ming dang spyod par mi mthun te/ dper na mi zhig skom pas gdungs nas srog la bab pa las/ chu 'dod pa'i
287b3(mdo sde): phyir phan tshun brgyugs te khron pa skam po cig dang phrad nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te 'di snyam du sems so// da ni bdag gi lus 'di 'chi ba la phyir sos so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal
287b4(mdo sde): chu dang ma brang na/ srog 'di 'chi ba las mi ring ba las/ nga khron pa bzang po dang phreng nas/ gdon mi za bar chu dong grang mo gtsang ma dang phrad de/ ngoms shing tshim par 'gyur bas/ srog 'tsho bar
287b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro snyam bsams nas/ myur ba myur bar khron pa'i drung du bsnyen to// khron pa'i drung du phyin nas lus la gyon pa'i gos phung de phyogs gcig tu sbas nas/ chu 'ding pa'i phyir khron pa'i nang du
287b6(mdo sde): zhugs so// khron pa'i gting du phyin nas chu ni med kyi/ sbrul gdug pa dang / rmigs pa dang / sdig pa dang rtsangs pa dang / sbal pa dang / gyo mo dang / de la sogs pa gseg ma dang / shing
287b7(mdo sde): dang / rtsa nyal nyil 'ba' zhig mthong bar gyur to// de'i tshe skom pas nyam thag par gyur pa de thog ma re ba bzhin du chu'ang ma rnyed la/ gdug pa mang pos gzas nas khron pa de las phyir byung bar gabs
288a1(mdo sde): kyang khron pa brnyings shing zhig la zabs kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam yod do// de'i nang nas skas sam/ thag srad dam/ 'bru ba'i shing tsam yang med de/ mas mchod du
288a2(mdo sde): stsal kyang nyam thag la stobs zhan pas 'phar mi nus te/ phyir yang nabs su lhung nas sbrul gdug pa la sogs pas za zhing 'jib bo// de cung zad cig srog ma chad kyi bar du 'di skad ces zer ro//
288a3(mdo sde): bdag khron pa 'di'i nang na chu med par sngar shes na lha khron pa 'di la mig gis lta'ang mi phod na 'di'i nang du zhugs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ da ni khron pa 'di'i rkyen gyis sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal myong
288a4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro zhes smra sngags 'don no// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'ang de ltar so so'i skye bo dag gcig shi ba'i 'og tu khyim gang gi bu smad dang gnyen rnams kyis sdug pa dang bye bral ba'i sdug bsngal
288a5(mdo sde): gyis gdungs pa mthong nas 'di skad zer ro// bdag gi lus 'di ni khron pa skam po de dang 'dra ste/ khron pa'i ming tsam yod kyi/ chu ni med pas na/ 'jug pa yod kyang thob pa med pas de lta bu'i lu
288a6(mdo sde): drang srog stor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur to// da ltar bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dbang sgyur zhing rin po che sna bdun dang ldan te/ dge ba bcu'i las kyis 'gro ba 'dul zhing drang po
288a7(mdo sde): kyis yul gyi srid btsas nas/ skye bo mang po dang lha dang mi'i mtho ris kyi gnas su bkod do// 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan mchog dam pa la longs spyod du bcug kyang / de dag skye ba dang / rga ba dang /
288b1(mdo sde): na ba dang / 'dri ba dang / sdug pa dang / bye bral dang / dgra sdang ba dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal las thar par ma nus te/ gcig la gcig du ning tsho byed pa 'di ni bdag gis nyes kyi/ sems can/
288b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis ma nyes so// de ji lta zhe na/ bdag la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 'gro ba mang po la phan pa'i don du 'gyur ba med do// bdag las dge ba'i chos 'dod cing rab tu bde ba 'dod
288b3(mdo sde): kyang sdug bsngal gyi mtsho las rgal mi nus so// de'i tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'ang 'di snyam du sems so// da ltar bdag gi lus 'di ni dper na shes pa med pa/ gti mug can gyi sbyin
288b4(mdo sde): bdag dang 'dra'o// de'i tshe dus gzhan zhig lo bdun gyi bar du char pa ma bab pas/ than pa chen po byung ste rtsi shing yang bskams/ 'bru'ang rab tu dkon par gyur/ mu ge chen po byung ste/
288b5(mdo sde): gcig la gcig 'cha' zhing za bar gyur/ gcig gi sha khrag la gcig za ste/ la la ni bu'i sha khrag la pha ma za/ la la ni pha me'i sha la bu za zhing // pha ma dang / phu nu dang / khyo shug dang / bu
288b6(mdo sde): po dang / bu mo'ang gcig gi sha la gcig za bar gyur to// de'i tshe na sbyin bdag chen po de 'chag cing 'byan du song song ba las/ sems can mang po dag ltogs nas da rod nyams te/ rid cing
288b7(mdo sde): skams la nyam chung la mdog ngan pa dang / sra'ang 'dzings nas lus gnag la rke ba dag/ 'phrag pa la mi ro khur du khyer te/ kha cig ni mi'i mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / lha tshigs dang
289a1(mdo sde): lag pang dang / phrag pa dang / tshigs pa dang / skal ba dang / brda dang / rjeng dang / yan lag dang / nying lag gi bar du/ kha cig nin da mol masbyin pa/
289a2(mdo sde): dang mcher ba dang / glo ba dang / rgyu ma dang / gzhung rnams khyer ba mthong ngo // de lta bu dag mthong nas sbyin bdag des de dag mthong nas/ khyed khur du khyed ba 'di dag ci yin zhes dris so//
289a3(mdo sde): de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gi khur du khyer ba 'di dag ni mi ro ste/ mi'i mgo dang / rkang lag dang / baR+Sha dang / rdzang dang / yan lan dang / nying lag gi bar du'o// khyed mi'i mgo dang / yan lag
289a4(mdo sde): dang nying lag gi bar du khyer ba 'di ci dgos/ ci zhes bya zhes dris pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ khyod mi shes sam/ mu ge chen po byung nas 'bru rab tu dkon par gyur te/ mi kun ltos/
289a5(mdo sde): nas da ltar gcig la gcig za bas bdag cag gi khur du khyer ba 'di ni bdag cag gi zas yin no// de'i tshe sbyin bdag chen po des de skad ces smras pa de thos nas spangs te/ spu zing zhes byed nas
289a6(mdo sde): khams te sa la 'gyel ba las/ chu grang mos gdong du gtor nas ring zhig lon pa dang / sems sor chud nas 'on khyed kyi zas yin na/ 'di dag su'i sha yin dris pa dang / de dag skad chen po byu
289a7(mdo sde): nas dus te/ sbyin bdag la brjod du mi rung ngo zhes smras te/ e ma'o bdag cag ni sdug go// e ma'i bdag cag ni sdug go/ kyi hud kyi phung bye la drang po mi slar rung ste/ bdag cas 'ang
289b1(mdo sde): ma/ sa / pal / ng+gAs sa sa / ga r+b+ba /
289b2(mdo sde): gtam byas nas// bdag cag ni shin tu lcogs pas gcig la nyi sha pa par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe sbyin bdag des dbugs kyis brdungs pa tsam du/ mi ltogs pa rnams la 'di sad ces snum
289b3(mdo sde): mang/ khyod rnams der byin chang gcig la gcig nyi ga pa par ma byed cig/ khyed rnams la dgos pa'i la byang gang yang rung ba bgo pa'i gos sam/ bka' ba 'ang/ btung ba'am/ na hU~M
289b4(mdo sde): rkyen rdzi 'am/ yo byad ci dgos pa thams cad sbyin par bya ste/ zhag bdun na khyed rnams khro ba'i sgor shog cig dang / yid bzhin du gos sam/ 'a bras sam// nad kyi rgyun rtsi dang ci 'dod pas tshim par
289b5(mdo sde): bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang / de dag rab tu dga' rangs nas/ shin tu legs so legs so// ngo mtshar che'o zhes bstod pa byas so// de nas sbyin bdag dephyir khyim du 'ongs nas// chung ma dang bu
289b6(mdo sde): rnams dang / bran khol dang / las byed pa'i mi rnams kyang bsdus te/ dga' ba'i mdangs phyung ste/ 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig snyan pas bu smad dang / bran khol dang / las byed pa'i mi
289b7(mdo sde): rnams la 'di skad ces bsgo'o// khyed rnams shes par gyis shig/ kho bos smras pa'i tshig legs par nyon cig/ khyed shes sam/ than pa chen pos mu ge byung nas/ mi thams cad ltogs
290a1(mdo sde): te grangs med pa zhig shi bar gyur to// bdag gi khyim na bang mdzod kun gang zhing lung de/ 'bru yang grangs med yod pas dus las ma yol bar bdag cag bsod nams
290a2(mdo sde): bya'o zhes/ bu smad kun gyis de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas/ legs so legs so// bdag cag gi srog lus sbyin pa byas kyang mi 'phangs na/ bang mdzod dang / nor rdzas dang /
290a3(mdo sde): zas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas sbyin bdag kyang rab tu dga' rangs nas/ khyed rnams ni yang dag par kho bo'i bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa'i grogs yin pa lta dge'o legs so//
290a4(mdo sde): khyed rnams kyang so so nas ci dang ci bya ba rnams ci dang sgrub bskol bya ba'i rigs pa'ang mod la bya/ sgrub pa'i rigs pabang myur du bsgrub ste/ da ste zhag bdun na nges par 'byor par bya'o//
290a5(mdo sde): de'i tshe sbyin bdag des so sor bsgo nas/ khyim gyi phyi rol du byung ste/ gang nas mnyam zhing yangs la bde ba'i gnas shig bltas nas/ mod la sa gzhi dag nyal nyil sa rdo med par
290a6(mdo sde): byas byugs te/ khri stan bshams so// de ltar mang po 'du ba'i gnas sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sa gzhi bshams nas/ ba glang lnga brgya la kha zas bkal te sbyin pa'i sar bskyal nas/
290a7(mdo sde): zas ni ri bzhin du spungs/ go chu ni mtsho bzhin du bskyil// mar dang / 'bru mar dang // 'khur ba la sogs pa kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa cho ma cho gu sbyar te/ da ma yin pa gzhan yang gos dang /
290b1(mdo sde): gdu bu dang / 'phreng ba dang / lus kyi rgyan sna tshogs pa dang / bgrang dang / rta dang / rin po che sna bdun la sogs te thams cad phun sum tshogs par sbyar nas// zhag bdun lon pa'i skya rengs shar
290b2(mdo sde): nas zhag bdun gyi nyi ma la dril rta brdungs/ dung bus te/ skad chen pos thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas 'dir 'dus shig ces bos so// de'i chen thams cad kyis bos pa'i skad thos nas/
290b3(mdo sde): 'phags pas byin gyis brlab pa tsam du dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ thams cad sbyin pa gtong ba'i gnas su lhags te/ yid bzhin du gos dang / mal cha dang / zas skom dang / lus kyi
290b4(mdo sde): rgyun sna tshogs pa dang / nad kyi rtsi sman mang po dang / bgrang dang / rta dang / rin po che sna bdun la so gcing 'dod pa yid bzhin du drangs nas sbyin pa'i rdzas ci yod pa thams cad kyis ma lus pa
290b5(mdo sde): ro// de nas sbyin bdag de dga' nas phyir khyim du 'ongs nas// chung ma dang bu rnams dga' ba bzhin du 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod do// de nas kyang zhag bdun tsam lon pa dang / mi dag na re sbyin
290b6(mdo sde): bdag des sngor gos dang / zas dang / skom la sogs pa sbyin pa byas na/ kha zas zos pa rnams dug langs nas thams cad shi'o zhes zer ro// de ltar shi bar gyur pas thams cad kyis
290b7(mdo sde): tshig tu brjod de ngo mtshar che'o// ngo mtshar che'o// de ltar sbyin bdag chen po des kun la snying brtse ba'i phyir ci 'dod pa bzhin du kha zas la sogs pas tshim par byas te/ lus dang srog gson par byas
291a1(mdo sde): par gyur na/ phyis zhag mang po ma lon par dug langs nas thams cad shi'o bar sgrogs par gyur to// de'i tshe sbyin bdag chen po des de ltar gyur pa de thos na yi mug cing mi
291a2(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur te/ chung ma dang bu la sogs pa la khyed kyis kha zas ji ltar sbyar na/ kha zas kyi nang du dug ma rungs pa ji ltar 'ongs zhes dris pa dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bran khol dang / las
291a3(mdo sde): byed pa'i mi rnams kyi mchad nas dug mi srid do// dug 'drig las 'ongs zhib tu rtogs shig ces smras so// de nas sbyin pa dag de khyim gyi zhal ta byed cing mthar gyis song song ba las/ khron pa zhig
291a4(mdo sde): steng bkab cing g.yogs pa mthong ngo // khron pa 'di ci'i phyir g.yogs zhes dris pa dang / khron pa 'di na khyim bdag 'di khyod bus pa chung ngu'i tshe na/ sbrul gdug pa gsum zhig gso gso ba las/
291a5(mdo sde): khron pa 'di brkos nas sbrul gdug pa gsum bcug go// khron pa 'di ni sbrul gdug pa'i khron pa yin no// chu'ang dug pas chu 'di'ang 'thungs pas na ste 'chi bar 'gyur ro// sbyin bdag des tshig de dag
291a6(mdo sde): thos nas/ las byed pa la khyed de bar kha zas g.yo ba'i tshe/ khron chu 'di las bcus te kha zas ma g.yos sam/ las byed pas smras pa/ kha zas mang du g.yo bas rings nas chu 'di bcus nas kha
291a7(mdo sde): zas kyi g.yos byas so zhes bsgo'o// khyim bdag mi dga' ste ngo mtshar che'o// bdag ni gti mug can shes pa'i blo mad pa yin pa 'dra ste/ ci'i phyir sbrul gdug pa gso zhing khron pa gdug pa rko zhes
291b1(mdo sde): 'gyod nas/ chung ma dang bu la bsgo ba/ sbrul gdug pa gsum gyi khron pa myur du khongs shig/ sbrul gdug pa gsum yang kho bo bdag gis bsreg go zhes bsgo ba dang / las byed pa'i mi rnams kyis
291b2(mdo sde): de ma thag tu khron pa de'ang bsrub nas med par byas so// de nas sbyin bdag des sbrul gdug pa'i khron pa de med par byas nas/ phyi rol tu 'chag tu song ba las// sbyin bdag gi kha zas dug can gyis shi
291b3(mdo sde): bar gyur pa dag thams cad tshig mthun par sbyin bdag 'dis bdag cag la kha zas dug can byin nas/ bdag cag sngar shi bar gyur pa yin no// bdag cag gis de ltar shes na/ der ma song yang ru
291b4(mdo sde): zhes 'gyod pa skyes so// de bzhin du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'ang dge ba bcus sems can btul te/ sems can dag lha dang mi'i mtho ris su skye zhing 'dod pa lnga la 'dod dgur longs spyod mod
291b5(mdo sde): kyi/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba las mi thar pa'ang de dang 'dra'o// de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i mod la bdag bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / 'jig rten las 'das
291b6(mdo sde): pa'i chos bsgrubs te/ sems can rnams kyang de la klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / 'dri ba dang / goms par bya ste/ skye shi'i 'khor ba yongs su spangs shing mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya'o zhes dam
291b7(mdo sde): bcas so// de'i tshe na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling na sangs rgyas kyi chos sus shes zhes gnas kun tu bkar btags so// 'khor los sgyur
292a1(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po chos 'dod pa'i phyir gnas kun tu bkar btags kyang shes pa ma byung ngo // mtha' 'khob kyi yul chung ngu gcig tu byin pa dang / de na bram ze cig gcig sangs/
292a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos shes zhes zer ro// de nas bram ze de'i steng du pho nya btang nas/ pho nya de bram ze ga la ba der phyin nas/ btsun pa sangs rgyas kyi chos shes sam zhes dris na shes so zhes zer ro//
292a3(mdo sde): nas pho nyas bram ze'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ btsun pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos spyan 'dren du btang gi/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de ga la ba der gshegs su gsol/
292a4(mdo sde): de nas bram ze'ang der 'ongs nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos rgyang ma nas bsu ste/ rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bde bar byon tam/ lam du nyon mongs par ma gyur tam/ ngal bar ma
292a5(mdo sde): gyur tam zhes gtam dris te pho brang gi nang du khrid nas/ pho brang gi dbus su rgyal po'i gdan la bzhag go// bram zes kyang gdan la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go// de'i tshe rgyal pos bram ze de/
292a6(mdo sde): bde bar 'dug nas/ dgos pa'i yo byad rnams kun phul te sbyin pa byas nas/ thal mo sbyar te bram ze de la ston pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos shes sam zhes dris pa dang / bram ze na re bdag gis
292a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos shes so zhes zer ro// de nas rgyal pos bram ze la ston pa chen po bdag la bstan cing bshad du gsol zhes byas na/ bram ze na re rgyal po khyod ni shin tu glen no// kho bos sang
292b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos bslabs pa na/ yun ring du dka' ba'i sdug bsngal myong nas gdong lobs pa yin na/ nga rgyal pos thal phyung du thos par 'dod dam/ rgyal pos smras pa// ston pa chen po 'o na ci zhig
292b2(mdo sde): 'dod/ bram zes smras pa/ bdag la mchod pa pu la cig/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ston pa chen po mchod pa ci zhig 'did / gos sam/ mal cha'am// bza' ba 'am/ btung ba 'dod dam/
292b3(mdo sde): 'on te gser ram/ dngul lam/ rin po che 'dod dam/ bram zes smras pa/ bdag de 'dra ba'i mchod pa mi 'dod do// rgyal pos smras pa/ mchod pa de dag mi 'dod na/ 'on pa glang ngam/ d+ha 'am/
292b4(mdo sde): theg pa 'dod dam/ 'on te yul lam/ grong khyer ram/ chung ma 'am/ bu 'dod dam/ rol mo 'am/ glu 'am/ gar byed pa 'dod dam/ bram zes smras pa/ bdag ni de dag gang yang mi 'dod do//
292b5(mdo sde): gal te lus la rma stong phyung ste/ rma nang du mar blugs la me mar snying po btsugs te/ mar me stong 'bar bas mchod na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan cing bshad par bya'o// gal te de ltar mi
292b6(mdo sde): nus na bdag langs te 'gro zhes smras na/ rgyal pos skad cig tsam lan ma smras kyi bar du khri las babs so// de nas rgyal pos pang du blangs nas ston pa chen po cung zad nyag bsring du gsol/
292b7(mdo sde): bdag shes pa zhan zhing bsod nams chungs pas cung zad bsams te mchod par bgyid do zhes smras so// de'i tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ bdag gi lus 'di
293a1(mdo sde): thog ma med pa'i dus nas shi ba grangs med par myong na'ang / chos kyi phyir ni ma shi'i/ nga yang bdag gi lus 'di'ang mthar 'jig cing rul bar gyur pas phan pa med de/ da ni
293a2(mdo sde): dus la bab po snyam bsams nas/ ston pa bram ze la 'di skad ces smras so// ston pa chen po bdag mchod pa 'dod pa bzhin bgyid do// de nas rgyal po pho brang du song nas/ btsun mo rnams
293a3(mdo sde): la da ni bdag cag bye 'bral lo zhes smras so// btsun mo rnams de skad ces smras pa thos nas spangs shing 'khams te/ ci nyes gtol med de/ rgyal po da ltar ci zhig mdzad snyam dgongs zhes
293a4(mdo sde): gsol lo// rgyal pos smras pa/ bdag gis lus 'di la mar me sbyong zhig btsugs te ston pa bram ze la mchod pa bya snyam mo// btsun mo rnams kyis de skad ces smras pa thos nas/ sa la 'a
293a5(mdo sde): zhing cho nges btab ste brgyal lo// ring zhig lon pa dang phyir dran pa rnyed do// rgyal po chen po 'jig rten na bdag gi lus las 'phangs pa med de/ nyes te dogs nas gso ba'i rim gro cher byed na/
293a6(mdo sde): ci'i phyir bdag gi lus la mtho 'tsham zhing gnod par bgyid/ rgyal po ni mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan pa lags na/ da ltar myos sam/ 'on te yi dgas kyis brlams sam/ ci nongs/ rgyal pos
293a7(mdo sde): smras pa/ de lta bu gang yang ma yin no// 'o na ci'i phyir de lta bu'i gnod pa mdzad cing bram ze la mchod par dgongs/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod de/ sems can
293b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi don byed par sems so// de ltar sems can thams cad la dgongs na/ da ci'i phyir bdag cag rnams bkol bar gyur/ rgyal pos smras pa/ 'jig rten na mdza' sdug thams cad/
293b2(mdo sde): mthar bye 'bral du 'gyur te/ de bas na bdag gis lus kyi mchod pa byas te/ khyed dang sems can thams cad kyi mun nag gi khang par ye shes chen po'i sgron ma gzugs shing / skye shi 'khor ba'i
293b3(mdo sde): ma rig pa'i mun pa snang bar byas la/ kun nas dkris pa'i nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa bcad de/ 'khor ba'i skyon las bsgral nas/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas su dgod pa'i ched du bsams kyi
293b4(mdo sde): khyed rnams bar chad dang bgegs ma byed cig/ de'i tshe btsun mo rnams de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas/ brnangs pa ltar cang mi smra zhing skad chen po phyung ste ngu zhing rang rang gi skra 'bal lo// bdag
293b5(mdo sde): cag la bsod nams med de/ bkra mi shis pas gson por bdag cag la lha med par gyur ces smra'o// rgyal po de la rgyal bu lnga brgya yod do// thams cad kyang mnga' byad bzang zhing sdug pa/
293b6(mdo sde): yid gzhungs shing mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ mi'i mtshan dang rdzogs par ldan pa/ rgyal po'i'ang mig bzhin du 'phangs shing byams so// de'i tshe rgyal pos/ rgyal bu rnams la smras pa/
293b7(mdo sde): kho bar mchod pa'i las shig byed snyam na/ lus dang srog nyam chung ngu ngogs te khyed dang bral ba snyam/ yul gyi srid dang 'bangs rnams kyi chos ni tshe ring gis byos shig ces bsgo'o// rgyal
294a1(mdo sde): bu rnams de skad bsgo ba thos nas/ lus kyi yan lag dang rtsa rnams bcad pa tsam du sdug bsngal gyis gdungs te/ dper na mi brnangs pa las bskyug tu'ang med/
294a2(mdo sde): ming du'ang med pa bzhin du rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// ci'i slad du bdag drug rnams spangs te skyabs ma mchis par spangs te mdzad/ la la ni rgyal po'i gnya' ba nis 'khyud/
294a3(mdo sde): la la ni lag pa dang rkang pa nas bzung nas skad phyung zhing ngu/ kyi hud kyi hud/ ci'i phyir mgon dang skyabs med par 'gyur zhes smras so// de nas rgyal pos rgyal bu rnams la spro ba bskyed/
294a4(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten na mdza' zhing sdug pa thams cad mthar bye 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo'i/ de skad ces bsgo ba thos kyang yid la gcags te 'bral mi bod na/ bdag cag gis
294a5(mdo sde): gsol ba gcig gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag gi lus dang srog rgyal po la 'bul na/ ston pa bram ze la mchod pa mdzad du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu khyed rnams ni da du bzhed
294a6(mdo sde): ma bye la chung bas de 'dra ba'i mchod pa byed mi bzod kyis/ kho bo rno ston pa lam ring po nas gnyer te mchod pa bya bar khas blangs nas/ yid dang 'gal bar byar mi rungs pas bu sri 'u can nam
294a7(mdo sde): yid dang 'gal bar mi byed na/ khyed rnams kho bo'i yid dang 'gal bar byed dam/ rgyal bu rnams de skad smra ba thos nas skad phyung ste/ tshong btab pas// yul gyi lha rnams kyang spangs te/
294b1(mdo sde): 'gyel ba bzhin du thams cad lus sa la brdabs so// de'i tshe rgyal po la yul mtha'i rgyal phran thams cad kyis kyang mchi phyag byas nas pho brang gi nang ston pa chen po ga la ba der song ste/ de'i drung
294b2(mdo sde): du phyin nas lus kyi rgyun thams cad kyang bkrol nas gos kyang phud daphyogs gcig tu bzhag nas lus drang por bsrang ste 'dug go// 'dug ma thag tu rgyal phran rnams dang // blon po dang / rgyal bu lnga
294b3(mdo sde): brgya dang / btsun mo nyi khri la bsgo'o// khyed rnams las gang gis kho bo'i lus la rma stong zhig gcod sus nus zhes smras na// btsun mo dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po dang / rgyal phran rnams tshig
294b4(mdo sde): mthun par bdag cag gis rang gi lus la gri thogs te mig phyung yang bla'i// rgyal po'i lus la rma 'byin mi phod do// de nas rgyal po mi dga' bar gyur nas/ da ni bdag le'ur gyur pa lta/ 'khor
294b5(mdo sde): mang po 'di snyed kyi nang na/ mi 'ga' yang kho bo'i grogs su 'gyur ba med dam zhes smra bar gyur to// de'i tshe na rgyal po de la rigs ngan shan pa rang bzhin gyis khro la/ kun kyang 'jigs su rung ba zhig
294b6(mdo sde): yod pa zhig bos so// shan pa de der 'ongs so// gshan pa 'ongs nas rgyal bu rnams la khyed mya ngan ma byed cig/ rgyal po chen po'i don 'grub pa'i thabs bdag la mchis kyis/ don ma
294b7(mdo sde): grub na snga ma kho bzhin du rgyal po'i srid bzung du zad do zhes smras so// rgyal bu rnams kyis tshig de skad ces smras pa thos nas/ rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes par gyur to// de nas shan pa de rgyal
295a1(mdo sde): po'i drung ngu 'ongs nas/ rgyal po chen po rnyar cigag ma'ang bar dgongs shes gsol pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ rdzutha 'grus la ma ye stong btsugs pa sbyon
295a2(mdo sde): po bram ze la mchod par sems so// gshan pas smras pa/ de ltar na sku la gcod nus so// rgyal pos de skad smra ba thos nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems su gyur nas/ gshan pa la khyod ni lang
295a3(mdo sde): dag par kho bo'i bla na med pa'i byang chub bsgrub pa'i grogs yin no zhes smras so// de nas shan pas rgyal po'i drung du 'greng bzhin du ngam ngur ba'i skad chen pos rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol
295a4(mdo sde): to// rgyal po mkhyen tam/ mi bsad pa'i chos kyis ni sngar mgo bcad dgos te/ gnya' ba gtubs la rkang lag dang phral te/ chu ba dang rgyus pa'ang dbyung dgos na/ rgyal po chen po de 'dra ba'i na tsha'i
295a5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal bzod dam/ rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems su gyur nas/ de nas shan pas gnag lce lta bu'i gri thogs te/ ring po mi thogs par rgyal po'i lus la rma
295a6(mdo sde): snying tshang bar bcang ngo // gshan pa rgyal po'i sems byir nur pa tsam du sems pa las/ sems ma nur bas glu yang sa la bor nas bris so// de nas rgyal po chen po'i lus la rma stong tshang bar
295a7(mdo sde): pa'i lam dum pa bu thugs nas/ ras bzang po'i snying po btsugs te/ mar me stong btsugs so// de'i tshe bram ze ston pa chen pos de ltar byas pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du ni myur du chos sa
295b1(mdo sde): bgangan sum blag 'tshalam mi ma ma mengapas/ ga gas mos na sum thos pas pa gyur bas mas nas/ rtul ba la 'dis smras smra pa// sa rnas pa ma
295b2(mdo sde): 'dod pas/ shin du dpa' ba'i brtson 'grur gyis bya dka' ba'i spyong ba lhung pas/ legs pa rtson la shin tu ying la zu bzhig dang / dargyal po la sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan par bya'o//
295b3(mdo sde): ces smras pa thos nas rgyal po rab tu dga' ba'i sems su gyur te/ dper na bu sri zhu can zhig pa ma shi na rab tu mi dga' ste/ sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa las/ pha ma phyir sos pa nA/ bu de'i lta
295b4(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ba ltar/ rgyal po de'ang rab tu dga' bar gyur to// de nas bram ze des/ rgyal po la smras pa/ skye ba yod na 'chi bar 'gyur// 'gog pa 'di ni bde ba yin// zhes tshigs su bcad
295b5(mdo sde): pa phyed 'di bstan to// rgyal pos dam pa'i chos bstan pa thos nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems su gyur te// rgyal bu dang blon po rnams la 'di skad ces bsgo'o// khyed rnams kho bo la sdug cing brtse
295b6(mdo sde): ba'i sems yod na chos 'di ma brjed par yid la zung la/ yul phyogs su gang na mang po 'dus pa'i gnas dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / tshong dus su 'gro ba mang po la 'di skad ces bkar thogs
295b7(mdo sde): shig/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen pos sems can mang po sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor bying ba dag 'don pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed nas/ lus la mar ma
296a1(mdo sde): stong btsugs te/ tshigs su bcad pa'i tshig bcud byed pa thos pa 'di rgyal po can po 'di'i byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems grub par bya ba'i rdzi thams cad kyis mi/
296a2(mdo sde): gyir bris te 'don pa dang / kha ton du bya ba dang / 'dri ba dang / goms par byed pa dang / don yang yid la bya zhi 'i b+har gA tams pa bzhin phun tan du sbya bar bya'o// de'i dzin gyi ma sa den
296a3(mdo sde): ces bsgo ba thos nas/ rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur te/ thams cad kyis tshig mthun par rgyal po la bstong nas shin tu dga'a'o// rgyal po rnon po bdag cag snying rje chen po pa yang dag pa
296a4(mdo sde): yin no// sems can thams cad kyi phyir shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad do zhes kun gyis bsngags te/ shog shog dang / dar dang / shun pa dang / shing rdol yi ger bris te kha ton du slob bo// gang na mi/
296a5(mdo sde): mang po 'du ba'i gnas su'ang yi ger bris te/ thams cad kyis mthong zhing thos par byas nas/ bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug go// de'i tshe rgyal po chen pos lus la mar me stong
296a6(mdo sde): btsugs te/ ston pa chen po bram ze la mchod pa byas pa'i 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu'i zhing 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar gyur te/ mar me de'i 'od de las tshigs su bcad pa'i tshig bcad byed kyi
296a7(mdo sde): chos sgra yang grags par gyur nas/ thams cad bla na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de// mar me de'i 'od des sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha'i khang pa'ang snang bar bya
296b1(mdo sde): nas dmar me'i 'od des lnga'i 'od kun zil gyis mnan pas sum cu rtsa gsum gnam g+hi lha rnams kyis/ mar me'i 'od des kun tu snang bar byas pas/ de dag 'di sam du gyur te/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen
296b2(mdo sde): gyis 'od zer 'di lta bu snang bar gyur snyam/ lha'i mig gis bltas pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen pos snying rje'i sems bskyed de/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi phyir
296b3(mdo sde): lus la mar me stong btsugs nas/ ston pa chen po bram ze la mchod pa byas par mthong ngo // lha de dag rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams su babs nas/ me tha
296b4(mdo sde): mal pa'i lus su sprul nas/ rgyal po ga la bar lhags te/ rgyal po chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po lus la mar me stong btsugs te/ shin tu'ang dka' ba spyad cing / tshig
296b5(mdo sde): su bcad pa byed cig thos pas ci zhig bya/ rgyal pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdag ni sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du gzhug pa'i phyir ro//
296b6(mdo sde): danas sprul pa'i mi dbying brgya byin gyi lus su bsgru sa/ sum gyu'od kyis byin tu snang bar byas te/ rgyal ba chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshul la chen po 'dir mche pa byas pa
296b7(mdo sde): 'i rgyal 'dod dpa/ bdud kyi rgyal la 'ding das tshangs pa'i rgyal ba 'dod / 'a' las sgyur ba'i rgyal bas// brgya byin la smras pa/ lha rgyal pa ba dam mi lha nga mo'i langs spyong sapa
297a1(mdo sde): yang mi 'dod ste/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'do // sa sa'i skye bo thams cad mi 'ad ba rnams bde ba'i gnas su dgod pa dang / mgro
297a2(mdo sde): rnams grol bar bya ba dang / pha rol tu ma byin pa rnams phyin par bya ba dang / byang chub ma thob pa rnams thob par bya bar 'dong ngo // brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod ni rab tu gyun
