410a6(mdo sde): las+ya b+h+yas pa byung chub tu bsngos na/ de'i rgyub ba sku'i drung bu re de nas sbya de nas skye ba'i mtshan dang / s+yA na la 'dang/ me bzhi bcu dab ldan pa dang / ra
410a7(mdo sde): chog gis can tho bgro/ tag tu rtson 'grus byas de de'i rgya sa 'gram pa'i byang chu padang yum kyi mang so gas bu'i ma pa ga/ sems ce thams cad ladru ga cis
410b1(mdo sde): pa dang 'dra bar sdug par bsams dus de'i rgyas so zags pabang ba dang mig mtho mthid du 'dug pa dang mig gyul chog gi rgyal po bu ma du thob bo// dge
410b2(mdo sde): ba'i chos sgrub pa la skyo zhing ngal ba'i sems med pas mtshan lhag ma gzhan rnams thob bo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe
410b3(mdo sde): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi las byed do// rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa'i tshe mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yod mod kyi yongs su rdzogs pa 'am gsal ba ma yin no// smyud pa
410b4(mdo sde): bcu gsum pa la gnas pa na/ mtshan rnams kyang mngon par gsal bar yongs su rdzogs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis mtshan grangs med mod kyi/ sems can rnams la mo
410b5(mdo sde): mthun / rab dang / 'bring dang tha ma yod pas bsam gyis mi khyab pas de bas na sangs rgyas kyis mtshan babang po sum cu rtsa gnyis gsungs so// sems
410b6(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi bsod namasa'i tsam yod pa phyogs gcig tu bsdus te spungs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsdu gcig gi mtshan dang mnyam mo// pa spu'i drung du thams cad kyi bsod
410b7(mdo sde): nams ri snyed cig yod pa gcig tu bsdus te spungs na dpe byad bzang po gcig dang mnyam mo// dpe byad bzang po tsam yod pa'i bsod namasa'i snyed yod pa de las brgya 'gyur du byas na/
411a1(mdo sde): mtshan gcig dang mnyam ste smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dkar po'i mtshan dang spyi gtsug gi mtshan bltar mi snang ba'i mtshan ni ma gtogs so//
411a2(mdo sde): ma yin pa mtshan gzhan thams cad gcig tu bsdus te spyong 'gyur du byas na mtshan gong ma gnyis su 'gyur ro// mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad nu bo'i bsod nams
411a3(mdo sde): ji snyed yod pa gcig tu bsdus spungs te/ khri phrag stong 'gyur du byas pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'brug sgra lta bu'i dbyangs zab cing rgyang ring por grags pa'i mtshan dang mnyam ste/
411a4(mdo sde): gsung sgra des ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdul phra rab snyed du grags shing sems can gyi don du byams pa dang snying rje chen po spyod pas drin shes pa dang
411a5(mdo sde): drin bsabs pa dang 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// de ltar mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po de dag re res kyang so so'i skye bo tshad med grangs med pa bye ba brgya stong gi sa chen po'i
411a6(mdo sde): rdul phra rab snyed la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byas nas byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug go/ de ltar mthar gyis sgrib pa yongs su rdzogs nas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang
411a7(mdo sde): po rnams gnyis thob ste/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po la yongs su rdzogs nas/ byang chub kyi shing drung du song ste/ bdud kyi dpung rnams btul te mngon par sangs rgyas nas/
411b1(mdo sde): yang dag par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// so so'i skye bo la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du 'dod pa'i chu klung las bsgral nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gram du bkod de
411b2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don yongs su rdzogs par byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la
411b3(mdo sde): sogs te/ 'khor mang po thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed rnams la su nig sangs rgyas kyi bka' dzin rtag tu gso ning dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i phyir
411b4(mdo sde): tha bas mkhas pa chen po'i mdo sde drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde shin tu babang mo 'di glegs bam du bri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed par 'gyur/ su zhig gis phyi ma'i dus ngan pa'i
411b5(mdo sde): brtson 'grus chen po bskyed de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di bsrung ning gzungs su 'dzin par 'gyurasu zhig gis chos bsrung ba'i phyir/ mdo
411b6(mdo sde): sde 'di rgyas par spel zhing sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par nus nas bka' stsal pa dang / de'i tshe 'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khri brgyad
411b7(mdo sde): steng snyed 'dug pa las langs te gos tshags bcos nas bla gos phyogs gcig tu gapar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs thal mo sbyar ba btud nas sangs
412a1(mdo sde): rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis spang ma'i dus ngan pa'i tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di bsrung
412a2(mdo sde): zhing dam pa'i chos gzungs su bzung ste/ sems can mang po la phan pa'i don byed par spro'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ges 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
412a3(mdo sde): 'das bdag kyang thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams yongs su bsdu bar spro'o// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjes gsol pa/ sems can gang ngan 'gro gsum du ltung bar
412a4(mdo sde): gyur pa dag bdag gis ci nas kyang mi ltung bar bgyi bar spro'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ sems can gyi rnams ci dang ci 'dod pa bdag gis thams cad
412a5(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar spro'o// byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ bdag gis ni sems can rnams la ye shes chen po'i chos kyi rgyal mtshan sbyin par
412a6(mdo sde): bgyi bar spro'o// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni sems can rnams la chos yongs su sbyin par spro'o// byang
412a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gi 'od kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni sems can rnams la bde ba sbyin par spro'o// byang chub sems dpa' bra 'od kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
412b1(mdo sde): 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la bsod nams kyi las byed du gtsug par bskul bar mA ra byang chub sems dpa' dge sbyong gis gsol ba bcom ldan 'das bdag ri sems
412b2(mdo sde): can rnams la thams cad bag med pa la mi gnas par bskul bar spro'o// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams
412b3(mdo sde): cad la brang mi shes pa'i dbyings kyi don mthong bar bstan par spro'o// byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad la blan med pa'i
412b4(mdo sde): bde ba sbyin pa bgyi bar spro'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so nas dam bcas so// byang chub yongs su brgyan cing sems can thams cad la ban ning bde ba dang
412b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin dran ningasangs rgyas kyi bka' drin pa sab pa'i phyir stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ sangs rgyas kyi mdo sde 'di bdag cag
412b6(mdo sde): la gtang du gsol zhes gsol to// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di'i mtshan ci zhes bgyi/ ji ltar
412b7(mdo sde): yongs su gzung bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde 'di'i ming dge ba'i dngos po kun bsdu ba zhes kyang bya/ thabs mkhas pa
413a1(mdo sde): chen po zhes kyang ba dgongs pa dam pa'i spyong pa zhes kyang bya sangs rgyas drin lan bas pa pa zhes kyang bya'o// bcom ldan
413a2(mdo sde): 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed rnams 'iji ltar bstan pa bzhin du nan tan du
413a3(mdo sde): spyod cig/ sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gdams pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nyan thos bdun khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to//
413a4(mdo sde): gzhan yang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang de la
413a5(mdo sde): sogs pa thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs par gyur to// thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsabs pa'i mdo lasanye bar
413a6(mdo sde): bsnyen pa'i le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o// / thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//
413a7(mdo sde): rgya nag la sa bong du 'gyur ba la 'gyur gsar bcad ma byas pa'o// /
